title: Armor Hero (Atlas) Movie 2014
description: The UCP Control Centre that holds multiple people infected with the Ocasian virus was seized by the Princes of Ocasers, Lambda and Phi, and they used them to build an army of Ocasers. Duanmu, Qingshan, Kuohai, and Ke Sheng donned the six super armors Atlas, Techno, Lava, Tornado, Tsunami, and Clif to strike back at the Ocasers. But unknown to them, the two princes are brooding yet another evil plan.

title: Alice In Wonderland
description: Iria, a beautiful princess from a small kingdom has refused every prince who has asked for her hand in marriage. When Iria nears 18 years old there is much worry that she will not find a prince of her liking, which would be horrible since without a prince there would be no heirs! One summer night, Iria whispered to the moon sharing her worries, an enchanted and mischievous frog overhears her; Iria is unaware that our four legged friend is actually a prince who needs her kiss to become a boy Prince once more. Our enchanted frog decides this is the perfect time to set the stage for his rescue and whispers back to the princess “You will marry the first creature that talks to you when you leave the castle…” How will the Prince Frog lure the Princess from the castle so they may reach happily ever after? Watch the wacky and exciting adventures unfold with many laughs and twists!

description: On the surface, William Travers is a picture of success -- an accomplished criminal barrister happily living with his wife in a beautiful rural Suffolk home. title: Romantic Doctor, Teacher Kim (Vietnamese)
description: Bộ phim tình cảm do Hàn Quốc sản xuất xoay quanh câu chuyện về vị bác sĩ phẫu thuật tài giỏi có tên Boo Jong Yoo. Trong phim Boo Jong Yoo đã quyết định từ bỏ sự nghiệp đang ở đỉnh cao của mình để trở về một vùng quê hẻo lánh mở bệnh viện chữa trị cho những người ở nơi này và cũng chính tại đây ông đã giúp đỡ cho hai bác sĩ trẻ là Dong Joo và Yoon Seo Jung vượt qua những khó khăn trong nghề nghiệp mà họ mắc phải.

title: Let's Dance
description: Painter Ding Yi-ming and dancer He Li shares the same passion for art and therefore be united in marriage. To pursue a higher level in dancing, He Li abandoned her husband and three years old daughter Xiao-han, and went to England alone for further studies. She then gave birth to another daughter He Fei in that foreign land. Eighteen years later, Xiao-han who grows up under the love of her father is genial, cheerful and elegant; He Fei who has no one to depend on is beautiful but has a cold character. Yang Rui returns to his country and meets Xiao-han. Xiao-han falls for his easy-going personality and his bright smile. Yang is touched when he knows Xiao- Han hiding her illness. It is because she only wants to bring happiness to the people around her. In order to let her father enjoy his retirement life without worries, she takes on several jobs and works very hard, making full use of each day.  After that, Yang is reunited with his childhood sweetheart He Fei and they rekindle their love. Yang is tolerant of her proud character and her consuming love for dancing.  A major London musical is looking for leading actor and actresses. Xiao-han and He Fei become main rivals for the leading role. For this musical, He Li returns to her country and tries to find her missing husband and daughter in order to make up for not fulfilling her role as mother. But will they accept her? Jealousy can drive ones crazy. He Fei loses control and pushes Xiao-han down the stage, worsening her illness. Their sibling relationship is revealed and the mother finally meets her daughter……When two are sisters, will they continue to strife in love? On stage, will they continue to contend fiercely? Humanity has its bright side and its ugly side. In the end, who will stay by the sunshine and stay by the lover?

title: Victoria
description:
Queen Victoria, a nineteenth century heroine for our times. Series Two sees the impulsive young queen face the very modern challenge of balancing a growing family with her husband and her work – all while being the ruler of the most powerful nation on earth. 
 
As Victoria’s reign continues into the 1840s, her Kingdom is witness to extraordinary events. Constitutional crises and scandalous romances blossoming at court. The rise of the Chartist movement, the devastating Irish Potato Famine and perilous diplomatic relations that see Victoria travelling to France to try her hand at foreign policy.
 
Victoria and Prince Albert brave each trial on the world stage while also confronting profound personal changes. Facing down loss and betrayal against a dizzying backdrop of their expanding family, royal duties and an adventure to Scotland, they must renegotiate the balance of power in their passionate marriage if they are to thrive as the world’s most influential partnership.

title: The Fox's Summer
description: Mùa Hè Của Hồ Ly kể về Cố Thừa Trạch là chủ tịch tập đoàn Cố thi, là con nuôi của của Cố Thái Thái. Cố Thái Thái mong muốn Cố Cẩm Quân vào công ty của mình làm việc, nhưng Cẩm Quân lại không một chút để ý. Vì thế Cố Thái Thái bố trí Cố Thừa Trạch giúp đỡ Cẩm Quân nhậm chức. Trong lúc này, Cố Thừa Trạch quen biết với nhà thiết kế Lê Yến Thư, cũng biết được cô gái này đã từng cùng Cẩm Quân qua lại, đối với Cẩm Quân ảnh hưởng sâu đậm. Cố Thừa Trạch lợi dụng điều này, thông báo tuyển cô vào công ty, hai người trong quá trình làm việc cùng nhau đã nảy sinh tình cảm. Cố Cẩm Quân gặp lại Lê Yến Thư, quyết tâm theo đuổi cô lại.

title: Grand Prince
description: Lee Kang is an ambitious prince. He falls in love with Sung Ja Hyun. She is a beautiful woman from a prestigious family, but Lee Kang's younger brother Lee Hwi also loves her. To have Ja Hyun, Lee Kang wants to become the King... even if he has to kill his younger brother.

title: Cupid Co.
description: In a world where cupids exist among humans, Tim, a struggling cupid against the laws of heaven, accidentally makes a human fall in love with him. He faces the great dilemma of whether he should be together with his dream girl or make things right again in order to obey the law. Either way, he has to face the consequences.

title: All Out Of Love
description: Two childhood friends grow up to be separated by an accident. Jiang Sheng, broken by Liang Sheng's disappearance, found consolences and protection in Cheng Tianyou. Suddenly Liang Sheng returns, revealing himself to be Cheng Tianyou's cousin. Torn between love and family feud, the trio struggles to find peace amidst each other and their own suffering.

title: Winter Sonata
description: The talented son of a musician searches for information about his past and his biological father by moving to a rural city. There, he finds love instead. But then a terrible tragedy befalls him and nothing was the same again.
synopsis: The talented son of a musician searches for information about his past and his biological father by moving to a rural city. There, he finds love instead. But then a terrible tragedy befalls him and nothing was the same again.

title: Ang Dalawang Mrs. Real
description: Why have one wife when you can have TWO? What’s that, you can’t have two wives? Well, Anthony Real seems to have missed that memo. He married two women -- Millet who’s given up her career to devote all her time and energy to Anthony, and Shiela who thinks Anthony’s all she needs in her life. Both of them are heartbroken to say the least when they find out about their bigamous husband. Will the real Mrs. Real please stand up?

title: The Rich Man's Daughter
description: Jade Tanchingco is born into a wealthy and traditional Filipino-Chinese family. She is the youngest and only daughter of Oscar and Amanda, the jewel of the Tanchingco family. Jade always believed she would end up married to her boyfriend of many years, David, until she falls in love with a wedding coordinator, Althea. Upon learning their secret relationship, Jade's father offers 100 million pesos to the man who can turn his daughter straight.

title: The Bachelor Vietnam
description: The series revolves around a single former bachelor who starts with a pool of romantic interests (typically 25) from whom the bachelor is expected to select a wife. During the course of the season, the bachelor eliminates candidates, with the bachelor typically proposing marriage to his final selection. The participants travel to romantic and exotic locations for their adventures, and the conflicts in the series, both internal and external, stem from the elimination-style format of the show.

title: The Originals
description: What’s scarier, a vampire or a werewolf? How about a hybrid of the two, because Klaus Mikaelson is both. In this spinoff of The Vampire Diaries, Klaus returns to New Orleans to investigate rumours of a plot against him but finds his former protege, Marcel controlling the town and causing tension in the supernatural community. Part disappointed and part outraged, Klaus has his brother, Elijah, join him and they learn that Hayley (a werewolf) is in the hands of a defiant witch with a secret that could change EVERYTHING. With the goal of reclaiming New Orleans, the two brothers form a laborious alliance with the witches.

title: The Bride Of Habaek
description: Neuropsychiatrist So Ah has been riddled with bad luck but she doesn’t believe in superstition. Unfortunately for her, the water god Habaek shows up claiming that she is his destined bride and servant. Obviously he’s a delusional lunatic right? Things only get more complicated when the wind god Bi Ryum, the water goddess Mu Ra, and a hotel CEO Hu Ye get added into the mix.

title: Goblin (2016)
description: Kim Shin (Gong Yoo) is a goblin who is also a protector of souls. He lives together with an amnesiac grim reaper (Lee Dong-wook) who is in charge of taking deceased souls. Together, the two of them see the dead off into the afterlife.

title: Britannia
description: An epic drama set in 43AD as the Roman Imperial Army – determined and terrified in equal measure - returns to crush the Celtic heart of Britannia - a mysterious land ruled by warrior women and powerful druids who can channel the powerful forces of the underworld. Or so they say.

title: The Vampire Diaries
description: In the fictional small town of Mystic Falls inhabited by supernatural beings, Elena and her brother Jeremy have a hard time coming to terms with their parents’ tragic deaths. Elena falls in love with gentle Stefan, one of the Salvatore brothers but as the series progresses, Elena finds herself being drawn to his more violent brother, Damon instead. Unaware that the brothers are actually vampires that are at least a few hundred years older than her, Elena finds herself going on many, many emotional rodeos.

title: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim
description: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim is a romantic comedy that focuses on the relationship between Lee Young Joon and Kim Mi So. Lee Young Joon is the narcissistic vice president of a company who has it all, while Kim Mi So is his secretary known for her competence.

title: Marvo the Wonder Chicken
description: Marvo the Wonder Chicken, with his faithful assistant and No.1 fan Henry, attempts to put on the “Greatest Shows on Earth” (or anywhere else for that matter!). However, everything that can go wrong does go wrong and non-stop chaotic entertainment ensues.

title: Cartoon Factory
description: During the thirties in the US, cartoons were one of the major types of film. Walt Disney's contemporaries constantly innovated and created new and original worlds... A considerable amount of research, and reediting, done for ARTE by the best specialists of the genre, has saved a number of these cartoon classics. With more than 50 films, we rediscover Alice, as well as the fabulous adventures of Popeye and Olive. We also discover Bosco, Tom and Jerry, at the time when they were not yet a cat and a mouse... Cartoon Factory is both a historical monument and a moment of pleasure for children aged 7 to 77.

title: Hot Ones Philippines
description: Hot Ones is a celebrity interview show with a twist - for every question, guests must eat a progressively spicier chicken wing with Hot Ones’ host, Sam. The hot sauce acts a truth serum, bringing out some of the most honest and hilarious reactions you’ll see in any Q&A. Hot Ones is the spiciest interview show on the internet.

description: Hài Tết đặc sắc với sự tham gia của các danh hài hàng đầu miền Bắc: Xuân Hinh, Hồng Vân

title: Tien Oi
description: Tiền ơi là câu chuyện xoay quanh sự nghiệp tiêu tiền của hai vợ chồng nhà Thạch Sùng. Vào một ngày cuối năm, hai vợ chồng Thạch Sùng ngồi dưới gầm cầu than thở vì nghèo, hai người ước rất nhiều thứ cuối cùng Bụt hiện lên và cho hai vợ chồng một điều ước. Hai vợ chồng không ngần ngại ước có thật nhiều tiền, Bụt đồng ý nhưng đưa ra điều kiện phải tiêu hết số tiền có trong tay trước khi giao thừa.

description: Vở chèo đặc sắc với sự tham gia của các diễn viên nổi tiếng Quốc Anh, Thu Huyền, An Chinh

title: Animal Mix
description: BRUNO the polar bear is getting bored on the North Pole; he receives an invitation to go to his friend's jungle party and of course he finds a way to get there. Once he gets to the jungle, he's invited to be the party bouncer which he accepts. We see various animals singing about themselves and enjoying the party. In between the songs, Pretty Boy the parrot and Bruno introduce the next song in the series.

title: Willa's Wild Life
description: An endearing little girl with a unique home, Willa maneuvers her way through life's trials and tribulations, aided by her loving father and the plethora of zoo animals she has as an extended family. Although she frequently makes her situations worse before they get better, her adventures offer valuable lessons to her young viewers.

title: Nihao, Kai-Lan
description: Preschooler Kai-lan shares Chinese and American cultures with viewers, as well as the Mandarin language. The play-along series features interactive exercises and magical stories of Kai-lan and her animal friends. Chinese words are introduced as well as life lessons, such as anger management, patience, sharing and being a good group member.

description: Liven up your Chinese New Year with lots of laughter!

title: Too Belgian For You
description: A hen house that causes a diplomatic incident, a child falling from the sky, a capitalist Santa Claus, a plucky plumber with a Flemish accent and a killer bear. The best of the Belgian comedy. Five multi-award-winning shorts in the world.

title: Tet Cuoi Sieu Ninh
description: "Siêu Nịnh" là tiểu phẩm hài tết của Công ty cổ phần nghe nhìn Thăng Long do Phạm Đông Hồng làm đạo diễn, có thể nói đây là tiểu phẩm hài vô cùng ấn tượng hứa hẹn sẽ đem lại cho các bạn những giây phút thư giãn vô cùng thú vị trong những ngày nghỉ tết.

title: Strongest Deliveryman
description: Story depicts love and success of a deliveryman who eventually becomes the CEO of a delivery app company.
synopsis: Story depicts love and success of a deliveryman who eventually becomes the CEO of a delivery app company.

title: Scratch My Back
description: Having committed various crimes, four young-sters end up doing community service at a luxurious seaside rest home. This is a shock, to them as well as to the residents. It is two worlds colliding. When dark clouds gather above the rest home, only a radical action can avert a disaster. But for that, the senior citizens will have to call upon the four teenagers’ assistance.

title: Running With Violet
description: Two women and a toddler chasing freedom on the road trip of their lives.
synopsis: Two women and a toddler chasing freedom on the road trip of their lives.

title: Revolutionary Love
description: Rich guy Byun Hyuk (Siwon) and part-timer for life Baek June (Kang Sora), smart elite Jae Hoon (Gong Myung) become friends and tries to revolutionize their lives together.
synopsis: Rich guy Byun Hyuk (Siwon) and part-timer for life Baek June (Kang Sora), smart elite Jae Hoon (Gong Myung) become friends and tries to revolutionize their lives together.

title: Oh My Venus
description: Kim Young-ho, a.k.a. John Kim, is a personal trainer to Hollywood stars. Despite his family's wealth, Young-ho suffered a devastating illness in his childhood. But he believes living a healthy lifestyle and exercise is the only way to survive. He uses this to run from his family issues. His fear of his father and pity for his grandmother. A Hollywood scandal with an actress has him on the run back to Korea.

A Hollywood scandal with an actress has him on the run back to Korea.

title: My First Love
description: Kang Shin-Woo is a math teacher with a good looking appearance. He has not forgotten his first love Han Ji-Soo for the past 10 years. By an accident, he travels to the past when he was a high school student. There, he meets his younger self. Kang Shin-Woo struggles to make the younger Kang Shin-Woo's love come true.

title: Mom
description: Christy Plunkett is a single mom who’s been through a lot -- alcoholism, drug abuse, a divorce, you name it! After all that, she decides to simmer down and restart her life in Napa, California, working as a waitress and religiously attending Alcoholics Anonymous meetings. Then Christy’s passive-aggressive mother Bonnie who is also a recovering alcoholic and drug addict decides to “work on their relationship”. Christy also has to juggle relationships with her boss/lover, her rebellious teenage kids, and deadbeat ex-husband. Don’t know how she does it, but having a wicked sense of humour probably helps.

title: Cuoi Xuan Nam Bac: Bu Thang Boi
description: Kể về câu chuyện của một thanh niên từ quê lên tỉnh với phong cách hài hiện đại.
synopsis: Kể về câu chuyện của một thanh niên từ quê lên tỉnh với phong cách hài hiện đại.

title: 2 Broke Girls
description: Street-wise Max (Kat Dennings) doesn't expect much from the new waitress at her night job, a rich girl who has reluctantly joined the food service industry after a string of bad luck. But to her surprise, Caroline (Beth Behrs) is a woman of substance and just may be her ticket to success. The two strike up an unlikely friendship after Caroline discovers that Max can bake a mean cupcake, and the women decide if they can just wrangle up the start-up cash, they may have found their big break. Their co-workers at the diner are boss Han Lee, cook Oleg and cashier Earl.

title: Episodes
description: Sean and Beverly Lincoln are the creators and producers of a long-running, highly acclaimed, and very popular TV show in the UK. After they receive yet another award for the show, a US TV exec shows up to take them to America to create a local version of the show. It wasn’t an easy decision, but yes, the Lincolns agreed to let someone else touch their “baby”. But once they’re there,it doesn’t take long for them to figure out that Hollywood is a place where deals are made and broken at the same time. Doesn’t help that the star of their show is ex-Friends actor, Matt Le Blanc, who is turning the show into a terrible cliche.

title: Whose Line Is It Anyway?
description: It’s improv on steroids! Ryan Stiles, Wayne Brady, and Colin Mochrie will leave you in stitches as they act out different scenarios based on suggestions from the studio audience and their host, Aisha Taylor. Welcome to the show where everything’s made up, the points don’t matter, and nothing is off limits.

title: The Big Bang Theory
description: Four turbonerd know-it-alls discover that although they can science their way through life, they still haven’t got a clue on how to interact with other (normal) human beings in everyday situations. What happens when their new neighbour turns out to be a blonde bombshell? *knock knock knock* PENNY!

title: Jon Atherton : Disoriental
description: “Disoriental”:  comedic misadventures in the Orient told through the life story of one unique Asian: A white one.
synopsis: “Disoriental”:  comedic misadventures in the Orient told through the life story of one unique Asian: A white one.

title: Estudyante Blues
description: Rafael (Kenneth Peralta) is the new kid in town. He and his family moved into the Big City from their hometown in Davao. On his first day in school he has already encountered a bunch of weird and difficult classmates - Michael (Raymart Santiago), a street-smart budding playboy; Zhaider, the self-entitled son of a Mayor; Diana (Gelli de Belen), an opinionated, feisty young girl; Vincent Kennedy, an insufferable simpleton; (Mel Martinez), a gay classmate who is still in denial of his sexual preference.

title: iflix Quizzles The Hangover Part III
description: This time, there's no weeding also no bachelor party. Watch now to see what will happened when Wolfpack hits the road!

title: Yunnan Adventure With Nigel Marven
synopsis: Nigel Marven takes us on an awe-inspiring journey through the most remote parts of China, finding rare animals and braving some of the world's most inhospitable terrain.

title: Wonders Of The World
description: The gorillas in Rwanda, Victoria Falls in Zambia and the Grand Canyon in the United States are some of the destinations of Wonders of the World. Each episode is a unique invitation to travel to the most beautiful landscapes of the planet along with handy information when visiting these exotic places.
synopsis: The gorillas in Rwanda, Victoria Falls in Zambia and the Grand Canyon in the United States are some of the destinations of Wonders of the World. Each episode is a unique invitation to travel to the most beautiful landscapes of the planet along with handy information when visiting these exotic places.

title: Whose World Is It?
description: At the start of the 21st century, the global population, resource consumption and the ensuing environmental problems are increasing at an unprecedented rate. The attendant shortage of resources is leading to allocation conflicts that are increasingly played out on world markets –even in the case of vital commodities such as water or arable land, which had thus far enjoyed a certain level of protection owing to their significance. The growing gulf between rich and poor, between the haves and the have-nots, is becoming ever more widespread as a result, both on a global and national level. Whose World Is It? explores major problems that will have a significant impact on the future of mankind.

title: Haikyu!!
description: Shoyo HINATA, enchanted by volleyball, jumps at his first chance to participate in an official game. However, it becomes his last as he is utterly defeated by the genius player, KAGEYAMA, known as the “King of the Court”. HINATA vows revenge and with tireless practice tries out for Karasuno High School’s volleyball team. Who he unexpectedly sees there is KAGEYAMA…

title: Girl Meets Bear
description: What does a bear know about life in the big city? For Machi Amayadori's sake, hopefully a lot! The young shrine maiden has spent her whole life in the rural mountains with Natsu, her talking guardian bear. Now, at fourteen, she wants to take a chance and attend high school in the big city. Can Natsu really prepare her for city life? Or will his wacky trials be too much for even Machi to bear?

title: Charlotte
description: In an alternate world, a small percentage of children are able to manifest superpowers upon reaching puberty. Yū Otosaka, a boy who awakens the ability to temporarily possess others, hopes to use his power to live an easy going high school life. However, he is caught red-handed by the mysterious Nao Tomori and is forced to transfer to Hoshinoumi Academy, where he and the other student council members must help students with abilities and stop them getting found out.

title: Blast Of Tempest
description:
The Kusaribe family is a family of sorcerers under the protection of the ‘Tree of Origins.’ Their princess, Hakaze Kusaribe, was the greatest sorceress of their family. But Samon Kusaribe, a member of their family seeking to resurrect the ‘Tree of World’s End,’ a tree that opposes the ‘Tree of Origins’ and controls the power of destruction, stuffs her into a barrel, and banishes her to a deserted island. From the deserted island, she sends a message out to sea, which is picked up by Mahiro Fuwa, a young boy who’s sworn vengeance upon the criminal who killed his little sister, Aika. Mahiro agrees to help Hakaze under the condition that she find Aika’s killer with her magic. But once Mahiro’s best friend and Aika’s lover, Yoshino Takigawa is rescued from danger, he too gets dragged into this tale of revenge.
​

title: All Out!
description: In rugby, there is no ace striker, there is no number four batter, so who is the star of the team? The story begins at school entrance ceremony of Kanagawa High School where Kenji Gion, a small but gutsy go-getter joins the rugby club.
synopsis: In rugby, there is no ace striker, there is no number four batter, so who is the star of the team? The story begins at school entrance ceremony of Kanagawa High School where Kenji Gion, a small but gutsy go-getter joins the rugby club.

title: This Means War
description: The face of war is changing. Governments and armies attempt to present war as a legitimate political tool and, as far as is possible, try to portray military operations as harmless. Civilians are only safe as long as this is deemed appropriate. Only sanitized images of war are made public “clean” and precise strikes using combat drones and intelligent bombs; and those involved are given all the air time they need to justify their military activities. The reality on the ground is very different. Wars continue to inflict great suffering, destruction and death long after the battles have ceased.

title: The Sixties
description: A ten-part documentary series focusing on the politics, music, technical advancements, drugs, and the "free love" movement of the 1960s.
synopsis: A ten-part documentary series focusing on the politics, music, technical advancements, drugs, and the "free love" movement of the 1960s.

title: The Cars That Made Us
description: From the sleek Aston Martin to the irrepressible Porsche 911, we enjoy cars of all shapes and sizes. Over the years thousands of iconic motors have hit the international tarmac. In this series we will relive our proud and not so proud history on four wheels, celebrating the cars of road-trips past. Interviewing a selection of brilliant comedians, personalities and petrol heads, they share their laugh out loud critiques and fond memories of everything from their very first cars to the motors that occupied their schoolyard daydreams.

actors: Jodie Kidd,Dom Joly,Martin Kemp,Oliver Phelps,James Phelps,Tim Westwood,Benjamin Zephaniah

title: Kids Behind Bars: Lost For Life
description: Individuals who are serving life-without-parole sentences for crimes committed when they were 17 or younger are profiled.
synopsis: Individuals who are serving life-without-parole sentences for crimes committed when they were 17 or younger are profiled.

title: Jesus Of Nazareth
description: 1977 Beginning before the Nativity and extending through the Crucifixion and Resurrection, this mini-series brings to life all of the sweeping drama in the life of Jesus, as told by the Gospels.
synopsis: 1977 Beginning before the Nativity and extending through the Crucifixion and Resurrection, this mini-series brings to life all of the sweeping drama in the life of Jesus, as told by the Gospels.

title: Harry & Meghan: A Royal Romance
description: Harry & Meghan: A Royal Romance follows the fairytale romance of Prince Harry (Murray Fraser, The Loch) and Meghan Markle (Parisa Fitz-Henley, Midnight Texas) from the moment they met after being set up by friends, through their initial courtship when they were able to keep their romance under wraps, and ultimately the intense global media attention surrounding their relationship and Meghan’s life as a divorced American actress
synopsis: Harry & Meghan: A Royal Romance follows the fairytale romance of Prince Harry (Murray Fraser, The Loch) and Meghan Markle (Parisa Fitz-Henley, Midnight Texas) from the moment they met after being set up by friends, through their initial courtship when they were able to keep their romance under wraps, and ultimately the intense global media attention surrounding their relationship and Meghan’s life as a divorced American actress

title: Ancient Aliens
description: Science and mythology are the same thing… right? This is what Ancient Aliens hopes to explore. Did life on Earth begin in outer space? Did aliens influence mankind in ancient times? Watch as investigators circle the globe in search of evidence to prove this theory. I WANT TO BELIEVE!
synopsis: Science and mythology are the same thing… right? This is what Ancient Aliens hopes to explore. Did life on Earth begin in outer space? Did aliens influence mankind in ancient times? Watch as investigators circle the globe in search of evidence to prove this theory. I WANT TO BELIEVE!

title: The Ladykillers: Pest Detectives
description: Series following four female pest controllers as they do battle with Britain's most common household pests.
synopsis: Series following four female pest controllers as they do battle with Britain's most common household pests.

title: The Malayan Emergency
synopsis: In 1948, an undeclared war on terror took place in the jungles of Malaya. Archived photos and narration paint a picture of what the British and Malayan forces did to win the hearts and minds of the people.

title: The Murder of Canny Ong
description: A young Malaysian IT analyst, Canny Ong Lay Kian was back in Malaysia to visit her cancer-stricken father. But on Friday, the 13th of June 2003, Kuala Lumpur, Canny disappeared mysteriously at the mall's parking lot. After reviewing CCTV footage of the parking lot, they were shocked to find out that she was kidnapped. That was the last time her love ones saw her. Follow the investigation into the shocking murder that made headlines all over Malaysia.

Follow the investigation into the shocking murder that made headlines all over Malaysia.

title: The 100
description: Fast forward to the future -- a nuclear war resulting in the apocalypse all doomsday preppers have been waiting for has destroyed civilisation. 97 years later, the remaining survivors on a space ark of linked stations can do nothing but watch as they slowly run out of resources. The solution? Send 100 juvenile prisoners as human guinea pigs to test out the habitability of Earth. Now known as The 100, the fate of humanity rests on their young shoulders as they venture out into the terrifying unknown.

title: Criminal Justice
description: Ever wonder what it’s like to be a criminal? Wonder no more! ‘Criminal Justice’ takes us on a journey through the justice system. Series 1 features Ben Coulter, a young man accused of murder after a drunken and drug-filled night out. He can’t remember any of it but there’s blood on his hands. Series 2 follows troubled housewife Juliet after she’s stabbed her abusive husband in their very own bed.

Series 2 follows troubled housewife Juliet after she’s stabbed her abusive husband in their very own bed.

title: Good Behavior
description: Based on the Letty Dobesh books by Blake Crouch, the seductive thriller "Good Behavior" centers on con artist Letty Raines and her inability -- despite good intentions -- to consistently live a clean life. Fresh out of prison, Letty attempts to reunite with her 10-year-old son and keep in regular contact with her parole officer, whose motives for helping her are questionable. But after she overhears a hit man being hired to kill a man's wife, Letty sets out to derail the job and finds herself on a collision course with the killer, entangling herself in a dangerous and seductive relationship.

title: The Masseuse Murders
description: In 2005, between January and June, 5 women are found murdered in 5 luxury hotel rooms across 5 provinces in Thailand. The time gap and the distance between the provinces blur the obvious pattern. No one spots suspects a serial killer until the 4th murder. When The Royal Thai Police realize for the first time that they may have the country's very own Masseuer-strangler on a murderous trail across the country! What ensues is a thrilling cat and mouse chase between the police and the serial killer.

title: Bosch
description: From Michael Connelly’s best-selling novels, comes Harry Bosch -- an LAPD homicide detective with a soft spot for jazz. He’s got more than music on his mind though, the relentless detective pursues the killer of a 13-year-old boy while standing trial on murder charges himself. As the departmental politics heat up, Bosch is set to pursue justice at all costs.

title: The Banker Who Knew Too Much
description: In the monsoons of July, 1983, the body of a young male is discovered with a towelling cord around his neck, in the overgrown plantations of Hong Kong's New Territories. The ID on the dead man is Jalil Ibrahim, a young banker with from Malaysia on a business trip to Hong Kong. As the Police study his correspondence, they begin to suspect that Jalil may have been involved in something sinister.

title: YoYo
description: YOYO is a series about twins, a boy and a girl. They have very different personalities. So, when they’re together – which is most of the time– they can be upbeat or sad, noisy or quiet, they can bicker like other children or laugh out loud, but they have two things in common: extremely vivid imaginations... and the same name, YO!

title: Ushio & Tora
description: Ushio Aotsuki unknowingly releases demonic energy that attracts monsters. The demon Tora, makes him an offer. He will help fight the monsters if Ushio removes the legendary Beast Spear that trapped him in Ushio's basement for 500 years.

title: Sucker Punch - iflix Quizzles
description: Locked away, a young woman named Babydoll retreats to a fantasy world where she is free to go wherever her mind takes her. Determined to fight for real freedom, she finds four women to join together to escape the terrible fate that awaits them. Watch  now what price they will pay for survival!

title: Street Outlaws
description: Street Outlaws is a driver’s seat view into the world of illegal street racing.  Season one takes place in Oklahoma City, which boasts having “America’s fastest street cars.”  From a 1969 Chevy Nova, to an incognito, race-ready Farmtruck, and everything in between, these road warriors “take racing very seriously.”  They are constantly smack talking, betting on races, pulling pranks and crazy redneck antics with their fellow racers. Ultimately, street racing comes first and they’ll endanger their lives, spend their money and risk going to jail, in order to move to the top of their top ten list.

title: Sieu Nhan Than Kiem
description: Gedoshu, thế lực của những sinh vật sống tại dòng sông Sanzu, âm mưu xâm chiếm thế giới loài người. Mười tám thế hệ trước, chúng đã bị các Shinkenger đầu tiên đánh bại. Ngày nay, bọn cầm đầu đã sống lại và đang từng bước thực hiện mưu đồ của mình một lần nữa. Để ngăn chặn chúng, các Shinkenger một lần nữa được tập hợp, với sự lãnh đạo của trưởng tộc thứ mười tám nhà Shiba - ShinkenRed Shiba Takeru, cùng với sự giúp đỡ của bốn kiếm sĩ hộ vệ khác.

title: Gotham
description: There’s never been a story about Gotham like this. Sure, the dark knight was traumatised by his parents’ death as a child and grew up to be the hero Gotham deserves, but that didn’t happen overnight did it? Here’s the Gotham that sees Jim Gordon as a rising detective fighting to keep the city clean from corruption. Jim befriends a young Bruce Wayne as he tackles the murder of his parents and other cases while maneuvering through the dirty politics of Gotham. And where there are vigilantes, there will be villains. Enter stage left: emo royalty, Oswald Cobblepot AKA The Penguin.

title: Mr. Robot
description: Young, anti-social computer programmer Elliot works as a cybersecurity engineer during the day, but at night he is a vigilante hacker. He is recruited by the mysterious leader of an underground group of hackers to join their organization. Elliot's task? Help bring down corporate America, including the company he is paid to protect, which presents him with a moral dilemma. Although he works for a corporation, his personal beliefs make it hard to resist the urge to take down the heads of multinational companies that he believes are running -- and ruining -- the world.

title: Rage Of Bahamut: Genesis
description: The story of a group of unlikely heroes who find themselves caught in the middle of an epic clash between gods and demons, forced to carve their own path in the face of the imminent storm.
synopsis: The story of a group of unlikely heroes who find themselves caught in the middle of an epic clash between gods and demons, forced to carve their own path in the face of the imminent storm.

title: One Punch Man
description: Saitama is a hero who only became a hero for fun. After three years of “special” training, though, he’s become so strong that he’s practically invincible. In fact, he’s too strong—even his mightiest opponents are taken out with a single punch, and it turns out that being devastatingly powerful is actually kind of a bore. With his passion for being a hero lost along with his hair, yet still faced with new enemies every day, how much longer can he keep it going?

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: Kageyama Shigeo (a.k.a. "Mob") is a 8th grader with psychic abilities. He could bend spoons and lift objects with his mind from a young age, but he slowly began to withhold from using his abilities in public due to the negative attention he kept receiving. Now, the only thing he wants is to become friends with a girl in his class, Tsubomi. With his psychic "mentor" (who has no psychic powers), he continues his daily life, attempting to realize his purpose in life.

title: Follow Alana Taiwan
description:
Follow Alana is a series of travel show hosted by Alana Nichols, who was born profoundly deaf but now became a fluent speaking host.  
Each episode, Alana embarks on a journey to explore the stunning scenery, different lifestyle, and unique culture of each destination. 
Alana meets many interesting people along the way and witnesses how they cherish things around them. She also encourages everyone to build a loving and sustainable relationship with the nature and the environment we live in.

title: Borneo From Below
description: A ‘funservation’ series presented by British underwater photographer and dive journalist, Aaron “Bertie” Gekoski. Filmed entirely around the extremely biodiverse island of Borneo, each entertaining and educational episode highlights the unique animals found here and some of the area’s key environmental threats. Throughout Borneo from Below viewers are also provided with tips and techniques to help them improve their photography along the way.

title: Assassination Classroom
description: When a mysterious creature chops the moon down to a permanent crescent, the students of class 3-E of Kunugigaoka Middle School find themselves confronted with an enormous task: assassinate the creature responsible for the disaster before Earth suffers a similar fate. However, the monster, dubbed Koro-sensei (the indestructible teacher), is able to fly at speeds of up to Mach 20, which he demonstrates freely, leaving any attempt to subdue him in his extraterrestrial dust. Furthermore, the misfits of 3-E soon find that the strange, tentacled beast is more than just indomitable—he is the best teacher they have ever had!

title: Spicy Chicken Rendang
description: Spicy Chicken Rendang is a favorite Malaysian dish. The chicken is simmered with the spice paste and coconut milk until there's almost no sauce left. The remaining sauce is caramelized around the chicken along with toasted coconut. This spicy chicken rendang is easily a crowd favorite.

title: Parents React To Don't Stay In School
description: See the reactions of Adults and Parents to the viral music video Don't Stay In School.
synopsis: See the reactions of Adults and Parents to the viral music video Don't Stay In School.

title: Sui Gao Recipe
description: Sui Gao is Chinese comfort food and very, very moreish. Make more than you think you’ll ever need because people often request seconds. And sometimes thirds. Sui Gao (Chinese Dumplings) are delicious fan-shaped dumplings served in broth. They can also be deep fried or pan fried and steamed as pot stickers.

title: Northern Woods
description:
Northern Woods is an entertaining and diverse time trip by the centuries. State-of-the-Art-level is aimed, no costs are avoided: Helicopter, dolly, crane and time-lapse photography - breath-taking shots show our main protagonist in the change of the seasons. The film starts in spring and ends in wintertime. 4 Chapters also tell us about the history of mankind.
Above all, however, our wood is an ecological jewel, a world-renowned! Famous, well-known and loved by tourists, forest economists, environmentalists, historians and intellectuals.

title: Basil
description: A lonely young aristocrat in turn-of the century England struggles to meet the approval of his over-bearing, class-conscious father while trying to please the selfish woman he loves.
synopsis: A lonely young aristocrat in turn-of the century England struggles to meet the approval of his over-bearing, class-conscious father while trying to please the selfish woman he loves.

title: Bar Mha A La Karr Ma Ya Bu
description: Mi Mi want to rich and always scold to her husband for being poor. One day, a woman talks her if she sells her husband, she will give seven hundred million. So will Mi Mi sell her husband for that money?

title: Bal Lo Pyaw Ya Ma Le Very Good Pot
description: A boy falls in love with a stranger girl and he always spy wherever she goes. Luckily, a girl knows with the boy’s mother and visits to his house. Will the boy get her love?
synopsis: A boy falls in love with a stranger girl and he always spy wherever she goes. Luckily, a girl knows with the boy’s mother and visits to his house. Will the boy get her love?

title: Urban Farmers
description: Urban Farmers is a feature documentary film that will profile operating farms and their relationship to the communities of NYC.
synopsis: Urban Farmers is a feature documentary film that will profile operating farms and their relationship to the communities of NYC.

title: Apotheosis Edited
description: Darwin (Cary Mark) and his girlfriend Christine (Marley Frank) get into an angry fight one night. The next day she is found dead in a dumpster. Darwin is accused of the crime. But what really happened? It could be only his shadow knows the truth.
synopsis: Darwin (Cary Mark) and his girlfriend Christine (Marley Frank) get into an angry fight one night. The next day she is found dead in a dumpster. Darwin is accused of the crime. But what really happened? It could be only his shadow knows the truth.

title: Milltown Pride
description: Milltown Pride tells the story of a young man who dreams of playing professional baseball, his rise as a baseball star, his fall from grace, and the redemption he finds through faith and love.
synopsis: Milltown Pride tells the story of a young man who dreams of playing professional baseball, his rise as a baseball star, his fall from grace, and the redemption he finds through faith and love.

title: A Private Affair
description: It's been six months since Rachel Siprien disappeared. At the request of Rachel's mother, private detective Francois takes over the investigation.
synopsis: It's been six months since Rachel Siprien disappeared. At the request of Rachel's mother, private detective Francois takes over the investigation.
actors: Lydia Andrei,Thierry Lhermitte,Marion Cotillard,Samuel Le Bihan

title: 12 Years A Slave
description: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
synopsis: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: Badge Of Betrayal
description: Zoey, a cyber crime specialist doesn't seem to connect with her detective husband Dave anymore, but they try to make it work for their 6-year-old son Timmy. While in the middle of a complicated stalker case, Zoey realizes that those long nights at work were actually an excuse for Dave to be messing around, and Zoey ends up kicking Dave out. She gets sole custody of Timmy until the divorce. At the same time, her cyberstalker case moves further but she has to get involved more personnally to try and catch the culprit. When Zoey's house is set on fire, her colleagues think she has gone too deep into the investigation, but the real tragedy is that her son, Timmy, dies in the fire. When she is accused of negligence and arrested for the murder of Timmy, Zoey realises she has been set up and will fight to prove her innocence, and find out what really happened to Timmy, who might still be alive.

title: Broken Hallelujah
description: Three families bound by love and broken by betrayal, each reach breaking point until a single event brings them together. Can desperateness and frustration turn to hope and compassion? Three loves, three lies, one more chance.
synopsis: Three families bound by love and broken by betrayal, each reach breaking point until a single event brings them together. Can desperateness and frustration turn to hope and compassion? Three loves, three lies, one more chance.

title: Broken Being
description:
Broken Being is an animated anthology series collecting 10 independent stories that take place in the same apocalyptic world populating by humans, clones, and machines.
PREQUEL: Prequel is an introduction to the world of “Broken Being” where our characters reside, before an impending apocalypse annihilates it. In this story, a young man who lost his wife goes on an impossible journey to fnd Paradise, in the hope of reuniting with the love of his life. But the path he took leads him to a devastating revelation that forces him to reevaluate his entire existence and the world around him.

title: Mai Sin Rai Fai Sawat
description: Patthawee’s dad commited a suicide because of Chidchong and that causes many problem to his family. That’s why he wants to revenge on him. However, with ‘good to not forgive, good to not forget’, he ties himself with unsolved knot since he unawarely falls in love with Chidchong’s daughter named Chidchaba, and she’s pregnant with his child. Will the love between them weave the bond? Will he forgive and forget Chidchaba’s dad?

title: No More Tomorrow
description: Samlee (Arun) travels by a train and he meets Danai (Pongpat) whose career is a songwriter. They get along well so Samlee asks Danai to stay with him at the farm where he’s working with. Danai meets Meen (Nataya) who’s a daughter of the farm, he’s falling love with her. But Meen’s dad is not sure that he can take care of his daughter well. That makes him try to prove himself. Everything seems go right and well but Meen’s diagnosed as she’s severely ill. Danai does everything to sustain his family.

title: Niyoti
description: Noboni (Sporshia) along with her boyfriend (Shoumik) and 2 other friends plan a campfire night out, away from the bustling capital. But things start turning ugly as she gradually learns about the true intentions of her companions. Thus, one harrowing incident would completely change the lives of these teenagers forever. This is one of the 'Shohorer Shorts' supervised by Adnan Al Rajeev.
synopsis: Four friends party like animals in the spirits of adventure - love making, boozing, madness and more. But they also face some bitter truths in the process. This is one of the 'Shohorer Shorts' by Adnan Al Rajeev.
actors: Orchita Sporshia,Monira Mithu,Shoumik Ahmed,Ahmed Hasan Sunny,Ronika Karmakar

title: Nisshobdotar Shohor
description: Nisshobdotar Shohor is a story of a young domestic help called Sharmin and her joyful celebration of solitude. Every day Sharmin’s life starts with a cacophony of household chores. But when the family members go out for work, Sharmin finds herself in an empty house with no sound. Then she celebrates her little moment of solitude with the sound of household chores.

title: Night And The City
description: Robert DeNiro and Jessica Lange are the most impossible couple. He's a failed lawyer. She's a common waitress. Together they get in a downward spiral, as they can't seem to deal with there problems. The lawyer just failed winning a case in court against a famous boxing organiser and he wants revenge by catching the organizer on his own territory: boxing.

title: 1500 Steps
description: 1500 Steps is a transforming journey towards self belief and brilliance. A cross between Chariots of Fire and The Karate Kid, this high school drama is set in the beautiful, Sydney, beach suburb of Cronulla. Jonas “Jobe” O’Brien, a homely, sixteen year old boy, lives in a struggling single parent family. His mother dead, his father is an alcoholic,  who was once a champion runner.. Jobe, a misfit and loner, has inherited his father’s athletic ability and love for running. After a fatal mistake at a party, Jobe seeks revenge against the perpetrator, as an emotion and power wells within him that he has never experienced before. A retired ex-Olympian, Harry White, sets about mentoring his athletic ability when by chance he sees Jobe run. It is now up to Harry White to encourage Jobe to dig deep and decide what type of man he wants to become. A touching coming of age story.

title: Stand Strong
description: The Webster Family enjoyed the good life of weekend shopping sprees, nice cars and a beautiful home. Matt Webster was respected by his peers and envied as the man who had it all. But when hard times came, having it all on the outside did not mean there is anything on the inside. Broken relationships, isolation and pain are the result of their misplaced priorities, selfishness and pride. In their chaos the Webster family will soon discover the American dream and pride of ownership does not build character. It took a financial crisis to show Matt that all things work together for good… to those who Stand Strong in Faith.

title: So What!
description: Somsong tries to find a job until he gets to be a teacher in a famous university. He meets a rascal, Duangjai, who doesn't like studying. Duangjai is flirted by a guy from another university while she is hanging out with her friends. She doesn't like him, so she sets a plan with her friends. The story becomes messy when boys wants to revenge until Somsong has to fix it. He tries to compromise the situation. While Somsong is searching for the information in a computer room, Duangjai teases him by shocking him with electricity and it becomes Somsong's power. So, he uses it to help his students.

title: Song Rao
description: Teewa (Witoon Karuna) is a photographer and writer. He is also a butterfly hopping from one woman to another (น้ำผึ้งดวงตา) such as Tuk. He is sweet talker (ปากตรงกับหัวใจเสมอ). It is lust (ความใคร่) before real love (ความรัก). He meets one of his books fan called Rat (Nantana Ngao Krajang) at the party.

title: Song Lo Yee Sib Ha
description: Kanompung (Anusara), Pattamasak's girlfriend, likes reading comic. They always fight. She lives with Tun (Athip), her model friend who pay the rent for her. But then Pattamasak gets sick and found he has severe disease and he has only 3 months left. Everyone, including Kanompung, tries to be good with him until he has doubt. The situation begins to be complicated. Will Pattamasak be recovered?

title: Sid & Aya (Not A Love Story)
description: A high-spirited and hardworking young lady, Aya (Anne Curtis) who works at a 24-hr coffee shop is hired and becomes the confidante of Sid (Dingdong Dantes), a guy with insomnia. Budding romance starts to grow. But later discovers that the guy is about to propose to someone else.

title: Sam Wai Jai Ded
description: Four young women want to become policemen. They face harsh selection inside the police school. One of them is coming from a wealthy family but still wants to be a policeman same as her father. The trainer is aware of this and is helping them though gags during the selection and their first assignments.

title: Saigon I Love You
description: Like a poem of this beautiful city, four love stories happen in Saigon will show you how lovely Saigonese and their Love could be.

title: Until You
description: Adapted from the famous novel by Le Hoang- I’m not your dog ​​- The film revolves around a girl, whose life has experienced many miracles from a pen was given by an old woman in rags. Thanks to the pen, she (accidentally) turned a bandit into a dog whenever she wants. He was an evil bandit, but when turned into a dog, he’s nice and cute. Also, she (accidentally) becomes the girlfriend of her idol, they have had romantic days as in her fantasy, and she even saved his life thanks to the magic of the pen. The movies brings subtle message, that miracles will somehow find us every day. But there’s whether or not a miracle, we can still make this life more beautiful and better by choosing a positive attitude and knows how to love and forgive.

title: Unfinished Sky
description: A reclusive farmer and an illegal refugee fall deeply in love, despite their resistance, recovering their faith in themselves and their trust in humanity.

title: Undava Part 1
description: Melvin and Loveness are in love but Loveness’s parents don’t approve of the relationship since Melvin comes from a humble background. This leads to threats and random attacks on Melvin orchestrated by Loveness’s father. Will they give up or fight for their love?

title: 100 Tula Para Kay Stella
description: Throughout his four years in college, Fidel, a stuttering student, tries to finish 100 poems dedicated to Stella, an aspiring but frustrated rock star, to win her heart.

title: Word Of Love
description: Dr.Kriangkrai is cheated by Pakpong, his wife, but he pretends that he knows nothing and tries to forget about it by drinking alcohol everyday. One day after drinking regularly, he gets beaten up. Luckily, the hobo named Sut helps him in time. Dr.Kriangkrai wants to repay Sut so he hires him as his driver. Pakpong tries to convince him to sell Rai Chomchai but he wants to save it for his kid. Reversely, Sut is a millionaire named Paradon and he makes a promise to Dr.Kriangkrai that Rai Chomchai will definitely belong to his kid. Will Dr.Kriangkrai's family reconcile in the end?

title: Triumph In The Skies VI
description: Phim xoay quanh cuộc sống và tình cảm của những cơ trưởng đẹp trai là Branson (Cổ Thiên Lạc), Sam (Ngô Trấn Vũ) và Jayden (Trương Trí Lâm). Branson là giám đốc điều hành một hãng hàng không nổi tiếng, tình cờ gặp lại Ah Shi (Xa Thi Mạn) sau bao năm xa cách và tình cảm cũ chợt ùa về. Còn Sam bất ngờ nảy sinh chuyện tình một đêm với ngôi sao nhạc Rock TM (Trịnh Tú Văn) để rồi từ đó nhận ra anh không thể thiếu cô trong đời.

title: Vivah Jam Lang
description: Two students shall marry when their studies are finished. The boy is going abroad to finish his studies. A nasty teacher drugs and abuses the fiancee in order to force her to marry him. When he is back, his fiancee is married to the nasty teacher. The marriage is a disaster as it is not based on reciprocal love. In order to forget his marriage failure, the nasty teacher seduces the fiance's sister. This is too much for the former fiance...

title: Vigor
description: After committing suicide, Oregon finds himself returned to Earth in another body with a mission to stop a bitter, self destructive man from the making the same mistake he did.
synopsis: After committing suicide, Oregon finds himself returned to Earth in another body with a mission to stop a bitter, self destructive man from the making the same mistake he did.

title: Til Death Do Us Part (2014)
description: For Sandra Marks, life couldn't be better. She is newly married to Kevin, a successful doctor and they are preparing to start a new life together in the small town of Fredericksburg. But Kevin's overly possessive behaviour towards Sandra begins to raise doubts in her mind. When their next door neighbour is brutally murdered, Sandra suspects Kevin and goes to the police. Forced into a witness protection program, Sandra's life is slowly torn apart as Kevin seems to stalk her at every turn, determined to evade justice. Sandra must confront her fear of the man she once loved, and do everything in her power to survive, if she is to bring him to justice.

title: Thit Sar Saut Nat Ta Mee
description: Mone Ma Ma and Linn Nay are a happily married couple. When Linn Nay suddenly passes away, Mone Ma Ma is left all alone. What she doesn’t know is, Linn Nay had arranged letters and presents to be delivered to her after he dies. Will this gesture help Mone Ma Ma recover from her grief or make it worse?

actors: Sai Sai Kham Leng,Eaindra Kyaw Zin

title: This Time
description: Ava Buhay, 21, who is ever loyal with her childhood best friend, Coby Martinez, 21, hopes that one day their special friendship will turn into a beautiful romance. However, the time they get to see each other is only during summer vacation. Until one summer, Coby needs to go to U.S to help his grandfather, Lolo Melchor, find his long lost love, Ofelia. Hence, this is the last time they’re going to see each other. This long distance “just friends” relationship lasts for years. Because of this, the chance to have a romantic relationship becomes elusive for both of them. After three years, fortunately, they get a chance to see each other again during Ava’s Japan trip. While Ava is up for an art workshop in Japan, Coby and Lolo Melchor are set to search for Ofelia. In this quest of love of Lolo Melchor, could this also be the right time for Coby and Ava to admit what they truly feel for each other?

title: Yung Nak Ruk Sa Leoy
description: At Supanburi, Noina(Jarunee) asks her mom for permission to go to Bangkok because she doesn't want to have a problem with her stepfather. While Lumyai(Prompong), a son of pig farm's owner, accidentally sold the whole farm to a merchant and was chased out and has to go to Bangkok. Lumyai and Noina have been rivals since they were in Supanburi. \Lumyai looks alike Ukkarin, Miss Rarintip's son, so a gang plans to make over him to deceive Miss Rarintip. But can a fool and innocent country man like him deceive the millionaire? Can Noina who accidentally comes into the house reveal the truth?

title: Yout Kha Ma Gyee Ko Chit Tal
description: U Tin Wa is very angry after his daughter fall in love with Moe Nyo. Although he hates him, he pretends to accept Moe Nyo as his son-in-law coz of his daughter. But Moe Nyo always annoy with his father-in-law’s manner. So a lot of conflict between son-in-law and father-in-law.

description: YOU CAN COUNT ON ME is the story of a brother and a sister reuniting years after the loss of their parents sent them on widely divergent paths

title: Yesterday, she cried
description: A young woman is marrying a young man during their studies but the marriage is a failure. The young woman is getting addict with alcohol and cigarettes. She starts to torment her own daughter. Will her meadness lead to kill her own daughter?
synopsis: A young woman is marrying a young man during their studies but the marriage is a failure. The young woman is getting addict with alcohol and cigarettes. She starts to torment her own daughter. Will her meadness lead to kill her own daughter?

title: Tower
description: An off-kilter and slyly funny character study about Derek, a thirty-something loner who tries to keep the world at arm’s length. Derek is a single and career-less man, who lives at home with his parents in Toronto, Canada. He wanders alone at night in search of companionship, and suddenly finds himself in an intimate relationship. Irritated by a raccoon that tears up his garbage, he sets out to catch it. Derek, a 34-year-old man, lives at home with his parents in Toronto. Unlike his married brother who is expecting a baby, Derek is single and without a career, and although he aspires to become a graphic animator, he works part-time at his uncle’s construction company. Late at night, he wanders the streets alone and frequents nightclubs in search of companionship, until he meets Nicole and suddenly finds himself in an intimate relationship with her. When a neighbourhood raccoon becomes a constant nuisance by tearing up his family’s garbage, he sets out to catch it.

title: 4 Things To Expect In 'Time'
description: Time is finite for everyone. Watch now for the four things to expect in Time.

title: The Wrong Girl
description: Sophia is an ideal 17 year old student, who quickly strikes up a friendship with Grace, the new girl in school. But their friendship takes a sinister turn when Grace begins disrupting the lives of Sophia and her family. This soon turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse, as Sophia is forced to uncover Graces past and learn the truth about her before it's too late.

title: The Wrong Bed Naked Pursuit
description: Is it love at first sight or flight as two strangers wake up handcuffed in bed together? Amnesia, blind trust, text messages left as digital breadcrumbs and an undeniable sexy attraction to one another take this couple on a naked pursuit to find answers--answers that turn out to be mysterious and deadly. Based on The Wrong Bed series from Harlequin.

title: The Wall
description: During the location scouting of his latest film, a stubborn filmmaker experiences many things.  He sees reality in the present, reality in the past, dreams, expectations and the mysterious dark side that he tries to hide and run away from it.  Everything comes back and attacks him.

title: The Time Being
description: A young artist (Wes Bentley: The Hunger Games, American Beauty) accepts a series of mysterious assignments from a reclusive millionaire (Frank Langella: Frost/Nixon) hiding a lifetime of family secrets.

title: The Violators
description: Two dysfunctional girls of opposing backgrounds meet and set off on a collision course that will that will leave one of them shattered, the other re-born. The Violators charts a teenage girl's path from battle-hardened cynicism to hope of a better life.

title: The Thief Lady
description: Tinnakorn, a son of Chief Badin who has power. He falls in love with Dao, a beautiful tomboy girl. But Dao doesn't like him. Tinnakorn tries every way uselessly. Dao's father tries to reconcile everything but he is attacked but fortunately there someone helps him. The new district chief assistant knows this incident and tries to solve it. But that makes Tinnakorn has more malice.

description: The Compson family struggles to adjust to the changes in society during the early 20th century in the Deep South.

title: The Perfect Husband
description: In Seconds, Ayla's highschool time will be a mess when, suddenly, Arsen comes to introduce him as her future husband. This event makes her relation with Ando, her boyfriend, in jeopardy. Ayla is mad with her father, Tio, for matchmaking her without her consent. Meanwhile, Arsen won't give up to win Ayla's heart.

title: The Nurse
description: When Cara takes in her estranged father after he suffers a stroke, she also makes room for a private nurse to care for him. Now, with two strangers in her home, she must uncover the truth about her past, her father, and the home-care provider whose attentive dedication may be masking a dark and dangerous secret.

title: The Never Ending Story
description: Natee and Chartchai go to a forbidden land at the north. 5 years ago, Natee had an unforgettable memory with a mountain girl. Both men invite a wildlife merchant to be their companion. The forest is full of danger. Fortunately, they has Hunter Yiam, the local expert hunter, to help them. Can they survive from the unforbidden land?

title: The Mourning Hills
description: Two sisters run away to see the world together. They enter the forest where their father committed suicide and learn to grieve by growing up too fast.
synopsis: Two sisters run away to see the world together. They enter the forest where their father committed suicide and learn to grieve by growing up too fast.

title: The Messenger's Box
description: When high school student Jake Casper finds a small wooden box in the attic of his grandpa's antique store, his life is forever changed, especially when he discovers a secret compartment that appears to contain a nail used during Christ’s crucifixion. Now, the more Jake learns of the power within the box and its purpose, the more obstacles he must overcome to get the box to a stranger before it’s too late. A powerful faith-based film, The Messenger’s Box demonstrates why we should never underestimate the power within our hearts.

title: The Saratov Approach
description: The Saratov Approach is the extraordinary, true story of two American missionaries, and their week-long abduction in Saratov, Russia. On what seemed like any other day during their missionary lives, Travis Tuttle and Andrew Propst are approached by Nikolai to meet a friend. But then the missionaries experience the unimaginable — kidnapped, beaten, and held for ransom for nearly a week — on the other side of the world in Saratov, Russia. While their family, friends and the world pray for their safe return, Tuttle and Propst are tested physically, emotionally and — most of all — spiritually.

title: The Ring (2018)
description: This is a story of a university couple who end up buying a ring that has historic values. The story  has a twist in the end. This is one of the 'Shohorer Shorts' supervised by Adnan Al Rajeev.
synopsis: This is a story of a university couple who end up buying a ring that has historic values. The story  has a twist in the end. This is one of the 'Shohorer Shorts' by Adnan Al Rajeev.
actors: Tawsif Mahbub,Safa Kabir,Nasir Uddin Khan,Harun Rashid,Akter Hossain,Umme Habiba Promi,Kamrul Islam Shuvo,Adnan Khan Rakib

title: The Red House
description: The Red House is an intimate portrait of a cross-cultural married couple Jia and Lee. While they share a great and enduring love, they come from vastly different backgrounds and have contrasting perspectives. The film follows their journey back to Jia's homeland giving a personal account of globalization.

title: The Girl in Love
description: Asawin is fired from his job since his company goes bankrupt. However, he’s still in luck since his wealthy grandfather, Luang Boripat has passed away so all heritage automatically is his. He has to work as one of executive board in his grandfather’s company. In regard to this, everyone around him, from his secretary, ex-girlfriend, his creditor to all the girls in the company, wants to meet him in person and that causes to a messy story. Moreover, he has to deal with another nephew who wants to have his heritage as well. What does he end up in the end?

title: The Entrepreneur
description: In a foggy, nocturnal Turin, 40-something Nicola owns a factory that is on the brink of closing, a victim of the economic crisis that is hitting the entire country hard. But Nicola refuses to give up.
synopsis: In a foggy, nocturnal Turin, 40-something Nicola owns a factory that is on the brink of closing, a victim of the economic crisis that is hitting the entire country hard. But Nicola refuses to give up.
actors: Pier Francesco Favino,Carolina Crescentini,Eduard Gabia,Francesco Scianna

title: The Drifter
description: This story follows a uniquely troubled man who finds himself on a downward spiral induced by painful memories of his dark and distant past. Taking refuge from his long days and nights of driving aimlessly on the highway, he stops in a small town, where he crosses paths with an old acquaintance. This acquaintance becomes dangerously intrigued and determined to discover the skeletons hiding in the drifter’s past.

actors: Christopher Lee Gibson,Bruce Jarman,Amanda Powell,Fred Lasday

title: The Lightkeepers
description: A grumpy sailor (Richard Dreyfuss) and a young stranger (Tom Wisdom) change their negative opinions about women when two move nearby.
synopsis: A grumpy sailor (Richard Dreyfuss) and a young stranger (Tom Wisdom) change their negative opinions about women when two move nearby.

title: The Last Song
description: It deals about their difficulty to find true love and the way society reacts to them. At that time, society was generally quite conservative and katoeys were viewed as abnormality. The public outcry the film raised helped push it under the national spotlight. The film's theme song became a hit. A remake was done by the same director in year 2006.

The public outcry the film raised helped push it under the national spotlight. The film's theme song became a hit. A remake was done by the same director in year 2006.

title: The Last Love
description: Poj (Nopphon) lives with his aunt (Joori) in Spain. Poj’s finace is Piyada (Mayura) who’s the diplomat’s daughter but he’s in love with Natcha (Naowarat) so Poj has to secretly meet her. When Poj’s mom (Pisamai) comes to see him in Spain, she has a chance to meet Natcha without Poj knows this. She asks her to break up with Poj but it doesn’t work. Meanwhile Akaphop (Sorrapong) goes on vacation and that makes Piyada have a plan to match him with Natcha but she doesn’t know that Akaphop have a deep relationship with Poj’s mom. Will Poj have a happy ending?

title: The Heart Mission
description: Being called "Descendants of the sun - Vietnamese version", this is a story about young people living in the border who are willing to sacrifice their own lives for the country.
synopsis: Being called "Descendants of the sun - Vietnamese version", this is a story about young people living in the border who are willing to sacrifice their own lives for the country.

title: The Inhuman
description: Chot (Sorapong Chatree) and his sister Choi (Aranya Namwong) are children of poor farmers. Chot loves Soi, who is the subdistrict headman's daughter. They love each other but Chot cannot have any hope as he is too poor. Chot helps his sister Choi as she was going to be raped by three ruffians that are protected by the local subdistrict headman. Saeng, son of the subdistrict headman, requests a young lady called Bua as a payment for her mother's debt. Bua takes refuge in Chot's father home. Meanwhile Chot is arrested as he hit earlier the three ruffians. It is unfair and the family has no money to pay the bail. The father needs to ask a local Chinese moneylender for 10 000 baht to pay the bail. There are always issues between Saeng and Chot. Saeng would like to kill Chot. One night, Saeng's ruffians rob the 10 000 baht reimbursement and kidnap Bua. The subdistrict headman and village headman are not helpful to poor people. The village headman prevents Chot and other men to look after the ruffians as Chot shot one of the robbers. Bua is then found dead. Choi is very upset as Bua's death is due to the village headman inactivity and his refusal to take responsability as he prefers to help rich people only. As the headman hits her sister, Chot, in full anger, shots him and then needs to flee. Chai is the local Chinese moneylender's son. He is no respect for others. Chai tries to shoot birds in a Buddhist temple despite the abbot's request to stop. Chot, who took refuge in this temple, prevents him to do so as a temple shall remain a peaceful haven. If we accept human sins, what kind of future will Buddhism have?. Pliu, future lawyer, promises to marry Choi. Chot succeeds to get back the 10 000 bath from Saeng. The father refuses the money believing his son is now a brigand.

title: The Dead End
description: Maya wakes up alive after committing suicide and strangely finds herself caught up in surreal circumstances where she meets a man claiming to be dead who takes her on a journey crossing lines between illusions and reality.
synopsis: Maya wakes up alive after committing suicide and strangely finds herself caught up in surreal circumstances where she meets a man claiming to be dead who takes her on a journey crossing lines between illusions and reality.
actors: Saidah Jules,Aditya Om,Zachary Coffin,Narmadeshwar Dubey,Shielly Shukla

title: The Couple
description: Pete is a handsome and wealthy playboy who doesn’t study hard and loves to hang out. Pete has a polite girlfriend whose name is Ple. She is a friend with Top who lives in the same dorm with her. Top’s hometown is a rustic so he has to struggle and work a part-time job to get some money for his tuition fee. After Top meets Ple for the first time, he’s falling in love with her. He tries to take care of her and her heart starts to be unstable. Pete knows that and he’s not pleased with their relationship.

title: The Best of Men
description:
The Best of Men charts one remarkable doctor’s transformation of care for paraplegics. An inspirational doctor arrives at Stoke Mandeville Hospital in 1944 and transforms the lives of his patients and staff. The patients are paralysed soldiers, written off and facing death from neglect, but their big breakthrough comes when Doctor Guttmann introduces sport into their rehabilitation. Guttmann rejects the general view that paralysis is a terminal condition and throws out the old care regime and soon establishes a new regime, getting all his patients to live fulfilling lives, using sport to help patients build physical strength as well as self-respect. 
This heart warming and uplifting true story of the birth of the Paralympic Games, follows Doctor Ludwig Guttmann, an unsung hero, who revolutionised life for paralysed people.

title: The Banquet VI
description: Phim nói về một thời kỳ vô cùng hỗn loạn khi các nước liên tục xảy ra chiến tranh, hơn nữa nội chiến giữa các nước còn đáng sợ hơn khi vua và thần tranh đấu, cha và con sát hại lẫn nhau. Sau khi tiên đế băng hà, người em lên soán ngôi vua cùng với cô vợ trẻ của mình trở thành hoàng hậu. Vị đại thần trong cung lại tìm cách sát hại vua và hoàng hậu, trong khi đó hai vị hoàng tử cũng ngẫu nhiên bị rơi vào cuộc chiến tranh này để bảo vệ cho người thân, cho hoàng tộc.

title: The Bad Cop
description: Tiang (Pisarn) is a policeman in non-commissioned level. He’s too honest so the chief of the police station and his subordinates dislikes him and try to dismiss him from this job. Moreover, Songyos, a rich man, who has power in that area, supports them. However, Tiang can get off all incidents everytime. Inspector Wichaiyuth (Chatchai) observes Songyos’ subordinates’ behaviors.

title: Tanya Maemod Yod Yoong
description: Tanya (Lalita Panyopas) pergi ke Thailand karena ibunya ingin dia mempelajari ilmu sihir tambahan. Namun, karena kecerobohannya, dia bertemu Assawin (Reungrit McIntosh), dan itu merupakan awal dari cinta di antara mereka. Tanya harus menemukan gurunya, tapi ini tak mudah karena Jack dan teman-temannya, para lawan Assawin, dan Pon, kekasih Assawin, menghalanginya untuk melakukan ini.

title: Talui Rong Mor
description: The 3 last year senior medical interns have to perform autopsy a body. But what they see makes them have to run for their lives. That shocks every patients and nurses in the hospital. The hospital director decides to renew their internship by sending Tui to the mortuary, Auan to do the make-up for dead body and another one to work in patient ward.

title: Surat Cinta Untuk Starla
description: Hema memiliki obsesi unik pada alam. Dia senang membuat surat cinta untuk alam menggunakan mesin tua peninggalan sang kakek.  Suatu hari, Hema bertemu dengan Starla, gadis yang berhasil membuatnya jatuh cinta hanya dalam waktu 6 jam. Untuk pertama kalinya dia sadar ada surat cinta yang lebih indah yaitu surat cinta untuk Starla. Di saat keduanya semakin dekat, sifat Starla malah berubah menjadi dingin. Hema mencari tahu apa yang menyebabkan Starla berubah.  Dalam pencariannya, dia malah menemukan kejutan tentang rahasia masa lalu keluarganya.

title: Sugar Babies
description: Away at college, Katie is introduced to a friend's high-class lifestyle, financed by her rich older boyfriend. But Katie soon realizes that having a sugar daddy comes at its own price.
synopsis: Away at college, Katie is introduced to a friend's high-class lifestyle, financed by her rich older boyfriend. But Katie soon realizes that having a sugar daddy comes at its own price.

title: Sai Gon Electric
description: Phim xoay quanh hai cô gái Mai & Kim chung hoàn cảnh đơn côi giữa Sài Gòn. Kim dẫn dắt Mai vào nhóm nhảy Saigon Fresh mà cô đang tham gia tập luyện. Mục đích chính của nhóm Saigon Fresh là vô địch giải hip-hop toàn quốc. Nhưng khi tình yêu xen vào đam mê, hai cô gái phải đưa ra lựa chọn cho tương lai của mình.
synopsis: Ôm ấp ước mơ thành vũ công múa lụa chuyên nghiệp, Mai rời Bạc Liêu lên Sài Gòn để thi vào trường múa nhưng không may thi trượt. Mai đành xin vào làm phụ việc cho một quán ăn và kết thân với Kim, cô bạn cá tính trong nhóm nhảy Hip hop Sai Gon Fresh. Họ quyết tâm đưa nhóm nhảy chiến thắng ở giải Samsung, nhưng vô số trở ngại bắt đầu nảy sinh, nhất là khi Kim gặp rắc rối trong tình yêu và xích mích với trưởng nhóm.

title: Sac Dep Ngan Can
description: Sắc đẹp ngàn cân 2017 được làm lại từ bộ phim điện ảnh cùng tên của Hàn Quốc. Phim là một câu chuyện hài hước và lãng mạn về hai cô gái: Jolie (Phương Trinh Jolie), gợi cảm, quyến rũ nhưng có giọng hát rất dở, Hà My (Minh Hằng) mập ú, xấu xí nhưng có giọng hát trời phú. Hai cô gái ấy đã kết hợp những điểm mạnh của nhau: Jolie ra sân khấu thu hút khán giả bằng vẻ đẹp chết người của mình, còn Hà My đứng sau cánh gà để cất lên những giọng ca ngọt ngào. Vì vẻ ngoài xấu xí, Hà My bị mọi người đối xử rất hững hờ nhưng cô vẫn rất vô tư cho đến khi bị Jolie sỉ nhục ngay trước mặt người mà cô yêu thầm nhớ trộm là Duy Khang (Rocker Nguyễn) Hà My quyết định phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ để trở nên xinh đẹp, và câu chuyện bắt đầu từ đây…

title: Rungpetch
description: Despite being a grown up teen, Rung still likes children games such as riding buffalo, swimming in river, throwing rock with a sling. She is the leader of small group of friends. Her mother hates Bangkok and doesn't want her daughter to study there. But her mother is sick as she has a severe pain in the stomach. She refuses to leave her home. Rung’s father died 10 years ago. The mother finally dies and Rung has to go to Bangkok to a mysterious uncle Phra's home. Her mother always recalled Rung that only uncle Phra helped her when her husband died. Uncle Phra is part of Bangkok rich society. Uncle Phra is married to Orapin. Orapin is much younger than uncle Pha and has a lover, who is bankrupted. Orapin is not very happy to see Rung arriving in their home and doesn’t understand why Phra wants to take care about this orphan. She suspects than Rung is Phra’s daughter from a minor wife in Ayuthaya. Anong is Orapin’s elder sister.
