title: Runaway Romance
description: A reality TV star leaves Hollywood and finds herself in Amish country where she must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one.
synopsis: A reality TV star leaves Hollywood and finds herself in Amish country where she must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one.

title: Run
description: Htet Aung is addicted to gambling and has racked up a lot of debt. His girlfriend, Rosy, the daughter of a successful businessman tries to help him against her father’s wishes.
synopsis: Htet Aung is addicted to gambling and has racked up a lot of debt. His girlfriend, Rosy, the daughter of a successful businessman tries to help him against her father’s wishes.

title: Ruk Keun Ruen
description: Main actor is Sombat Methanee and main actress is Petchara Chaowarat. The movie is lost in Thailand but a sequence of one hour remains to be seen. The remaining sequence shows a high society party with Petchara singing a song. Petchara is then discussing with Somjit Sapsamruey, her mother. Her mother wants her to marry the son of a friend as they are poor. Veteran actors (Prachuap Ruekyamdee and Songthong), a doctor and a young man (ทม วิศวชาติ) are visiting them. Petchara and the young man appreciate each other. Veteran actress Chosri Misommon is playing a domestic helper. Sombat later on arrives. He is welcomed by Sisala Thongtara and Somjit, then also by Metta Roongrat and Petchara. Petchara is not so happy to meet Sombat. Somjit is feeling unwell and ends up at hospital. Certainly Somjit asks Petchara to really consider Sombat as engagement but Petchara loves already another man. Misunderstanding happens between Petchara and Sombat. A fire in the house happens. This is a romantic drama.

The remaining sequence shows a high society party with Petchara singing a song. Petchara is then discussing with Somjit Sapsamruey, her mother. Her mother wants her to marry the son of a friend as they are poor. Veteran actors (Prachuap Ruekyamdee and Songthong), a doctor and a young man (ทม วิศวชาติ) are visiting them. Petchara and the young man appreciate each other. Veteran actress Chosri Misommon is playing a domestic helper. Sombat later on arrives. He is welcomed by Sisala Thongtara and Somjit, then also by Metta Roongrat and Petchara. Petchara is not so happy to meet Sombat. Somjit is feeling unwell and ends up at hospital. Certainly Somjit asks Petchara to really consider Sombat as engagement but Petchara loves already another man. Misunderstanding happens between Petchara and Sombat. A fire in the house happens. This is a romantic drama.

title: Rubberneck
description: A brief fling triggers a horrific course of events when Paul's obsession with a beautiful co-worker spirals out of control in this tense romantic thriller from actor/director/writer Alex Karpovsky ("Girls").
synopsis: A brief fling triggers a horrific course of events when Paul's obsession with a beautiful co-worker spirals out of control in this tense romantic thriller from actor/director/writer Alex Karpovsky ("Girls").

title: Resurrecting McGinns
description: Declan, an author struggling with his unrealized potential, is confronted by renewed grief over his long dead brother Aidan. His wife Anastasie suggests they throw a party on what would've been Aidan's fiftieth birthday. Over the course of dinner, revelations of sexuality, race, abortion, love, life and death unroll at a feverish pace as the night escalates into mayhem.

title: Remember When
description: Freya menginginkan hidup yang baru, yang lebih seru, yang lebih warna-warni. Freya bosan dengan rutinitasnya yang begitu-begitu saja. Hubungannya bersama Moses yang semula seru, kini terasa begitu menjemukan. Freya ingin seperti Gia dan Adrian, pasangan paling populer di sekolah. Walau masing-masing memiliki pasangan, Freya dan Adrian saling menemukan. Hubungan empat remaja ini menjadi berbeda.

title: Reluctant Witness
description: Placed in a witness protection program, ERIN, 30s, believes she has left her Mob ties behind, but when the man she thought she had killed shows up with a new identity and looking for revenge, she must protect her new life and new family.
synopsis: Placed in a witness protection program, ERIN, 30s, believes she has left her Mob ties behind, but when the man she thought she had killed shows up with a new identity and looking for revenge, she must protect her new life and new family.

title: Redemption Ride
description: After testing positive for performance-enhancing drugs, world-class cyclist Colter Reese thought he had ridden his last mile. While trying to hold on to his last remaining treasure, his ill son Jonah, Colter is visited by a mysterious race representative who offers him a chance to ride once more in a unique, long-distance endurance race. Desperate for the prize money that would give his son a life-saving operation, Colter sets out on a thousand mile journey that will change everything, starting with himself.

title: Rak Seum Leuk
description: Gal (Siriam) a university student who has to take care of a girl next door as a part-time job. But the girl's mother runs away and her brother sells her room to get the money and pay his debt. Billy (Billy) a Robin Hood who comes back to Thailand and uses his last sum to buy an apartment but then he found a woman and a girl there. He has to make some deals to live with her unwholeheartedly. The messy begins. They both are different and need private space but has to live together. How will their relationship develop to?

title: Ronda
description: “Ronda” (Patrol) follows the journey of Paloma, a policewoman who patrols the streets of Manila at night. She is looking for her teenage son who has been missing for days. As she searches, she discovers truths about herself and the corrupt system she works in.

title: Romancing In Thin Air VI
description: Bộ phim kể về ngôi sao thiên vương Mike (Cổ Thiên Lạc đóng) và vợ chưa cưới của anh là ngôi sao điện ảnh Viên Viên (Cao Viên Viên đóng) trong buổi hôn lễ thế kỷ, xuất hiện Trương Hàng (Vương Bảo Cường đóng) tới cướp cô dâu. Việc này khiến Mike bị đả kích lớn và trái tim trở nên lạnh nhạt, anh đã lui về ở ẩn tại Shangri-la, ở nơi đó anh đã gặp A Tú (Trịnh Tú Văn đóng), là người mở nhà trọ nơi này, sau đó hai người đã nảy sinh một tình yêu ở nơi cao hơn mực nước biển tới ba nghìn mét.

actors: Cổ Thiên Lạc,Trịnh Tú Văn,Cao Viên Viên

title: Rigodon
description: The American Dream, an immigrant’s nightmare. It is immediately after 9/11 and the US authorities have begun their crackdown on migrants. RIGODON follows the story of three Filipinos – Dante, the intellectual who helps get false documents to illegal immigrants, one of which is Amado the has-been boxer, and Salome, the war-bride yearning for home. Their stories intersect in this harsh crucible of terror-stricken New York City.

title: Professor in Love
description: This is a short love story that moves around the upheaval relationship dynamics of a professor and his student. This movie goes around the impact of relationship on a young girl and what issues trouble her family ?
synopsis: This is a short love story that moves around the upheaval relationship dynamics of a professor and his student. This movie goes around the impact of relationship on a young girl and what issues trouble her family ?

title: Praya Mae Bia
description: A local bad guy wants to force a Thai lady to be her wife. Hopefully a snake is protecting the woman.
synopsis: A local bad guy wants to force a Thai lady to be her wife. Hopefully a snake is protecting the woman.

title: Rak Ni Rao Chong
description: Tone (Sor Asanajinda) is a grandfather of Tom (Ben) and he is bored of Bangkok so he decides to bring his family to live in more peaceful place. But the gas in his car runs out in the middle of nowhere so they have to live there and struggle along. However, after living there for a while, they start to like that area and want to be a landlord since there’s no one owns it. He develops it to be a resort but Chiba (Suprawat), a government officer, tries to stop Tone from doing that. Charlee’s (Mai) family is one of Tone’s supporters. Can he be the landlord in the final?

title: Prakasit Chak Huachai
description: Panom (Pisarn) is a doctor who has an awful medical experience since he can’t save his daughter’s life and because of this his wife runs away from him. He decides to give up his career as a doctor and becomes a farmer in rural province. He lives with his boss in the farm and he can meet Pai, his boss’ daughter who’s about the same age with his daughter. Pai is sick with same disease like his daughter so he determines to become a doctor again and treat Pai’s sickness for deleting his bad memories in the past.

title: Raeng Tien
description: Tiensri (Lalita Panyopas) was disappointed with love so she has a perception that no man is honest to her. However, after she has a car accident since Tiwa (Pongpat Wachirabanjong) crashes a car into her car; her perception about man starts to change again because Tiwa take cares of her very well. The reason behind his actions is Tiwa likes her. Unfortunately, Tiensri learns that Tiwa is her ex-boyfriend’s brother-in-law and that makes Tiwa’s depressed and wants to leave where she lives. How does their love end up? Can Tiwa make Tiensri realize his love?

title: Pyat Ywae A Pyone
description: The Businessman, U Nay Moe who always forget to smile because of his bitter past met a girl from Massage Room called Darli and she could make him to smile. Then U Nay Moe attached her but she suddenly disappears without letting him know. Will U Nay Moe be able to find her again?

actors: Min Maw Khun,Poe Ei Ei Khant

title: Purple Sins
description: It is about of feminist association fighting for women rights. They help women forced to prostitution, women beaten by their drunk husbands, women raped in police jails. They strongly punish the men doing bad acts. Their gaining popularity annoys a local felonious politician. This one is using gunmen to get rid of the association. Can they win?

title: Putot
description:
Putot, a young boy, lives in a squatter colony by the sea. He takes care of his mentally-
ill father and ekes out a living selling mussels. He meets Mayang, a mysterious young
girl with secrets of her own.
synopsis: Putot, a young boy, lives in a squatter colony by the sea. He takes care of his mentally- ill father and ekes out a living selling mussels. He meets Mayang, a mysterious young girl with secrets of her own.

title: Por Pla Lai Mae Pang Pon
description: Mr.Wattasin (Santisuk) whose job is about raising all kinds of animals, wants to rent a room from Wanrawee (Sasimapon), a beautiful daughter of the owner of Real Estate Company. Wanrawee’s mother is so stingy, nagging, fastidious and bossy. She’s forced to get married to her father’s friend’s son and she feels uncomfortable with this. However, that father’s friend’s son becomes the one who wants to rent a room from her.

title: Police Jub Kamoey
description: Sue Chao is a well-known robber after being released from the prison; many gangs want him to join them. But Sue Chao chooses to rob the diamond with his ex-girlfriend. However there’s another plan that Sue doesn’t know. Will Sue Choa get that diamond or he be arrested?

title: Pob Pee Fah
description: A mysterious story about love and revenge of two princesses of Pukum kingdom. Their rage never faded even the time has passed for 100 years. It becomes a horror obsesses many people who related from the past lives. This mysterious movie tells the story about goodness, evil, love and honesty of soul and human.

It becomes a horror obsesses many people who related from the past lives. This mysterious movie tells the story about goodness, evil, love and honesty of soul and human.

title: Ploob Ploe
description: After traveling to the ancient city in Suphanburi, he can communicate with a person who lived the old age via a mirror. That makes people around him thinking that he’s literally crazy. In the end, the person in the mirror can travel to the present day so he can learn how differences of the lives in the past and present day are.

In the end, the person in the mirror can travel to the present day so he can learn how differences of the lives in the past and present day are.

title: Play with fire
description: Sida is a young lady, who is pregnant. Her boyfriend, Thong, dumps her away. Ashamed, she kills herself. She always had issues with her authoritarian grandfather. Her older sister, Sakul, refuses to be dictated by her grandfather. Her husband died already. She has a young three years old boy. She meets Plai, who is a butterfly man. Women are toys for him (ของเล่น). Thong is also a former boyfriend of Sakul and still loves her. Plai is having an affair (เรื่องสนุกสนาน) with Thip, Thong's sister. Thip wants to marry but Plai is not willing. Plai has a high interest in Sakul as she is the first woman not falling to his charm. There are conflicts between Plai and Thong. Sakul needs to use Plai as a false boyfriend in order to stop being followed by Thong. She plays with fire (เล่นกับไฟ) as Plai has still a butterfly reputation. Plai comes to stay in Sakul's home. Thong (บัดซบ!) has raped Sakul before. Sakul's son is in fact his son. Plai's mother doesn't want to hear about Sakul. Twenty years ago it was still an issue for a widowed woman having a child to get a new husband in Thai society. Plai and Sakul announces their wedding to beat back Thong and Thip. The authoritarian grandfather and Thong prepare a nasty plan. Plai goes for a last night with Thip but gets beaten by ruffians commanded by the grandfather. He is almost blind. Sakul brings Plai to Pattaya in order to rest. Thong gets crazy as he doesn't know where Sakul and Plai are hiding. He hits and kills Toei, Sakul's friend, to know where they are. Going back home, Sakul and Plai face Thong. A fight erupts and Thong gets deadly shot.

title: Pissawas Satan
description: A dangerous man and some teammates try to escape during a prison transfer. Only the man can escape but is seriously injured. He finally ends up in a strange house where only a few women are living. Despite his bad past, the women do believe in his redemption and will fight among each other for him.

He finally ends up in a strange house where only a few women are living. Despite his bad past, the women do believe in his redemption and will fight among each other for him.

title: Pink Halo Halo
description: Natoy, like any other child, finds joy and excitement in the simplest of things -- especially in eating halo-halo filled with pink gelatin and red sago. Things change suddenly when, as he is watching television, a news report about the ongoing war in Mindanao shows footage of a badly wounded soldier waiting for rescue. That soldier -- almost bleeding to death, was his father, Corporal Lino Bolante.

That soldier -- almost bleeding to death, was his father, Corporal Lino Bolante.

title: Pinch (2015)
description: A light-fingered teen attempts to rip off a major drug syndicate to pay for his Mother's life saving surgery.
synopsis: A light-fingered teen attempts to rip off a major drug syndicate to pay for his Mother's life saving surgery.

title: Peek Marn
description: Salai is in her thirties. She is pregnant and is about to deliver. Her husband Phu is staying with his mother. His mother is very possessive and doesn't like Salai. She even don't trust her to educate her own baby. She makes life a hardship for everybody up to the point Salai is fed up and asks for divorce. She finally takes a break and goes back to Isan to work as archaeologist at an old Khmer temple (Prasat Hin Khao Phanom Rung). She meets a young man in his twenties called Laiseu, who immediately loves her. He is courting her but she refuses. She comes back to Bangkok. The mother wants to force the divorce. Phu is weak with his mother and always listen to her. Laiseu continues his courtship with Salai but nothing happens between both. One day, Phu sees Salai and Laiseu together so believes she is unfaithful to him. Phu hits Salai very hard and rapes her. She is sent to hospital. Her lawyer friend suggests her to sue her husband. In 1980s Thai society it was unbelievable to sue a husband for such motives as it was considered as private couple issues. Only in 2007, The Thai national assembly has passed into law the nation's first marital rape bill. Salai now carries a gun to protect her-self. Laiseu also asks Phu to leave Salai alone and without troubles. Finally for the sake of their child, they reunite and Phu finally speaks strongly with her mother in order to get his independance.

title: Pedro Calungsod Batang Martir
description: Pedro Calungsod, a young Filipino man, leaves his Visayan native roots to join the Spanish Jesuit priest Father Diego de San Vitores in his mission to the Marianas Islands (Guam) in 1668. The San Diego Mission arrives in the Marianas where the young Pedro, a trained catechist and mission assistant, begins working for Father Diego de San Vitores in baptizing the Chamorro natives, preaching the holy gospel and spreading the good news of salvation through the Christian faith amidst paganism, doubt and disbelief.

actors: Rocco Nacino,Christian Vazquez,Robert Correa,Ryan Eigenmann,Jestoni Alarcon

title: Partee
description: Troy (Kiko Matos), a bothered young man suddenly transforms into a monster that feeds on his flawed beliefs. His high is a bitter sweet melody that drives him even more to deprive himself of sanity. Eric (Felix Roco), facing a misconception of things between him and his friends becomes a victim to his screwed assumptions because of Carla’s (Angela Cortez) plainness and flawed signals. The three friends tangle in a mix-up of situations that the only thing there is to really enjoy is witnessing each other’s life slowly waste away; and that even death when you’re at your highest peak is your only fall.

title: Pan Phyat Mote Soe
description: Village teacher Tun Myat has a lot of admirers, including the chairman’s daughter, Hnin Wai. When her fiance, Aung Din finds out, he goes out of his way to to cause trouble for Tun Myat.
synopsis: Village teacher Tun Myat has a lot of admirers, including the chairman’s daughter, Hnin Wai. When her fiance, Aung Din finds out, he goes out of his way to to cause trouble for Tun Myat.
actors: Nay Myo Aung,Su Myat Noe Oo

title: Out Of Reach
description: Since his heart attack, Matthew has been looking for a greater meaning in life. After what looks like a chance meeting with consultant and life-coach Dianne, Matthew starts to change his ways. Of course, these changes don't go unnoticed by his wife Lynn. However, when she learns that Matthew has given away half of his advertising agency to his new group of friends, Lynn realizes her husband has completely fallen under their powerful spell of influence, and will do whatever they say without questioning any of it. In order to try and bring her husband back to himself, she decides to take Matthew and their daughter Paige on a beach retreat. But when Dianne shows up unannounced, Lynn discovers it will be a real struggle to cut ties with her and save her family before it's too late.

title: Phit Phayabat
description: Thisa and Danai trevel to Northern region. Thisa meets a beautiful Karens whose name is Porje and he’s falling in love with her and wants to get married to her but his mother has engaged him to Chantaeng. That makes Porje living as his minor wife.They try to defame Porje so she has to go back to her tribe. Porje’s dead while giving a birth to Kheyawee (Naiyana). She’s raised by Uncle Sordewee. Danai has a son whose name is Sila (Sombat) and he learns that he’s severely ill so he gives Sila to Thisa. Uncle Sordewee doesn’t want Kheyewee meets Sila since he’s afraid the rehappened history.

That makes Porje living as his minor wife.They try to defame Porje so she has to go back to her tribe. Porje’s dead while giving a birth to Kheyawee (Naiyana). She’s raised by Uncle Sordewee. title: Phan Ma Ba
description: Chuanchua (Ampol) goes to visit his friend at the city near the sea to find the inspiration for hsi new novel. He goes to visit his friend, Otto (Pongpat) who opens a souvenir shop there. Otto opens this shop because he wants to start a new begining and a place to hang out with friends. He addicts to liquor and weed. These characters are based on true story about a friendship of teenage friends who do everything with their impulse that can change their lives forever.

title: Petch 7 Liam
description: At Vietnam's borderline, Suping assigns Thongchai to protect the valuable heptagon diamond while the delivery to Sukit in Thailand. But Thongchai betrays his boss, kills all the companions and steals the diamond. He makes a threat for 20 million from Sukit. Buncha, a night club's owner, hears the news and hires an ex-inspector to investigate in this case. Who will the diamond belong to?

title: Next Stop Murder
description: Molly and Sophie meet by chance on a bus. Molly is a recently married working-class woman who takes the bus to attend law school. Her biggest problem is Heather, her husband Jeff's irresponsible drug-addict ex-wife, who is fighting Molly's attemps to legally adopt Gracie, Jeff's daughter. Sophie is a 26-year-old party girl who had her driver's license revoked and now had to ride the bus to go shopping and attend court appointments. Her biggest problem is her old-moneyed, suddenly strict widower father who is cutting her funds. As their bus encounters continue the two women bond and share their problems. Reading too much into a throwaway comment, Sophie suggests they make each other's problems disappear. When Heather turns up dead, Sophie suddently turns up the heat on Molly to return the favor. But when Molly refuses, incriminating evidence turns up against her...

title: Never Not Love You
description: A young reckless love between a couple, only to be separated by their dreams and choices in life.As changed people having finally achieved what they want in life, they meet again, 5 years later.
synopsis: A young reckless love between a couple, only to be separated by their dreams and choices in life.As changed people having finally achieved what they want in life, they meet again, 5 years later.

title: Nay Tat Yay Tat
description: Judge, U Htun Oak sentences Moe Nyo to be executed. Moe Nyo starts to worry about his son who all inherited his habits. Will this family never know happiness again?
synopsis: Judge, U Htun Oak sentences Moe Nyo to be executed. Moe Nyo starts to worry about his son who all inherited his habits. Will this family never know happiness again?

title: On The Edge
description: Reflecting on his own faith journey that began on a skiing trip to Lake Tahoe, Vince bets his college roommate that he can prove that God exists by taking him on a camping trip with a few friends from church. As they hike and swap stories around the camp fire, the group covers physical and spiritual ground while attempting to tackle the tough questions of life.  Produced and directed by Rick Garside, On the Edge was filmed on location at the spectacular Yosemite and Sequoia National Parks. Featuring the music of BarlowGirl, Bib Carlisle, Debby Boone, and Benny Hester, this adventure will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat.

title: One Last Dance
description: When the world-renowned New York Dance Company loses its brilliant artistic director, Alex McGrath to a massive stroke,not only did Dance Motive lose its founder and creative genius, but also with no one ready to step in and take his place it means the end of Dance Motive. Alex left behing a great legacy of dance including a legendary dance piece created 7 years earlier but never performed. The company now sees a chance to hold itself together by premiering this piece. However in order to pull this off they need the three original dancers who walked away during the creation of this dance and never looked back.

title: Offline
description: Thirteen years ago, Aiden Ashey's world was torn apart after an online stalker followed her into the real world, broke into her home and murdered her parents. The stalker espcaped the scene without Aiden ever seeing his face, but leaving her with the trauma of this night of terror and the knowledge that an unknown man is out there, possibly watching her every move. Having stayed offlined since, Aiden lives her life secluded, goes to therapy and never allows herself to be in a relationship. Finally convinced to have her own art show, she comes to the realization that even offline, her stalker never stopped keeping tabs on her. Behind which of the familiar faces does the stalker hide? Is it James, the relentless first on site detective? Paul, her charming encounter? Jack, the cyber-security specialist? Winton, her art dealer?

title: Odo Pa Part 1
description: john, a hard working young man unempolyed but eventually get to work as a taxi driver. john's boss's doughter Rose falls in love with him. however the sister of Rose (Julliet) is not pleased with the relationship because of John's job. Rose get affluent sutirs nut truns them down because of the love she has for Jon. One of the suitors and his gangs harass John constantly so he gives up on Rose. Will John's love for Rose, stand the test of time?

synopsis: Bộ phim xoay quanh câu chuyện của chàng kỹ sư công nghệ thông tin Dũng quyết định dành tất cả ngày phép trong năm về thăm và tìm hiểu về quê hương, con người Việt Nam, nhưng vô tình anh đã bạn xấu dụ dỗ, lôi kéo và đưa vào một thế giới khác, một thế giới của tiệc tùng và phụ nữ.

title: Nay Nae Pwint Dae Ku Mu Dra
description: Nyo Pyar’s father is very overprotective and doesn’t want her to date just anyone. Nyo Pyar falls in love with Sat Wine and her father finds out about it. Will he be willing to give Sat Wine a chance?

title: Namets!
description: Jacko Teves owns Puccini's, an Italian restaurant in Bacolod City. When a monstrous cock fighting debt sets him at odds with Boss Dolpo, he offers his restaurant up as payment. Boss Dolpo brings in Cassie Labayen as a consultant to renovate the restaurant. Much to Jacko's dismay, Cassie decides to offer Negrense cuisine instead of Italian. The pair then set off across the province re-discovering the unique aspects of Negrense food.

description: Bộ phim xoay quanh một ngôi làng nổi tiếng về câu cá hố nhưng giờ chỉ còn là vỏ bọc bên ngoài. Mẻ cá kiếm được giảm đi nhiều và người dân lần lượt rời đi. Đàn ông độc thân duy nhất còn lại ở làng là Joon Sub ( Lee Jong Hyuk ). Đồng thời, ba phụ nữ đơn thân, Jae Hwa ( Hwang Jung Eum ), Mi Ja ( Choi Yeo Jin ) và Yoo Ja ( Park Jin Joo ) tiến hành chiến tranh tâm lý Joon Sub. Với những tình huống dở khóc dở cười....

description: Following the murder of a high profile news anchorwoman, her ex-husbands murder trial is thrust into the media spotlight in this heart pounding tale of death, divorce and deception.

title: Mung Korn Lai Thai
description: Somkuan, a big business owner in Thailand, is abducted by a gang while he is traveling to Taiwan. The gang asks for 30 million and the crest necklace. Sutasinee, Somkuan's daughter, hires Chatree who is the martial arts school owner to help her father. Meanwhile, Umnuay who is Somkuan's assistant hires Win the assassin to spy on both Chartree and the gang. This story comes with an unpredictable twist behind.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Cruz
description: The story of Raffy and Gela who find themselves taking off for Palawan to escape the not so great realities of their current lives and catch up on their respective me-time. But as fate would have it, they find themselves meeting and enjoying each other's company.

title: Mr. Blue Sky
description: Mr. Blue Sky is a touching coming-of-age romance that explorers an unconventional love triangle, centered around Andrea, who was born with Down Syndrome. The three childhood friends, who all grew up struggling with who they are inside and how society perceives them, learn that with the support and encouragement of friends and family, they too can realize their dreams if they put their minds to it.  This touching story will warm your heart and remind you that the skies remain blue, even behind the clouds of life.

title: Mone Kar Yan Ma Nyee
description: A young photographer, Zaw Nhaung became friend with Myat Thura, who had no experience for work and she tried to start a job as a secretary at a company owned by Zaw Nhaung's mother and when his mother forced Zaw Nhaung to marry Myat Thura, what will their decision be?

title: Moe Nae Tinn Dae Nay Ma Win Nya Nay
description: Moe Yanant falls in love with Nay Ma Win, a difficult man with many secrets. She goes the extra mile for him but her efforts go unseen as he refuses her. Feeling defeated, Moe Yanant plans to marry someone else.

title: Missing Daughter
description: Despite her husband's past affairs, Kara and Ben live a quiet and happy life with their 3-year old adopted daughter Riley, until Alyssa, Ben's past mistress, is hired by Kara as Riley's nanny. Unaware of Alyssa's connection to Ben, Kara is distraught by Alyssa's actions as the nanny oversteps her boundaries more and more everyday. Will Alyssa succeed in stealing Kara's family?

title: Missed Call
description: Wa Than, a young doctor decides to help and treat Ye Ye who’s a rascal and pickpocket. Wa Than’s fiance, La Minn very obviously dislikes Ye Ye and does not approve of their friendship.

title: 874 Miles
description: Thirty-something Londoner, Will Parker’s average life is shattered when he receives a terminal diagnosis. With little time remaining, Will abandons everything to embark on a voyage of self-discovery.
synopsis: Thirty-something Londoner, Will Parker’s average life is shattered when he receives a terminal diagnosis. With little time remaining, Will abandons everything to embark on a voyage of self-discovery.

title: Mia Sang Tang Praisanee
description: Boonkerd (Sorrapong Chatree) who is an officer at Nam Nao Park would like to have a wife so he sends a letter to Thairath newspaper and hopes the dating column can promote him on it. And it looks like the heaven knows what he wants because a pretty woman from Bangkok whose name is Namyen (Supansa Neungphirom) comes to live in the park. However, it seems that she escapes something from there. Moreover, Lampu (Umpha), an up-country woman, tries to bully her and wants her to go back to Bangkok.

title: Me And You VS The World
description: Jeremy yang bosan dengan pekerjaan dan rutinitasnya berubah ketika bertemu dengan Sera yang juga sedang mencari jati dirinya. Jeremy berontak dari kantornya dan mengajukan konsep “Menaklukkan Dunia”. Berdua, dua insan manusia yang tengah jenuh dengan rutinitasnya, berpetualang bersama untuk menaklukan dunia.

title: Maung Shae Ko Tae Tae Shout Mal
description: Pwa Gyi and Bwae Hnin met at church and they start falling in love with each other. Bwae Hnin’s parents are opposed to the match so the couple runs away together. As romantic as that sounds, Pwa Gyi doesn’t earn enough to take care of them both so Bwae Hnin has to find a job. When Bwae Hnin’s boss seems interested in her, Pwa Gyi starts feeling jealous and insecure. Maybe this wasn’t a good idea after all?

title: Maskara
description: The Philippines is being geared up to be interconnected through a system called One Wired Nation (OWN) and eventually have faster and easier access to information across the country.  But this is not what it seems. MASKARA follows the story of Pia Gorospe as she tries to uncover the truth behind the death of Willie Miranda, the PrimeCon Executive and the Author of the project OWN. As she slowly puts bits and pieces of the clues left by Willie to her before he was murdered, Pia gets to meet Bert Javelo, PrimeCon’s suave marketing executive and Alex Mayo, a military intelligence operative. One of them is hiding the truth and pretends to be in love with her. The other one is defending the truth and would be willing to die for her. Their quest for truth takes them all the way to Marinduque as the quaint town which celebrates the Moriones tradition.

title: Mantan Manten
description: As a well-known investment manager, Yasnina has everything. Glamorous life, wealth, and Surya, a fiance who loves her dearly. But the peacefulness of Yasnina's life must end when she is betrayed by Iskandar in a case in her company. In a moment Yasnina's treasure run out of nothing. Not only that, the plan of his marriage to Surya is also at the dangerous tipping point. Ardy, Yasnina's assistant, reminds her that she still has a villa in Tawangmangu which is not confiscated because she has not changed the name's owner. The villa has become Yasnina's only hope to rise again. But to take back the villa, Yasnina had to become an assistant to a traditional bride shaman named Marjanti.

title: Mansyon
description: A housemaid and a gardener take care of a large house while its owners are away. Days of tedium go by until a small accident sparks a series of discoveries.
synopsis: A housemaid and a gardener take care of a large house while its owners are away. Days of tedium go by until a small accident sparks a series of discoveries.

title: Menanti Hari Esok
description: A successful career and respect from those around you, doesn’t necessarily translate to success raising a family. This film touches upon how Talib, when faced with cancer, realises that despite successfully managing a school, he has failed to raise his own children  in a similar manner.  Realising that the failure was a result of the lack of good moral values and fundamentals of religion, will Talib be able to rectify his actions before succumbing to his fate? Find out… as you watch the digitally remastered version of  this classic “Menanti Hair Esok” in HD (high-definition).

title: Memories Of The Wind
description: Memories of the Wind recounts dissident Armenian poet Aram’s journey to the border of Soviet Georgia after having to flee Turkey during the last days of World War II. The film also provides clues concerning Turkey’s past and life in exile.

title: Meet Me in St. Gallen
description: An aspiring painter and a frustrated musician meet and become instant friends, but decide to end and leave everything as is, just like complete strangers. What will happen if they meet again as two completely different people?
synopsis: An aspiring painter and a frustrated musician meet and become instant friends, but decide to end and leave everything as is, just like complete strangers. What will happen if they meet again as two completely different people?

title: Ma Chit Tat Thu Chin
description: အၾကင္နာနဲ႔ ခေယာင္းတို႔ဟာ အခ်စ္ဆံုးသူငယ္ခ်င္းေတြျဖစ္ၾကပါတယ္။ ခေယာင္းတို႔မိသားစုက ေငြေရးေၾကးေရးမျပည့္စံုတဲ့အတြက္ အၿမဲတမ္း အၾကင္နာက ကူညီေပးခဲ့ပါတယ္။ အၾကင္နာက ခ်စ္သူရွိေနရဲ႕သားနဲ႔ ေနသီဟဆိုတဲ့ေကာင္ေလးနဲ႔ ထပ္တြဲပါတယ္။ ခေယာင္းက အၾကင္နာကိုခင္တဲ့အတြက္ အၾကင္နာေျပာသမွ်အားလံုးကို ကူညီေပးရွာပါတယ္။ ဒါေပမယ့္ အၾကင္နာရဲ႕လက္ရွိရည္းစားက အေၾကာင္းစံုသိသြားတဲ့အခါမွာေတာ့ အၾကင္နာကို ကားတင္ေျပးပါေတာ့တယ္။ တစ္ဖက္မွာလည္း ေနသီဟ ကအၾကင္နာနဲ႔လက္ထက္ဖို႔လူႀကီးေတြကိုေျပာၿပီးသြားပါၿပီ။ သိကၡာက်မွာဆိုးတဲ့အတြက္ အၾကင္နာရဲ႕ေနရာမွာ ခေယာင္းကိုအစားဝင္ၿပီး ဟန္ေဆာင္လက္ထက္ေပးဖို႔ေတာင္းဆိုလိ္ုက္ပါတယ္။ ကဲ ဘယ္လိုေတြဆက္ျဖစ္ၾကမွာပါလိမ့္။
synopsis: A Kyin Nar and Kha Yaung are the best friends and A Kyin Nar helps Kha Yaung’s family whatever they need. A Kyin Nar is cheating with the guy, Nay Thiha. Kha Yaung always has to assit A Kyin Nar for that. But when A Kyin Nar’s boyfriend realized about that, he forces her to marry him. On the other hand, Nay Thiha had already announced his family to marry A Kyin Nar. So, Kha Yaung had to pretend the role of A Kyin Nar and is asked to marry him.

title: Lu Yine
description: Possessive Zaw Htet easily gets jealous and can’t stand other guys talking to his wife. Because of this, one day he accidentally kills her out of anger. Later he meets Tharaphi, a girl on holiday with her boyfriend. She bears an eerie resemblance to his late wife.

title: Lu Soe Lay Myarr
description: Ye Thway starts the Bad Boys gang at school and stirs up trouble for everyone else. Kabyar, who’s his classmate, absolutely despises Ye Thway because she thinks that he caused her brother’s death.

title: Mah
description: A group of students has a trip to go to a jungle. They’ve found a weird egg in the cave and they decide to bring it back home. That makes the monster who is the egg’s owner chasing after them and demanding for getting that egg back. Unfortunately, the monster can capture a girl from the group so they have to find the way get her back.

title: Magkapatid
description:
Liza was married at an early age, with a jobless husband, Mike, their family survives through the support of what her sister gives her. Cita, Liza's sister, is a well renowned doctor who has everything, so giving support to her sister and her family is nothing for her, she even bought them a house across theirs so that their families could spend the years with each other.
Liza and Mike has two kids, Marco and Miguel while Cita and her husband Bobby has one named Justin. Tragedy struck when Cita's only son Justin and Liza's son Marco drowned on a trip. Cita blamed Liza for the accident because she failed to keep her word of taking care of her son. Not knowing how to deal with the accident, Cita's life slowly fell apart; her husband left her and her relationship with her sister only worsened.
Liza, with a broken relationship with their family supporter, struggles on how to keep her family alive. Eventually her son got sick and in order to keep her son alive, she agreed with the deal to let her sister keep his son in exchange for the one Cita lost.
In the end, the sisters reconciled and resolved the past that pushed them apart of each other.

title: Magic Beyond Words
description: Growing up in working class England, Rowling struggled between dreams of wanting to be an author and the harsh reality of finding a career that would keep her out of poverty. A story that would change the face of literature. An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

title: Mae Nak 30
description: This version of Mae Nak, Poh Mak just came back from Middle East and this role is played by Note Chernyim who’s the famous gagman in Thailand. Moreover, there’re other gagmen playing along him. It can guarantee that it’ll be funny for sure.

title: Madventure
description: A group of youths start their journey to Bandarban. They don't know each other and each of them are very different people. But in this trip, a lot of unexpected things happen - adventure, love, jealousy, danger, happiness, sadness and a beautiful revelation in the end.

title: Lun Aol La Weng
description: The underdog 5-member-band lives in the same house and Bank (Yuranan) is one of them. One day, Bank gets a job offer as a model but he has to wear a clown outfit and that makes him upset so he complains to Prem (Phen Phisoot), the owner of the event. At the same time Bank’s friends quarrel with the boastful man (Sumo Tui) who’s a son of a rich man. They place a bet of whoever can win Prem’s heart, will get all money. Bank has to be a presentative of the gang but will Prem accept his heart since they had unpleasant impression to each other?

title: Lu Mite Yaung Yan Shi Thi
description: Ye Tay Za falls in love with Moe Thet Hnin. When Moe Thet Hnin finds out that Ye Tay Za has committed a murder before, she refuses to love him and keeps her distance.

description: This funny movie is about Teng Mo, the daughter of a district officer.

title: Luksao Gumnan 2
description: This funny movie is the second opus about the daughter of a district officer. Teng Mo has just married when another woman claims that she is already the wife of her husband! Funny moments happen until Teng Mo and her husband fall in love again.

title: Luk Lhong
description: Phiphat (Pairoj) had gotten married to a prosperous woman (Piathip) but he’s framed by his college so he decides to resign. After that, she forced him to leave the house. He decides to brought their daughter came along with him and that made his wife grieved so she adopted Nat (Jakree) to be her son. Nat crahes the car into Kaew. He takes care of her at the hospital and the pity develops to be the love. However, Phiphat who is Kaew’s dad acknowledges this; he tries to block the love between them since he doesn't want to face the end like the past without knowing that Nat’s mom is his ex-wife.

title: Lucky Love
description: 4 close friends named Ohm, Tueng, Wan and Toom live in the same house and each one hits on the girl in a funny way. Moreover, they have to conquer the girls’ families’ hearts as well. Thus, they create a situation to impress them.

title: Love You To The Stars And Back
description: A young woman forms a bond with a terminally ill young man while on a road trip.

title: Love You To Death
description:
Talented attorney Yasmine Winter freezes in court, and her mistake allows a murderer go free. Her boss orders her to take a sabbatical and Yasmine returns to her hometown. Officially, she is there spend some time with her daughter Paige and her sister Laura. But secretly, Yasmine plans to use the time away to rebuild the case she just lost.
However nothing goes as planned and Yasmine’s vacation quickly descends into the fight of her life when the man she let free shows up and vows to kill her and her daughter.

title: Lottery
description: Chief Dee is a village man who like gambling with buying lottery. Then, he gets luck. He win the first reward, 3 millions baht, but he doesn't have enough money to go to the lottery office. He borrows money from a rich man. While he is on the traind with his daughter (Piyamas), he accidentally tells Tid (Sorrapong), the cheater. Tid tries to get close to him to get the reward of the lottery.

description: A sad ending will be happened when 3 person has their own suspecting.

title: Lost In His Glory Part 1
description: Abena is a young woman full of youthful exuberance; Living life lavishly and flirting with men. She introduces her sister (Afia)to one of the Drug Lords, he falls in love with her and impregnates her. Abena lures her sister to terminate the pregnancy and her sister loses her life and that of the baby's. their mother later discovers Abena is behind her little sister's death.Will their relationship turn sour?

title: Look For A Star VI
description: Bộ phim là một câu chuyện cổ tích lãng mạn trong thế giới hiện đại, kể về cuộc gặp gỡ định mệnh giữa một tỷ phú giàu có nhưng gặp nhiều bất hạnh trong hôn nhân và một cô gái hành nghề phát bài kiêm vũ công tại một sòng bạc ở Macau. Những thành công trong cuộc sống không giúp Sam níu kéo những người phụ nữ anh yêu, và đó là nỗi đau khổ lớn nhất của anh. Sam luôn tìm mọi cách để lấy lòng Milan, thậm chí là biểu diễn những trò ảo thuật trẻ con để tìm cách tặng nàng chuỗi hạt quý giá tượng trưng cho tình yêu chân thật và lãng mạn của mình. Hai người bắt đầu yêu nhau nhưng vô tình phải đối mặt với rất nhiều thử thách. Sam đã mang Milan từ vị trí thấp bé của thế giới đỏ đen ồn ào lên một địa vị rực rỡ trong xã hội, giống như chuyện cô bé Lọ Lem của ngày nay. Nhưng chính bản tính hay nghi ngờ của Sam một lần nữa ngăn anh chạm đến hạnh phúc, trong khi Milan yêu Sam thật lòng thì Sam lại cho rằng cô chỉ thích tiền của anh...

title: Long-Distance Princess
description: Lisa, a high school sophomore, has been hiding her hopeless crush on Todd, the irresistibly likable junior in her art class. Her life starts to unravel when he asks her to help him get to know the beautiful Ellie, her longtime friend living in England. All the while Cindy, Todd's ruthless ex, resorts to sinister schemes to stop Lisa and Ellie, so she can win him back, and Todd's image-conscious friends try to discourage him from befriending the ordinary-looking Lisa.

title: Love In The Buff VI
description: Bộ phim Xuân Kiều Và Chí Minh xoay quanh câu chuyện tình yêu của Chí Minh và Xuân Kiều. Trong phim này, sau một thời gian chung sống như vợ chồng, giữa hai người đã phát sinh một số mâu thuẫn, rồi cả hai chia tay và đi tìm cho mình cuộc sống mới. Mỗi người đều tự tìm cho mình một con đường mới, một đối tượng mới. Nhưng họ vẫn không hài lòng với hiện tại, họ bắt đầu thấy hối hận về quyết định của mình. Liệu con đường mới, đối tượng mới này có thật sự làm cho họ cảm thấy yên ổn, có thể chung sống lâu dài?

title: Love Come Down
description: Two brothers in their early 20s, one black, one white, each the other's keeper since their family was torn apart by a decade old tragedy.
synopsis: Two brothers in their early 20s, one black, one white, each the other's keeper since their family was torn apart by a decade old tragedy.

title: Love By Chance
description: Two people from two different world come together to hold each other leaving their past behind. Barsha and Gaurav are married but not each other. Their office romance soon develops into an intimate affair leading them to think about their marriages.
synopsis: Two people from two different world come together to hold each other leaving their past behind. Barsha and Gaurav are married but not each other. Their office romance soon develops into an intimate affair leading them to think about their marriages.

title: Lat Phwae Chin Thee Khan Par
description: Khit Thit always has trouble with girls because his friend always interferes. When he meets May Oo, he tells her about his friend. Will she believe him?
synopsis: Khit Thit always has trouble with girls because his friend always interferes. When he meets May Oo, he tells her about his friend. Will she believe him?

title: Laruang Lalake
description: “Laruang Lalake” is a realist film that portrays the workers within the gay film industry and their personal stories – from the naughty to the gritty, from the horny to the hopeful. Created by Joselito Altarejos with the script from Lex Bonife, the film weaves the short journey of an ambitious probinsiyano actor, Samuel (Arjay Carreon), an idealistic film staff (Mark Fabillar) who is secretly in love with an actor and a filmmaker in the brink of bankruptcy (Richard Quan). The film also features the daring Marco Morales, as a come-back actor willing to do everything to steal a name for himself.

title: Lang Rid Pid Sa Wad
description: Naris is an enthusiastic creative staff. He goes traveling with his family and meets Jenjira, the beautiful girl but they can't develop thier relationship since Naris has already gotten married. They meet again when Jenjira comes to cast on an advertizement and he chooses her as a model for that ads. At the same time, his wife and kid goes to the rural province so he has more chances to develop his relationship with Jenjira. Naris falls in love with her deeply. Between the passionate love and his family, which one does him choose?

title: Locked Away
description: When high school senior Taylin and her boyfriend Kevin tell Taylin's mother Sasha they're pregnant, Sasha wants Taylin to give the baby up for adoption. Confused and frustrated, Taylin decides to seek the advice of pregnancy counselor Chloe. What Taylin doesn't know is that Chloe has wanted a baby for quite tome time and, unable to have one of her own, is willing to do the unthinkable to take the one Taylin is carrying.

title: Living With The Dead
description: Max McLean is eighteen years old and can't get out of bed. Since her boyfriend Adam killed himself over a year ago, Max has been using sex, drugs, and alcohol to ignore the pain until one day she wakes up in a hospital, haven taken a nearly lethal dose of sleeping pills. While being haunted by visions of Adam, Max runs away from home and ventures into the forest with a bizarre but curious boy named Ish and tries to answer the questions about her past while figuring out what to do with her future.

title: Lives Of Girls & Women
description: Set in 1940's rural Southern Ontario, Canada, LIVES OF GIRLS AND WOMEN is the story of Del Jordan, a brilliant young woman whose mother's fierce ambition is to give her daughter the best education possible, thereby liberating her from the constraints of small town life and giving her control of her own destiny.
synopsis: Set in 1940's rural Southern Ontario, Canada, LIVES OF GIRLS AND WOMEN is the story of Del Jordan, a brilliant young woman whose mother's fierce ambition is to give her daughter the best education possible, thereby liberating her from the constraints of small town life and giving her control of her own destiny.

title: Ligaw Liham
description: Sometime in the 70’s, in a small town in Negros, the post office simply stops its operations. No one knew about this except for the postman and his caretaker. When Nor, the town simpleton, finds out about this secret, he finds an opportunity to sway to the dance of love when he assumes the identity of another man. Nor reads the letters hidden in an old warehouse and takes over the pen of Karen’s husband who was working in Saigon. Soon after, a correspondence between Nor and Karen takes place. And Nor finds himself truly falling in love.

title: Liam dan Laila
description: Terinspirasi oleh kisah nyata tentang kisah cinta dua insan beda negara, budaya dan agama. Laila, gadis Minang berusia 31 tahun, terhubung dengan dunia lewat layar laptopnya. Suatu hari, dia terlibat percakapan dengan Liam, pemuda asal Rouen, kota kecil di Prancis. Percakapan ini membawa Liam terbang ke Minang untuk menemui Laila. Kedatangan pemuda asing di kampung halaman Laila menjadi awal dari segala konflik yang akan dihadapi keduanya.

title: Lamaran
description: Tiar Siregar, pengacara muda ambisius, karirnya meroket saat ia berhasil membela Arif Rupawan, bos mafia yang terlibat kasus korupsi. Popularitasnya menjadikan Tiar sasaran ancaman pembunuhan. Khawatir Tiar membocorkan semua kebusukannya, Arif memata-matainya dengan cara menyewa Aan, resepsionis polos di kantor Tiar, untuk menjadi pacar bohongan Tiar. Tak disangka, Aan berhasil mengambil hati Tiar dengan keluguannya. Masalah muncul saat keluarga Tiar yang berasal dari Batak dan keluarga Aan yang berasal dari Sunda menentang hubungan ini. Akankah hubungan ini lanjut atau terhenti sampai di acara lamaran?

title: Lakad Ni Sammy
description: Sammy, 9 years old, embraces one day’s adventures with his father who makes most of the day hustling money. Father and son forge a deeper more meaningful bond when an encounter forces them to face the truth.
synopsis: Sammy, 9 years old, embraces one day’s adventures with his father who makes most of the day hustling money. Father and son forge a deeper more meaningful bond when an encounter forces them to face the truth.

title: Lady Chef
description: Kae(Monrudee), an orphan university student who doesn't have enough money to pay for lunch and is bullied by her classmates. She fights with them and was dismissal. She goes to work as an chef assistant at Mam's house. Mos(Toon), his father has a new girlfriend but he doesn't like her. He likes feeding pigeons but no one likes it and forces hime to sell them. Kae has to cook pigeon for her foreigner boss. They accidentally meet. Mos doesn't want to sell the pigeon to her and scolds her. Kae is very angry. Mos tries to reconcile and tells her that he is sorry. How will this story end?

title: Lain Sin
description: The group of Zaw Naung and the group of Pan Nu are quarrelling about who are more intelligent in boy and girl. When their debate is more aggravated, they decide to make a bets. So who will win?

title: Kyoe Tann
description: It's all about the fishermen’s lives and difficulties, their living styles and relationship with neighbours and how they deal when they encounter for an argument.

title: Ku'te
description: Filmmaker Ronaldo Bertubin chose Marielle Therese as the lead actress of his independent film "Ku'te," which tells the story of a young man's journey with his sister who has down syndrome.
synopsis: Filmmaker Ronaldo Bertubin chose Marielle Therese as the lead actress of his independent film "Ku'te," which tells the story of a young man's journey with his sister who has down syndrome.

title: Kusina
description: Kusina is the silent witness to the life and love of Juanita. It is her sanctuary, the place where she creates dishes for her family, her friends, even enemies and strangers. Through cooking, she gets to know the people around her, and in return, reveal herself to them.
synopsis: Kusina is the silent witness to the life and love of Juanita. It is her sanctuary, the place where she creates dishes for her family, her friends, even enemies and strangers. Through cooking, she gets to know the people around her, and in return, reveal herself to them.

title: Kurap
description: Ambet (Sherwin Ordoñez) is a small-time pickpocket lurking in the busy streets of Manila. Together with his gang of young criminals, he steals anything he can. Ambet's only family is his sister Luchie (Ashley Rhein Arca). She is afflicted with glaucoma, a disease which causes slow blindness of the eye. Ambet's illegal income is not enough to sustain the two of them and treat Luchie's illness. Then Marlon (Jojit Lorenzo) enters the picture. He is a cunning cameraman always chasing for video material on petty street crimes, prostitution, and prohibited drugs. As Luchie's eye condition aggravates, Ambet agrees to work for Marlon as an "undercover agent".

title: Korat girl
description: A story of a girl from Korat who has to fight with the local mafia to protect the justice and brings her village back to peace.
synopsis: A story of a girl from Korat who has to fight with the local mafia to protect the justice and brings her village back to peace.

title: 5 Kom
description: Sia Olarn (Somjin), the mafia who’s powerful and can get rid of everyone who goes against him. One of his enemies is Chief Piyanuch (Piyamas). She volunteers to arrest Olarn and to help her in this case, she compiles the skillful fighters whose alias is 5 demons of Vietnam – Somdej Rakangthong (Sorrapong), Suthep Suandok (Nopphon), Champar Cokesoongnern, Don Pradoodong (Nirut) and Diao Pattanee (Pairoj) for managing this case and avenge her dad’s death.

title: Ko Ko Ma Ngo Par Nae
description: Tay Than is a matriculation student. She’s being taught by a young doctor and they become attached to each other. Surprisingly, her parents approve. But why?

title: Khoo Torrahod
description: Ithipon (Sorapong Chatree) is a police inspector. He doesn't have a car as he refuses any corrupting money from the mafia. Yot (Krung Srivilai) is another policeman, who has a hot temper and uses easily guns to stop robbers. In a single day, he shot four robbers. It makes big headlines in newspapers. Ithipon always follows the law and wants to give a good image of the police to Thai citizens. His family is poor. It includes his sister, Am, and his mother. Am is still a student and is addicted to marijuana. Ithipon needs to solve many issues linked to the facts that policemen do not always behave well in private life also (club singer pregnant and dropped...). Ithipon sometimes acts like a social assistant. Ithipon’s team deals with heroin dealing case, prostitution cases, rape case, police corruption but also everyday ordinary cases. This movie shows the kind of crimes faced by Thai society in 1970s. Yot, by killing some drug dealers, puts the mess again as no proofs and information can be got from dead bodies. Yot’s behavior is linked to his past when he was ten years old. His mother was murdered by a carpenter who was acquitted due to lack of proofs despite he saw him with his own eyes! So nowadays he has become a harsh policeman. Yot has been suspended following the drug failure case. Rich people use their power to influence police. A businesswoman wishes to have her son released! Ithipon needs to arrest his own sister Am as she was caught smoking opium in an illegal den. Ithipon remains inflexible. The law is same for all so he refuses to help his sister and has to perform his duty.

title: Khon Nai Soi
description: Cherry (Pradubporn), the mafia in Soi Krasue. He lives here for a long time. Then, Miss Omtong, the landlord knows that someone invade her land, so she sends some henchmen to get the rent. People in this Soi try everything to avoid paying. But then, a rich man offers to invest and build a shopping mall in this land with a great benefits. Miss Omtong has to do everything to chase everyone out of her land.

title: Keb Rak
description: Kritin (Toon Hirayasup) telah menikah dan tinggal bersama Noi (Naowarat) sampai mereka memiliki dua anak. Kritin ingin maju dalam kariernya, maka dia harus belajar di Amerika. Noi akhirnya setuju untuk hidup dalam sedikit kesulitan dan membiarkan suaminya melakukan apa yang dia inginkan. Noi memutuskan untuk bekerja sebagai pelayan bar dan berharap saat suaminya kembali, dia dan anak-anaknya akan memiliki kehidupan yang lebih baik. Namun, saat mereka hidup terpisah, akankah hati Kritin tak berubah?

description: This is romantic drama movies about two boys and two girls. They try to get love from their beloveds but cupid make a twist and everything is not happened as their wish.

title: Kon Hin Nai Din Sai
description: Arm (Likhit) a famous handsome artist who gets boring of his work. He wants to live with his girlfriend, Pom (Papassara) but she doesn't care him and goes out with other man. Arm is dissapointed and depressed. He runs away to Samui. The fate leads him to Wapee (Chudapa), a beautiful girl who wants to suicide. Arm rescues her. Wapee persuades him to work in a restaurant that lacking of staffs. They get closer until it becomes a relationship. Arm wants to erase his love scar. Can he forget the past? Will his love with Wapee success?

title: Kaung Kin Ei Rhythm
description: Su Kay Zin Mon works at the Thit Sar Foundation whereas Min Wai is jobless and just bums around with his friends. When Min Wai sees Kay at a fundraiser, he falls head over heels in love with her and spontaneously decides to join the foundation. The founder of Thit Sar, Dr. Ko Thaung Htike also happens to be in love with Kay. But having to choose between two very different guys isn’t her only problem -- she’s also got leukemia.

title: Kasal
description: Paolo (OLIVER AQUINO) is a filmmaker and Sherwin (ARNOLD REYES) is a lawyer. They have been together for three years. The first year of their relationship have been a bliss until Paolo commits infidelity on their second year. The affair almost ended their relationship. But, the couple has tried hard to patch things up and has decided to move on and be together. Six months after the incident, the couple is still recovering from the incident.

title: Kapatiran
description: With the deadly fraternity wars among Filipino youth as a starting point, "Kaptiran" becomes a cinematic essay about the filmmaker's hometown of Manila. Blurring fact and film together, it is a bleak, disjointed portrait of a disjointed city; a meditation on its social cancer.
synopsis: With the deadly fraternity wars among Filipino youth as a starting point, "Kaptiran" becomes a cinematic essay about the filmmaker's hometown of Manila. Blurring fact and film together, it is a bleak, disjointed portrait of a disjointed city; a meditation on its social cancer.
actors: Giancarlo Abrahan,Bianca Balbuena,Regina Belmonte,Bryan Bendanillo,Joenel Canaria

title: Ke
description: An urban middle class family with a lot of expectation from the daughter-in-law. Some of them are met, some of them left disappointed. Who’s to blame? This film is directed by Ashfaque Nipun under the supervision of Adnan Al Rajeev.
synopsis: An urban middle class family with a lot of expectation from the daughter-in-law. Some of them are met, some of them left disappointed. Who’s to blame?

title: Kachum Kachouy
description: Mr.Kachoom (Panya Nirankul) is a head of the human resource department and he has interviewed an unstylish girl who has a good connection in that company so he has no choice but accepts her to be a staff. Mr.Kachuai is his younger brother who’s in the third-year in a university. He’s falling in love with a freshman and she just accidentally becomes his girl next door. Unexpectedly, this girl’s sister is that unstylish girl. Hence, the brothers have to find the way to deal with these 2 girls.

title: Kaleldo (2006)
description: Kaleldo gives the viewer a glimpse of the nature of life. The film tells the story of a motherless family a decade after the eruption of Mt. Pinatubo inundated the town of Guagua in Pampanga with lagar-a clear singular display of the force of nature. Mang Rudy, the widowed woodcarver, wields an iron hand over his three daughters: the fun-loving but rebellious Grace, the youngest, who goes through the throes of adjusting to married life; the feisty and headstrong Lourdes, the middle daughter, who succumbs to an extra-marital affair; and the subservient and discriminated on eldest, Jess, a lesbian who brings home her girlfriend to take care of the father after he succumbs to a heart attack. The story unfolds in a series of events ( a wedding,a santacruzan, a parade, the annihilation of the summer cogon by fire, a death) that marks the beginning (early summer-"Kaleldo"), the middle (midsummer-"Maleldo") and the end (late summer-"Kauran") of summer. This confirms the film's statement that life, like the various turn of events that govern the characters' lives, is as changeable and volatile as the seasons.

title: Justice Unleashed
description: Annalise O’Neil, a newly appointed judge, sees a newspaper picture of her estranged teenage daughter, homeless and curled up against a heating vent in frigid temperatures. Before Annalise can find and reconnect with the teen, the girl’s been lured into human trafficking. It’s up to Annalise to rescue her daughter before it’s too late.

title: Inspired To Kill
description: When an aspiring mystery writer finds a perfect mentor, she finds herself in an all too real story of murder.
synopsis: When an aspiring mystery writer finds a perfect mentor, she finds herself in an all too real story of murder.

title: Jose Bartolome: Guro
description: “Jose Bartolome: Guro” is a story of Jose Bartolome, a dedicated teacher who is torn between having a prosperous life in America or educating his illiterate countrymen.
synopsis: “Jose Bartolome: Guro” is a story of Jose Bartolome, a dedicated teacher who is torn between having a prosperous life in America or educating his illiterate countrymen.

title: Jilbab Traveler Love Sparks In Korea
description: Untuk memenuhi keinginan sang ayah yang tengah sakit, Rania, sang Jilbab Traveler, pergi mengunjungi Baluran, sebuah wilayah indah di timur Pulau Jawa yang menjadi saksi cinta kedua orangtuanya. Di sana, dia bertemu dengan Hyun Geun, turis asal Korea, dan temannya Alvin, yang meminta bantuan Rania untuk memandu mereka. Hal ini malah membuat dia kehilangan momen penting bersama ayahnya. Rasa bersalah membuat Rania enggan untuk berpergian lagi.  Di sisi lain, Tia & Eron, kakak Rania, tengah menjodohkan dia dengan Ilhan, pemuda yang berhasil meluluhkan hati Rania. Hingga suatu hari, Rania mendapat undangan untuk menjadi peserta Writers in Residence di Gangwon, Korea. Hal ini memunculkan kembali kenangannya bersama dengan Hyun Geun dan menghadirkan dilema besar dalam hidup Rania.

title: I Will Wait
description: A young man and woman begin a sudden romance after he saves her from an accident in the forest. His dreams start becoming plagued with nightmares of a woman who looks identical to her, but seems to be from a different life...
synopsis: A young man and woman begin a sudden romance after he saves her from an accident in the forest. His dreams start becoming plagued with nightmares of a woman who looks identical to her, but seems to be from a different life...

title: Intimate Stranger
description: Karen, the beautiful single mother of precious 9-year-old Justin, never really had much luck with love. This all seems to change when she falls for her “Prince Charming”, Dennis, who is both a caring gentleman and a great friend to her son. But her perfect world begins to crumble when she finds a black rose on her doorstep, hears noises in the attic and gets prank calls in the middle of the night. After breaking up with Dennis her life begins to turn upside down and strange things start happening. Questioning her own sanity and left alone by authorities, friends and family, she decides to take matters into her own hands- a dangerous decision that puts her life on the line.

title: In His Steps
description: When a homeless man interrupts the comfortable routine of First Church of Raymond, life will never be the same for the apathetic congregation. Convicted by the vagrant’s words, Pastor Henry Maxwell, Rachel Winslow, Virginia Page, Alex Powers, and Jasper Chase are thrust into a journey of discovering what life is like beyond “Christianity as usual.” But as they find themselves opposed by family strife, church politics, and scorned lovers, will they be able to keep their commitment, or will they be dragged back into fruitless lives?
synopsis: When a homeless man interrupts the comfortable routine of First Church of Raymond, life will never be the same for the apathetic congregation. title: In God's Time
description: Living in a big city can be very lonely and discouraging—but then sometimes God will intervene in order to repair broken relationships, hearts and souls. Set in Los Angeles, the loneliest city in the world, the film “In God’s Time” relates such a journey as it follows four characters who have lost their faith and are struggling with the gritty challenges of a life filled with anger, sorrow, resentment and fear. Enter a mysterious watchmaker named Charlie, who sets in motion a chain of events with a special wristwatch that brings a new perspective on the past. The wristwatch first takes hold of a curmudgeonly panhandler named Jerry and then weaves it’s way to transform the other characters—Rorry, a millennial who is on the outs with her parents due to an unplanned pregnancy; Dr. Keith Phillips, Rorry’s uncle, who pressures her to get an abortion; and Brandon, a lost soul who has been living out of his car since going AWOL from the Army. As each one of them comes to face their personal trials (addiction, terminal illness, death of loved one), it is through the power of the wristwatch they have a chance to encounter the healing love of Christ… all in God’s time.

title: In Darkness
description: In Darkness focuses on the obsessive relationship between a man in his 30s and his elderly mother. A melancholic and dusty story taking place in a little house.
synopsis: In Darkness focuses on the obsessive relationship between a man in his 30s and his elderly mother. A melancholic and dusty story taking place in a little house.

title: Ikaw Lamang Hanggang Ngayon
description: Ryan is a bachelor who is hesitant of commitment. In fact each time he engages in a relationship he dreams of settling down. But each time he feels that he has found the perfect partner he finds someone better. Katherine meanwhile is a boring post office worker who feels unloved and unwanted by the people around her. Since her parents are separated with families of their own the only family she has is the owners of the dormitory. One fateful night, their paths crossed which resulted to a wonderful relationship. But when Katherine learns from her dorm mate that her boyfriend left her in spite of giving everything to him Katherine feared for herself. Will Ryan be able to prove that his love for Katherine is true and that she will not have the same destiny as her dorm mates'?

title: I America
description: “I America” is a dramedy about a complex half-Pinay, half-Caucasian lady looking for American living in Olongapo City (Philippines) who tries to get her passport and US visa in order to meet her father personally for the first time.

title: Huyen Thoai Bat Tu
description: Huyền Thoại Bất Tử là một bộ phim hành động của đạo diễn Lưu Huỳnh xoay quanh câu chuyện về anh chàng mồ coi Long được một nữ võ sư Bình Định tên Lan nhận nuôi. Sau khi bà Lan mất, Long đã quyết tâm thực hiện cho bằng được di nguyện cuối cùng của bà là đưa hài cốt của bà về yên nghỉ tại Mỹ cùng chồng, và trong chuyến hành trình đó Long đã gặp được Trinh - người cùng anh trải qua những khó khăn gian khổ trong chuyến đi ấy. Liệu Long có hoàng thành được tâm nguyện cuối cùng của mẹ mình hay không và trong chuyến hành trình đó anh còn phải gặp những rắc rối gì nữa?

title: Hunt For Truth
description: Carrie Evans is one of the sharpest lawyers at McKinnon & Associates Law Firm. If she continues to toe the line and work overtime, she’ll be the next partner. However, as soon as her boss Caswell Fox announces his intentions to run for US Senator, things at the law firm change. Caswell demands Carrie's help with a controversial case involving a deadly oil rig explosion. As Carrie investigates the case, she uncovers details of Caswell's involvement in covering up the cause of the explosion. She also discovers that Caswell has a long, shady past including a relationship with a mysterious woman who disappeared after being seen last with him. Carrie eventually gets to the bottom of the woman's disappearance, but not without turning her life upside down.

description: Although Phoe Saw is far from perfect, he always tries his hardest to keep his sister happy because he loves her. When the boorish Moe Wai enters their lives, everything changes.

title: House Of Cards
description: Not all children are created equal. A heartfelt drama about a mother's attempt to gain entry into the silent, secret world her daughter has entered after the tragic death of her father.
synopsis: Not all children are created equal. A heartfelt drama about a mother's attempt to gain entry into the silent, secret world her daughter has entered after the tragic death of her father.

title: Homeless For The Holidays
description: When an uncaring executive falls from the corporate ladder, he learns how difficult it can be to find work and compassion in today's economy.  He eventually accepts a humiliating job, but with bills rapidly piling up, and not enough money to go around, he quickly discovers that, unless something changes soon, he’ll lose everything by Christmas. Will family and faith be enough to bring joy when you’re Homeless for The Holidays?

title: Hnyoet
description: Moe Yake is missing a maternal figure in his life since his own mother has passed away. When his new neighbour Nann moves in, he finds out that she’s lost a son. title: Hit And Run
description:
Heather, 30s, is a rising prosecutor. Driven and meticulous, everything in her life is very carefully organized... her work, her condo. Having just gotten a notorious Madoff- type swindler convicted, Heather has become a fixture on the evening news.
And, unnoticed by her, she’s being watched by someone. But all is not perfect in Heather's world. An ex-cop, Ray, is trying to blackmail her for planting evidence in her breakthrough case... a serial killer she'd convicted years ago. She was convinced they had the right man and she did the right thing... but it's a skeleton in her closet that she doesn't want getting out. Especially not now that her star is on the rise.sinister turn, and Heather soon finds herself in danger from not only Vanessa, but a dangerous secret from her past.

title: Hotel Girl Part 1
description: Vida leaves her family at the village to find work in the city. She is promoted ahead of some colleagues as a result of her hard work her colleagues and manager are against her promotion and will stop at nothing to have her fired from duty. A theft case is plotted against her and the police are in pursuit to get her arrested. Vida runs for her dear life, How will the truth be revealed?

title: 3 Heads
description: There are 3 buddies, Noon, Preaw and Buek. Preaw and Buek always tease each other since they was young. They live in the same area. Every time they have a plan. Their families have to be in trouble with it. After haven't seen each other for a long time, they come back together to help Noon whom is trying to get away from Surachai. Her mother owes his money and Surachai wants her to be his wife in returrn. Noon asks Preaw and Buek to lure Surachai to invest in a fake business. Surachai is full with greed. How will this ridiculous story go?

title: Hiding In Plain Sight
description: What would you do if you lost everything? The answer is a grim reality for Darius and Josey Blackmon. A hardworking couple plagued by bad luck and tough circumstances, they watched their middle-class lifestyle crumble away as unemployment took its brutal toll. Now they have no shelter for their two children except the family car. Struggling to survive and to maintain appearances, Darius is at the end of his rope. His hope is almost gone, but faith may offer and answer, if he can only overcome the pride that holds him back. Filmmaker M. Legend Brown crafts a devastatingly honest, yet uplifting look at a secret struggle that may be closer than you think.

title: Heng's Daughter
description: It’s a romantic-comedy story between 3 brothers who are Tom (Prompong Nopparat) - the aboard student, Tor and Tui (Suthipong Watanajang) and 3 sisters who are Poom (Jarunee Suksawat), Pom (Pradabpon Wongsatid) and Pang (Pattama Parntong). The sisters have a flower shop and they are the daughters of Tao Kae Heng who owns a Gerbera farm and hires a piece of land to grow Gerberas from the brothers’ mother.

title: Gravity
description: Dr. Ryan Stone, a brilliant medical engineer on her first Shuttle mission, with veteran astronaut Matt Kowalsky in command of his last flight before retiring. But on a seemingly routine spacewalk, disaster strikes. The Shuttle is destroyed, leaving Stone and Kowalsky completely alone-tethered to nothing but each other and spiraling out into the blackness of space. The deafening silence tells them they have lost any link to Earth and any chance for rescue. As fear turns to panic, every gulp of air eats away at what little oxygen is left. But the only way home may be to go further out into the terrifying expanse of space.

title: Hari Ini Pasti Menang
description: Gabriel Omar is a football star who is embraced by many fans. He succeeded in football which made Indonesia proud in the World Cup arena. His fame and popularity presented new problems in Gabriel's life. Andini, a sports journalist, is investigating the existence of soccer mafias in Indonesia. The investigations always involves Gabriel's name. Could Gabriel's success in the world of football be supported by the soccer mafia or is he purely a national figure who wants to make his country proud?

title: Happyland
description: In the Philippines, only a few young rich kids from exclusive schools play football, and only as part of the curriculum. Filipinos are basketball fanatics, and the most rabid can be found in slums communities like these. If the Philippines is a basketball country, then Tondo is its capital. Here, basketball is almost a religion -- there are more basketball courts than churches. But Father Jose had this crazy belief that football is the right sports for Filipinos, most especially the poor. Together with his co-pastor, and a young football coach, Father Jose began picking out boys from the street. Kids who were living dangerous, even violent, lives played for the team not because of choice -- but more because of hope. Hope of escaping what seemed an inescapable destiny. This is the story of their battle -- on, and off, the field. The story of the legendary barefoot players of Tondo. Will they win?

title: Gulong
description:
“GULONG” (THE BICYCLE) is about friendship, love and life.  The story is told from the point-of-view of Apao, a smart, kindhearted boy whose quest for an old bicycle reveals the stuff he is made of.  With him on this adventure are his cousin Momoy and his best friend Tom-Tom.  The story begins with a question:  How are our 3 friends going to spend their summer vacation?  Tom-Tom suggests that they go to his uncle's fishpond, an hour's bike ride from where they live.  Apao and Momoy have a problem -- they don't own a bike!  There are no jeepneys and it is too far to walk.  

Momoy finds an old bicycle but the owner, an old woman named Maggie, will only give it to him if he pays her a hundred pesos.  He agrees and promises to come back with the money the next day.  This starts a series of events which affects Apao, his friends, his family and even his community.  In the end, a discarded 40 year old bicycle connects the past to the present and becomes a catalyst for healing old wounds and reviving a love affair that has long been left for dead.

title: Golden Mind
description: An inspirational story of high school sweethearts; Seth, born into modest means, but has a heart of gold and Belen, born wealthy and, after coming to know Jesus, discovers a golden love for people. Belen’s friends and parents see Seth as a gold digger. Times are hard for Seth's family. When his little sister is six, his father leaves to look for work in another state. Not long after, he writes to say he has become involved with another woman and wants a divorce. The shock sends Seth’s mother into a deep depression that ends in her death. Alone, and just finishing high school, Seth is left to raise his little sister. In addition to caring for her and attending college, he takes a job as a dishwasher in a local restaurant. His high school academic achievements earned him a full-ride college scholarship. He receives some government financial assistance to care for his little sister and, determined to rise above his circumstances, he invests in gold with every dollar he earns as a dishwasher. Seth's steadfast character demonstrates the value of trusting God and living the Golden Rule of caring for others knowing that true love given always returns with abundance.

title: Ghost Hand

Her sister is full of wrath while her ghost harrassing people who harmed her. The hand skeleton still haunts the murderer. Who is he?

title: Get Out Alive
description: When an estranged couple is invited on a couple’s retreat, they discover they are targets of an elaborate scheme to steal their identities and their lives. Pursued by dangerous criminals, they must overcome their marital problems to get out alive.

title: Generational Sins
description: Two estranged brothers are brought back together by the death of their mother. Her dying wish is to see them return to their birthplace and reunite with their abusive, alcoholic father. They set out on a journey that leads them to their hometown full of dark memories that the younger brother doesn't remember and the older brother wishes he could forget.

description: Ex-Wife Frances conspires with her grown children to force Jake to sell his cherished Seattle basketball team. Will game changing moves off the court help reignite romantic sparks?

title: Fruit Cake
description: Rubel has a pet dog named Bagha. Rubel's girlfriend Tushi is getting married and Rubel is going to meet her for the last time. He shares the story with Bagha about what he is going to do at his last date. But something unexpected happens.
