title: From Straight As To XXX
description: Based on the true story of Duke University student Miriam Weeks, also known as Belle Knox.From Straight A's to XXX tells the true story of Miriam Weeks, who as a freshman at Duke University looking to make money to cover tuition, became infamously known for starring in online pornography under the pseudonym, Belle Knox. The Miriam Weeks/ Belle Knox story represents the hypocrisy of "slut-shaming." Portrayed as neither a villain nor a hero, Belle Knox is a young woman who made a choice that changed her life forever.

title: From Bangkok With Love
description: Guy (Sorrapong) has just graduated and Thoe, a foreign boss who looks after Guy and his dad, wants Guy to work with him. But Guy refuses his offer so they have a fight. Khem (Rit Luecha), the right-hand man of Thoe, overshoots Thoe. Guy is arrested but Don (Kowit), Guy’s blood brother, helps him. Don contacts to Alice (Naowarat) and wants her to help Guy from Khem.

title: Friends, Foes And Fireworks
description: An intimate New Year's Eve reunion of five female friends in the independent acting scene becomes a test of relationships when old tensions spark, truths are told, and rivalries are reignited. Will the group make it through the night together or will their friendship fizzle out like an overzealous fireworks display?

Will the group make it through the night together or will their friendship fizzle out like an overzealous fireworks display?

title: Four Years Two Guys One Love
description: A touching love story between two guys and one girls which lasted for 4 years.
synopsis: A touching love story between two guys and one girls which lasted for 4 years.

title: Four hearts
description: Wiphawee (Lalita Panyopas) gets a job as a nanny to Watchara (Saranyoo Wongkrajang)’s kids. Pongnarin (Pongpat Wachirabanjong), her best friend, doesn’t want her work this job since they have to be separated but they promise they will send a letter to each other. When Wiphawee starts her job, she realizes Watchara’s family problem and his kids doesn't want any nanny. Without recognizing, the proximity between Wiphawee and Watchara becomes the love. In the last, who does Wiphawee choose between Pongnarin who’s willing to do everything for her and Watchara, the widower who she feels good to him?

title: Forced Move
description: A man discovers a series of brutal murders while on his daily jog. Realizing his home is next in the path of the killers, he races with all he's got to save his family.
synopsis: A man discovers a series of brutal murders while on his daily jog. Realizing his home is next in the path of the killers, he races with all he's got to save his family.

title: Flying Lessons
description: A woman (Maggie Grace) returns home and reconnects with her mother (Christine Lahti), while developing a bond with an Alzheimer's patient (Hal Holbrook).
synopsis: A woman (Maggie Grace) returns home and reconnects with her mother (Christine Lahti), while developing a bond with an Alzheimer's patient (Hal Holbrook).

title: Ferar Gaan
description: Rubab Khan is a superstar with millions of fans. His songs and music are adored by everyone, yet he lives a very unstable lifestyle. The story revolves on how his fame turns to shame through an unfortunate event and how he sets on a soul-searching journey to redeem his lost self.

actors: Jon Kabir,Azmeri Asha,Sayed Zaman Shawon,Ishfaque Kamal

title: Fenced Off
description: Josh and Anne just moved into their first house. George and Tia live next door. George is retired and ready for life to slow down a little. Josh is a young idealistic social worker ready to be welcomed to the neighborhood. Much to Tia’s chagrin, George has little interest in giving Josh a warm welcome. What starts off as a day of yard work and random to-dos for the new neighbors turns into a series of misunderstandings and confrontation. Inspired by actual events, Fenced Off explores the reality that loving your neighbor can be complicated.

title: Fatal Defense
description: After a home-invasion, a young woman learns self-defense from a handsome martial arts instructor, but he develops a frightening obsession with her and orchestrates an increasingly deadly array of “tests” to see if she has truly learned his lessons.
synopsis: After a home-invasion, a young woman learns self-defense from a handsome martial arts instructor, but he develops a frightening obsession with her and orchestrates an increasingly deadly array of “tests” to see if she has truly learned his lessons.

title: Fatal Performance
description: Dana Tilly is an aspiring actress in LA with a crappy job and a lot of debt. So it is a relief when an agent offers her a great paying job working for a wealthy couple to play the role of the wife at a function that she herself can’t attend. The job goes perfectly but afterwards Dana is nearly killed by reckless drivers twice within a few days. The second time LAPD homicide detective, Rob Billings, narrowly saves her. Things get even stranger when Dana goes to her agent’s office and discovers that he has vacated it and the office is empty. That night a man enters Dana’s apartment and tries to kill her. She escapes and he is struck and killed by a car while pursuing her. The man turns out to be her agent – except that he was using a false identity and is, in fact, a two---time felon.

title: Fatal Memories
description: After spending a year in an asylum for stabbing her mom, April is released and taken-in by her sister, Sutton. Determined to prove April's innocence, Sutton starts her own investigation that will shake up the very foundation of her family.
synopsis: After spending a year in an asylum for stabbing her mom, April is released and taken-in by her sister, Sutton. Determined to prove April's innocence, Sutton starts her own investigation that will shake up the very foundation of her family.

title: Eyewitness
description: Five years after sending a man to jail for the murder of her father and fiancé, Diana returns home to find that he has escaped from prison and has come to confront her. However, the man has not come for revenge, but rather wants her to understand that she put an innocent man away. Captive in her own home, Diana is resistant - she knows what she witnessed the night of the murder. But as time progresses, Diana starts to question what she saw that night as well as her own testimony. Eventually she even starts to develop feelings for the man. But is he really a cold blooded killer out for revenge? Or did she Diana, really put an innocent man away? When she finally realizes the truth, it is far more shocking and deadly than what Diana could have ever imagined.

title: Evidence Of Truth
description: A DNA specialist at the police crime lab, Renee Saldana, 30s, comes to belive that her new husband is responsible for a murder she's helping to Investigate.
synopsis: A DNA specialist at the police crime lab, Renee Saldana, 30s, comes to belive that her new husband is responsible for a murder she's helping to Investigate.

title: Esok Masih Ada
description: Many may remember this classic “Esok Masih Ada”, where Azean Irdawaty clinched Best Actress at the inaugural Malaysian Film Festival in 1980.  ASP Zamri’s family life crumbles when his only child succumbs to leukemia. His later befriends Marina, the daughter of Cheong, a banker whom he had saved from a robbery cum hostage attempt. When their friendship begins to blossom,  out of sympathy or perhaps gratitude, Cheong convinces his daughter to marry Zamri following which they are blessed with a son, Jefri. However Jefri is placed in the care of Faridah, Zamri’s first wife, which results in Zamri now spending most of his time with Faridah and Jefri. Don’t miss the chance to catch this classic as if it were shot yesterday, by watching the digitally remastered version of “Esok Masih Ada” in HD (high-definition) and see how the triangle unfolds as loneliness creeps into Marina’s life.

title: Elizabeth Blue
description: After being released from a mental hospital, where she was coping with her schizophrenia, Elizabeth is now living in a studio apartment with her fiance, Grant. With the love and support of Grant and the help of her new and determined psychiatrist, Elizabeth is doing her best to navigate through life. Haunted by daily voices, hallucinations, failing medications and her cold and seemingly unsupportive mother, Elizabeth attempts to regain control of her mental stability.

title: Faith's Song
description: A young girl’s faith is tested, when her parents are suddenly killed in a car accident and she’s forced to move in with relatives who don’t share her belief in God. A talented singer, who desires to worship God with her songs, she finds herself in a new city, a new school and no friends. With her uncle and others at school challenging her faith, one boy emerges, who seems to see the greatness in her. Now she must to come to grips with either fitting in or following God - which could cost her more than just her faith.

title: Edna
description: A psychological study in Filipino family dynamics, the movie focuses on what Edna finds when she returns to the country after years of working abroad. She comes home to find a family living a life very different from the one they had when she left. She has problems adjusting to this, and how she deals with being shut out of her family’s life is one of the major points of the film.

actors: Irma Adlawan,Ronnie Lazaro,Nicco Manalo,Sue Prado,Mara Marasigan,Micko Laurente,Frances Makil,and Kiko Matos

title: Dying To Be Heard
description: “Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves” (Proverbs 31:8a). Rachel Angelo is a high-powered executive focused on climbing the corporate ladder, but when she discovers that she’s pregnant, she’s tossed into an emotional tailspin and forced to face a life-changing decision. Will she choose her blossoming career or give it all up for a child? Meanwhile, Jordan, the son of a Holocaust survivor, lies on his deathbed, hoping the story of his father’s escape from the Nazis will not be forgotten. Based on many true stories, Dying to Be Heard is a moving dedication to the 6 million slain in Europe during the Holocaust and the 54 million unborn children slain in America from abortions. Starring writer, director, and actress Alyse Nicole, this is a riveting and heart-wrenching film that underscores the reality of God’s compassion for every human life.

title: Ekti Shobuj Bag
description: A newlywed couple comes to Dhaka. As strangers in this city, they see everything and everyone with suspicion. They come across different avenues and sides of Dhaka and is gripped by fear as the agenda-filled eyes pierce their minds. But in the final analysis, they are the ones who bring darkness to this lovely city.

title: Dont Go Breaking My Heart 2 VI
description: "Đơn thân nam nữ" (phần 2) là câu chuyện tiếp nối của bộ phim cùng tên ra mắt vào năm 2011, từng tạo nên cơn sốt khi nói về tình yêu của những chàng trai, cô gái hiện đại trong thế kỷ 21 ở Hồng Kông - thành phố bận rộn và phồn hoa bậc nhất. Họ độc thân, bản lĩnh, có ước mơ, hoài bão, có thể làm nên chuyện, nhưng vẫn bối rối trong trò chơi của trái tim!

title: Duang Naleng
description: A mysterious man arrives on a rainy night in a remote city and enters in the hotel bar. The hotel is half owned by young lady called Chonko (Wiyada Umarin). A crazy guy (Settha Sirachaya), always drunk (ขี้เมา), asks him to avoid troubles as bad ruffians are the real leaders here. The mysterious man is called Mek Suriya (Sorapong Chatree) and plays the judiciary guy against the ruffians terrorizing the drunkard (รับรองความปลอดภัย).

title: Driven Underground
description: When single mom Sarah Palmer’s teen daughter Christy witnesses a crime, she becomes the key witness for the prosecution. After succesfully identifying the killer from a line up, the man charged with murder. However, his clever lawyer has managed to get him out on bail. Sarah and Christy enter the witness protection programme, however as we will soon find out, no one is out of reach to this killer who will do everything to stop Christy from testifying. A came of cat and mouse begins, where Sarah can only count on herlsef to keep her family alive...

title: Dont Fade Away
description: A young man (Ryan Kwanten) returns home to North Carolina to care for his terminally ill father.
synopsis: A young man (Ryan Kwanten) returns home to North Carolina to care for his terminally ill father.

title: Divination
description: Supernatural forced collide when madness meets magic in “Divination”. Jason (D’angelo Midili) is a young, successful artist married to the lovely Jessica (Natasha Sims). They’re filled with joy at their first pregnancy and the uncanny return of their mysterious friend Dee (Lisa Coronado). But Jason is tormented by Fear (Tucker Boggio) continually whispering nightmares and horrific visions into his mind. As he descends deeper into madness an intervention is made by the powerful angel Joshua (Philipp Aurand), and his eager assistant Daniel (James Grixoni). “Divination” is pure spiritual warfare, a thriller like no other. Do not trust every spirit.

title: Don't call me Prostitute
description: It is about a young Thai lady leaving her country and going to Germany in order to find a husband through a wedding agency. It shows the harsh life of those ladies dreaming of a prince, the abuse of such wedding agency, the bad behavior of those foreigners wishing to "try" their wives before any wedding. This movie has got four Thai awards and was shot in five countries, i.e. Thailand, Germany, Italy, Switzerland and Austria. Thida Thidarat got the best actress award for this movie.

title: Diamond Cat Eye
description: Chai (Apichat Halamjiak), Chat coming with his daughter, Dam (Dam Datsakorn) are involved to catch a mystic cat spirit (แมวดำตาเพชร). They wish to get a diamond located in the cat's eyes. Some hunters fail to kill it so they are going in a remote mountain to catch it in his cave.

title: Dead On Campus
description: A freshman on campus discovers that the only way to be admitted into the sorority of her dreams is to seduce a nerdy introverted guy and film it. When the sorority "prank" goes viral, the boy is discovered dead from apparent suicide, but his sister does not buy it. She goes under cover to expose the sororities' hidden secrets.

title: Deadly Sibling Rivalry
description: Ever since they were little, identical twin sisters Janna and Callie have had an incredibly fierce rivalry, each trying to outshine the other ans spewing bad blood in the process. Now adults, Janna and Callie have symetrically opposite lives: Janna has landed the perfect job and has a beautiful daughter, Fiona. Callie on the other hand drifts from job to job, always pushing the limit further. After stealing a suitecase of prescription drugs, she meets up with her sister at the family cabin. On their way home, they have a terrible car accident, and Callie ends up in a coma. Jenna is not quite herself when she gets home, so much so that Fiona starts to question if her mother is really the one who walked away from the crash. When "Callie" wakes up from her coma, it is only a matter of time before everyone uncovers the truth: that the person in the coma was Jenna, and that Callie will stop at nothing to steal her sister's life.

title: Deadly Pursuit
description: When a deadly bear attack cuts short her husband's move to the city, pampered city girl Mia Daniels travels to the remote fishing lodge where he works, in a desperate attempt to salvage her marriage. But as Mia struggles to adapt to life in the great outdoors, she stumbles upon a web of deceptions and soon finds herself in a world of crime and murder where her fight for survival can only end in death and devastation.

title: Deadly Daycare
description: After a few years of financial hardship, a young mother (RACHEL) decides to go back to work to help her husband with the mounting bills. With no one to watch their 4-year-old daughter (MIA), the couple decides to enrol her into the local daycare centre owned by a seemingly responsible older woman, GABBY. After a few weeks of Mia's awkward behaviour, Rachel concludes her daughter may be getting mistreated at the day care facility. Going on the offensive, Rachel decides to plant a hidden camera hoping to incriminate Gabby. Rachel's plan hits a snag when she learns Gabby is actually the victim of a car crash that Rachel was involved in years ago and Gabby's motives may be tied to the accident.

title: David And Goliath
description: The Old Testament story of David and Goliath comes to life in this classic adaptation from acclaimed director Orson Welles. With the sacred Ark of the Covenant in the hands of the enemy Philistines, Samuel (Edward Hilton) prophesies the end of the reign of the ruthless King Saul (Welles) and anoints David (Ivo Payer), a lowly shepherd, to go to Jerusalem as the chosen successor.  However, Saul’s top advisor Abner (Massimo Serato) plots a scheme to get rid of David. Wishing to destroy the young man, Abner convinces Saul to send David to make peace with the Philistines’ King Asrod. Armed with only a slingshot, a few stones, and an unwavering faith in the one true God, David accepts King Asrod’s challenge to fight to powerful giant Goliath with the future of Israel hanging in the balance.

title: 123 Daun Mahalai
description: A bus driving from Bangkok going to Hadyai with people who have different occupations, students, musician, doctor, pregnant woman, undercover police, etc. They have to help each other to survive this adventure. How they all can survive?

title: Dang Met Sai
description: Her dad just passed away but Sai still wants to study in the university. She asks Aunt Kaelong, the owner of a night club, for help. Even she hasn't seen her aunt for 3 years because her dad didn't allow her, Kaelong still helps her. Tri, the handsome night club singer tries to flirt with her while Chawaeng, Kaelong's business partner, has a feeling for her too. Chawaeng buys her expensive things and asks Kaelong to persuade Sai to love him. Sai decides to escape from the house. What will she choose between love and favor?
synopsis: Her dad just passed away but Sai still wants to study in the university. She asks Aunt Kaelong, the owner of a night club, for help. Even she hasn't seen her aunt for 3 years because her dad didn't allow her, Kaelong still helps her. Tri, the handsome night club singer tries to flirt with her while Chawaeng, Kaelong's business partner, has a feeling for her too. Chawaeng buys her expensive things and asks Kaelong to persuade Sai to love him. Sai decides to escape from the house. What will she choose between love and favor?

title: Dance Dance Dragon
description:
Ah Long’s father was desperate to have a son born in the year of the Dragon because his ancestors had decreed that only a "Dragon boy" could take over family's lion dance association. His mother instead gives birth to "Dragon girls" while Ah Long himself was born several seconds after the clock struck twelve, making him a "Snake baby", much to the disappointment of his father.

At present time, Mother Long prays to the gods for blessings on her three children and pours out her desire for a grandchild. The oldest daughter Lucy, 48, is a spinster and can't find suitable work. The second daughter Ah Bee, 36, is a gambling addiction counselor who is tomboyish and was recently dumped by her boyfriend. The youngest and only son Ah Long is married but is terrified of children. Meanwhile up in heaven, the gods are growing sick and tired of hearing Mother Long's daily prayers for a grandchild and deliberate whether to grant Mother Long her wish….

actors: Lai Ming,Kym Ng,Dennis Chew,Adrian Pang,Melvin Sia,Bryan Wong

title: Daisy Winters
description: Daisy Winters is about an eleven year-old girl's unconventional, yet deeply loving relationship with her mother and what happens when this essential mother/daughter bond is harshly broken. Along her journey, including her quest to discover her father, the courageous, resourceful and precocious Daisy learns about how to embrace every moment with determination and an unrelenting belief in herself.

title: Daderon Lomrang Kwarm Rukgum Lung Ja Ma
description: Namtarn, a country girl who has to come to follow her stepbrother to be her parents' representative on her orientation day. She accidentally meets Tuk, a rich, kind girl. Mon, the school DJ is a close friend of Tai, Tuk's brother who doesn't like Tuk. Friends of Tuk like to go to her house often and Tai seems to like Namtarn. How will this story go?

title: Cu Va Chim Se Se
synopsis: Cô bé Thủy mồ côi cả cha lẫn mẹ, sống cùng chú ruột trong xưởng làm mành tre. Cô bé là người cứng cỏi và đầy lòng tự trọng. Không chịu được người chú khô cằn và hách dịch, Thủy bỏ nhà lên thành phố kiếm sống. Được những đứa trẻ khác chỉ bảo, Thủy bán tranh ảnh cho khách du lịch. Sau đó, cô bé lại đổi sang bán hoa hồng. Thủy cố tìm cách để tồn tại giữa thành phố và chứng minh cô sẽ tồn tại cho dù cuộc sống khắc nghiệt đến đâu.

title: Dance Night Obsession
description: Kate is the beautiful and talented star of "Dance Night In America", a popular competition dance show. When her fellow contestant is murdered, events on set begin to take a sinister turn. Kate seems to have a mysterious stalker who is intent on forcing her off the show. But it soon becomes clear that they don't just want her off the show; they want her dead.

Kate seems to have a mysterious stalker who is intent on forcing her off the show. But it soon becomes clear that they don't just want her off the show; they want her dead.

title: Cradle Of Lies
description: Melissa wakes up from a coma with no memory. Finding a mysterious abdominal scar, flashes of her past smash into her consciousness. She gave birth. It’s a girl. Leaving the hospital, Melissa starts a search for her missing daughter.
synopsis: Melissa wakes up from a coma with no memory. Finding a mysterious abdominal scar, flashes of her past smash into her consciousness. She gave birth. It’s a girl. Leaving the hospital, Melissa starts a search for her missing daughter.

title: Cuoc Doi Cua Yen
description: Phim kể về cuộc đời của Yến - một cô bé nông thôn xinh xắn phải về nhà chồng khi mới 10 tuổi. Từ đó, số phận cô gắn liền với những thăng trầm của nhà chồng, gắn liền với Hạnh - người chồng kém cô một tuổi. Bộ phim thể hiện sự hy sinh âm thầm và sức mạnh vươn lên trong mọi nghịch cảnh của người phụ nữ Việt Nam truyền thống, nhưng sâu thẳm trong tâm hồn họ vẫn luôn có những nỗi đau giấu kín và niềm khao khát cháy bỏng được yêu thương.

title: Crimes Of The Mind
description: Carolyn's Raeburn's daughter graduated from high school at the age of 16. Laura was bright, popular and enthusiastic about the future, but the summer before she was to begin college, an event occurred changing forever the lives of her and her family. Laura visited a boarding ranch in the country to learn horseback riding. And there, she entered a world dominated by a strange and fearsome woman who took control of Laura's mind. She was groomed to replace the woman's dead daughter. Carolyn spent the next five years of her life, much of her sanity and more than half a million dollars to get her daughter back.

title: Coming Home For Christmas
description: Lizzie Richfield is looking for something to inspire her. After being laid off from her long-time job, and recently breaking up with her longtime boyfriend, she feels that this was not where life was supposed to lead her. So, when she lands a job as a house manager for a mansion, she looks at it as the first step in her new life. Robert Marley, the wealthy man who hired her to prepare the Ashford Estate for both the Christmas Eve Gala and the mansions sale is more than just intriguing. Throughout the short time that she spends in the Marley household, Lizzie helps Robert's dysfunctional family connect in a way they have never been able to. Robert is extremely grateful for everything she is doing, and even changes his plans to spend Christmas at the Mansion because of her. Although Lizzie finds herself falling for Robert, his brother Kipp seems to only have eyes for her and professes his love. On Christmas Eve, Lizzie must make her choice.

title: Corrupt
description: Hallie Jones was an expert Forensic Accountant with the District Attorneys office, until her testimony cost the life of an innocent man. But when the key witness in a high profile corruption case is murdered, District Attorney Frank Morris turns to the only person who can crack the case - Hallie. But as she begins to uncover the truth in the case, she also uncovers a deadly web of deceit which stalks her at every turn.

title: Contractual Love
description: Two best friends fight for the woman they both love. But as all three wrestle with their desires and faith, the question looms, “What does God want?” A captivating movie about love, faith and redemption, it speaks to the hearts of Christians everywhere.

title: Consequence
description: Jodie is in a position where she gets the chance to live one day, without any consequences for her actions. What would you do if you didn't have to face the music or pay the price for your actions?

title: Conscience
description: Childhood friends Songul and Aydanur are in love with the same guy (Mahmut) without knowing. But Mahmut chooses Songul to marry as she possesses the qualities of a woman to be a wife. On the other hand, he continues to have an affair with Aydanur. When Songul realises the affair, she once again gets close to Aydanur to refresh their friendship which drives Mahmut crazy of course.

title: Cold fire
description: Akuei, a perfect woman who both beauty and brain. She was raised to be a patient girl from her abusive husband. Saranat, a foppery man who borns with money but acts like he is good for nothing and addicts to women, gambling and liquors until he forgets who is waiting at howm. Phai Nao adapted from a 1980 awarded novel.

title: Co Can Nha Nam Nghe Nang Mua
description: Có Căn Nhà Nằm Nghe Nắng Mưa mang thông diệp nhẹ nhàng mà sâu sắc, thấm đẫm tình cảm cùng triết lý nhân sinh của người Việt Nam xưa. Bộ phim ắt hẳn sẽ là một lựa chọn thích hợp cho những ai yêu gia đình, và yêu mến nữ nghệ sĩ Kim Xuân.

title: Coming Home
description: John is a hard working man that has focused more on his career than his family. A devastating event leads him back to his hometown, he will come face to face with his choices and their impact on his family. This heartfelt story demonstrates the incredible power of prayer and how God’s love can overcome all.

title: Clockwork Mice
description: Steve is a new teacher at a school for emotionally disturbed children. When he challenges the rebellious Conrad in a race it sparks off a life-changing chain of events...
synopsis: Steve is a new teacher at a school for emotionally disturbed children. When he challenges the rebellious Conrad in a race it sparks off a life-changing chain of events...

title: Citizen Jake
description: Citizen Jake is the story of Jake Herrera, journalist and estranged son of a powerful Philippine Senator. More than anything, he wants to prove he is not like his father. This has been the motivation for most of his adult life's decisions, from career choice to his attempt to build a life for himself far away, in Baguio. But circumstances force him to try to solve the brutal murder of a young, female student from the university he teaches in. The investigation brings him on a path to encounter corruption and to finally face his own demons.

title: Churchill’s Secret
description: Set during the summer of 1953, CHURCHILL’S SECRET tells a little-known part of Winston Churchill’s great life story. Having suffered a life-threatening stroke, which his inner circle conspired to hide from the public, the film charts the course of Winston’s remarkable recovery and investigates the strain that his great public service wrought upon his private life. By now in his late 70s, Prime Minister for the second time and with his sights set on achieving peace with the Russians, the great war god Churchill falters at a public dinner. Confused and emotional, he appears to be entering his dotage – if not his demise. Unsure if he will survive the weekend, his passionately loyal wife Clementine spirits him away to Chartwell, their private country residence. In the darkest hours, Clemmie calls their children to his bedside. However, the crisis reveals deep divisions within the family. Just as it does within the Conservative party, as those waiting in the wings begin to whisper. The press barons and politicians, unsure who could replace him as leader, agree to keep the situation a secret- an unprecedented event in modern British history. But Winston won’t give up. With the help of Millie, a young and surprisingly spirited nurse, and to the bittersweet relief of Clementine, he lives to fight another day on the front line of international politics. His last great battle in his sights:  European re-unification and nuclear disarmament.  Told from the point of view of his family, his doctor, the men he championed and, most touchingly, his young nurse, CHURCHILL’S SECRET follows Winston’s extraordinary battle to recover, casting an honest light on the tensions within his brilliant and dysfunctional family.

title: Chup
description: Chup is a story of some brave girls. It's a Story of their protest against teasing. Protest against one sided social norms which always goes to in favor of boys.

title: Chronicle Of A Blood Merchant VI
description: Bộ phim dựa trên nguyên tác của nhà văn nổi tiếng Trung Quốc Dư Hoa, lấy bối cảnh xã hội vào thời điểm những năm 50 ở Hàn, sau chiến tranh cuộc sống khó khăn và nghèo đói. Những tâm trạng, tình cảm, mối quan hệ xã hội của con người thời đó được thể hiện lại, và trên hết làm bật lên giá trị nhân văn của gia đình, tình cha con, một mái nhà

actors: Ha Jung Woo,Ha Ji Won,Nam Da Reum

title: Christmas On The Bayou
description: Meredith Anderson, is a divorced mom living in NYC with her 9-year-old son, Andy. She quits her job and moves to Fayetteville, Louisiana a few short weeks before Christmas. Meredith’s big challenge is figuring out how to support herself. Andy misses his friends and doesn’t fit in with the local kids. Andy meets an elderly, white-bearded recluse who lives by himself in the bayou and tells Andy that he is Papa Noel. Caleb Laurence, a ranger who works in the bayou, reconnects with Meredith, and a relationship between the unlikely couple commences. On Christmas Eve, a storm hits, destroying everything. When the town awakens upon Christmas morning, they’re stunned to find a priceless and unexpected gift: Fayetteville has been rebuilt and looks more pristine then ever. Andy knows who did this – Papa Noel - who uses his magic to help Andy and Meredith fit into their new lives.

title: Christmas In Mississippi
description: Photographer Holly Logan (Jana Kramer) returns to her hometown of Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. The town is resurrecting their traditional holiday light show for the first time since a terrible hurricane struck five years earlier. Holly volunteers to pitch in, but soon has second thoughts when she discovers the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike (Wes Brown.) Now Holly must spend the next few days with the man who broke her heart. With the help of Caroline (Faith Ford,) her match-making mother and Mr. Kriss, the kind man who will play Santa in the town's celebration, Holly begins to fall in love with her hometown, and Mike, all over again

title: Chompoo Gam Mem
description: A mother is separated from her Thai husband and move to Austria with her daughter. During her childhood, the daughter has also a half-Thai friend. When growing up, the daughter wants to know her Thai father and decide with her best friend to gather the money to buy the air ticket to Thailand. They try different opportunities (play Molam, simulate red cross helpers, get money from wish fountains).

title: Chit Thu Phan Sin Taw A Nann Mhoh Yar
description: Bhone Min Khant and Ngu Wah are deeply in love with each other. However, Min Khant’s family have forced him to marry another girl of their choosing. Seeing no way out, he decides to try to stay away from Ngu Wah.

title: Chit Mi Lo
description: Naw always dreams to become a selection athletic player for SEA Games and she try so hard.But unfortunately, car accident makes her paralyzed from the waist down. And also, her boyfriend breaks up with her and doesn’t even come to hospital. Naw feels depression and stops connection with her friends. But when she meets with Khung, she changes a lot and try to recover.

title: Children Of The Sun Trailer
description: As the Mob destroys the life of a big family and leaves them on the brink of survival, a powerful, yet secret love, burns between gangster Marko and Angela.

title: Charge Over You
description: After the death of her mother, Sarah Goodall struggles to make sense of her life, her purpose, and her faith. Having spent most of her adolescent years positioning herself to find a cure for her mother’s illness, she battles with feelings of guilt and failure that send her spiraling downward. Her intensifying relationship with a mysterious bad boy only seems to add to the confusion. Once an honor student, Sarah begins failing her classes, jeopardizing her scholarship and her future. When a transfer student arrives on the scene, he takes a vested interest in Sarah, helping her find what she’s counted as lost.

title: Campus Caller
description: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her. What she encounters is a wall of academia bureaucracy and coverups that point to an abuse of authority stemming all the way to the government.

title: Changeover
description: After Haley Thompson suffers the loss of her parents in a fatal car wreck, she moves in with her almost estranged single uncle and his young son. Still trying to cope with her parents death, Madeline suffers from PTSD, and other mental health issues as they all attempt to move on from tragedy and make a life together as a new family.

Still trying to cope with her parents death, Madeline suffers from PTSD, and other mental health issues as they all attempt to move on from tragedy and make a life together as a new family.
actors: Madeline Taylor,Andre Gower,Estes Tarver,Carter Godwin,Carrie Michelle,Tara Polhemus

title: Chances
description: A family man down on his luck tries again to get a job without being discriminated against.
synopsis: A family man down on his luck tries again to get a job without being discriminated against.

title: Broken Trust
description: Sophie Anderson is the lead attorney on an intellectual property case against a corrupt pharmaceutical company. When her mentor and boss Bruce Harris is kidnapped, Sophie becomes a pawn in an elaborate scheme that jeopardizes her case and more. Sophie races against the clock to save Bruce and escape the deadly traps that have been set to snare her.

title: Breaking The Mould
description: History books tell us that Alexander Fleming discovered penicillin, but that's not the whole story. 'BREAKING THE MOULD: THE STORY OF PENICILLIN' uncovers the forgotten team involved in the development and manufacture of the drug that transformed medicine.
synopsis: History books tell us that Alexander Fleming discovered penicillin, but that's not the whole story. 'BREAKING THE MOULD: THE STORY OF PENICILLIN' uncovers the forgotten team involved in the development and manufacture of the drug that transformed medicine.

title: Bra ther
description: How will you feel when there is pressure on every corner? Your business, girlfriend, family and friends? On top of that, the business is selling women's underwear garments! This is the story of that young man who faces a lot of questions and struggles just because of the nature of his family business and how he cannot even come clean to his own girlfriend.

actors: Shoab Monir,Siam Nasir,Golama Rabbani Mintu,Samia Othoi,Afran Nisho

title: Bramble House Christmas
description:
Willa Fairchild and her 11 year-old son Josh are enjoying a Christmas at the Bramble House B&B, thanks to a generous
bequest from one of Willa’s former nursing patients. Willa has no idea that one of the other guests, Finn Knightly, is the son of her former patient, and has been sent by his family, who intend to contest the will. Though Willa and Finn are protective of their hearts for different reasons, they fall in love — until Willa discovers Finn’s true identity and
his reason for being at Bramble House. Now Finn must gain Willa’s trust to make this a Christmas to remember.

Now Finn must gain Willa’s trust to make this a Christmas to remember.

title: Buried Secrets
description: Sarah Day is an ex-cop turned crime fiction novellist, who soon finds herself drawn back into the murky world of criminal investigation when a copycat killer begins replicating the murders in her book. Sarah soon learns that if she is to find the murderer before its too late, she will be forced to confront painful memories from her past.

title: Boonpheng Hiem Rake
description: Based on the true story in The King Rama VI reign about the cruel murderer who was the last death row inmate with cutting throat. Boonpeng (Pairoj) loves gambling and using love potion with women. He lives with Mae Plik. He is famous from using love potion. Many girls infatuated with him. Boonpeng likes a girl, so he kills his wife and robs all her assets. How will Boonpeng escape from the law with his spell? How does he relate to the iron chest? Stay tunes. This October.

title: Bondhu Othoba Bonduker Golpo
description: This is a story of two friends meeting after a long time. It begins with a great deal of nostalgia shared between two friends. But as it unfolds, we see how relationships tend to be defined by the politics of the day. We find friendship and enmity intertwined into one complex reality.

title: Boy and Girl
description: Lucky (Lalita Panyopas) does a part-time job as delivering a good and she can accidentally meet Krich (Willy McIntosh) in his party. Krich is impresses in Lucky so much because she isn't interested in him like other women. That’s why he finds all ways to get closer to her. However, she mistakes him, will their story end up happily?

title: Beg For Love Once Again
description: Au lives with her Grandma Hom after her dad passed away. But Hom is afraid that Au will have love affair with her son, Non. Au feels uncomfortable with that, so she moves to Chiangmai during summer vacation. She works as a babysitter for Jao La, a widower with 2 children. Au stays there until she becomes a part of the family while Jao La seems to have a feeling for her. Non comes to visit his niece but Jao La thinks he comes to take her back to Bangkok while his sister is trying to stop his relationshio too. Will Jao La believe his sister like always? Will this love be able to happen?

title: Blood-Rose
description:
For the eve of Valentine's Day, Enam Chowdhury goes shopping with his friend Shahana to buy gifts for her wife, Maliha. Suddenly, an unknown person calls Enam and confirms that Maliha has been kidnapped and demands ransom at the earliest.
Maliha is struggling to survive this horrific situation, while Enam frantically tries to find the ransom. What will happen in the end?

title: Black Virgin
description: A young woman is about to marry a handsome man, but another woman seduces him. The young woman tries to commit suicide but eventually leaves the country. She returns 16 years later and tries to take revenge on her by courting her son.

title: Black Cobra
description: Annie (Prissana), an assassin who fight with the criminals, comes to Thailand with Ong-ard (Pairoj) her friend. Her action is observed by an undercover cop, Noppadol (Sombat). Noppadol convinces her to give him a traits of the criminals and he will help her get out from accusation.

description: This is a story of a young couple searching for a good place to start a life of togetherness. But the length of togetherness has no indelible tie to the strength of the relationship. Sometimes it may prove to be a mirage.

description: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

description: Part-investigative documentary, part-satire and shot entirely in black-and-white, the film tackles the mystery that surrounds the life and death of the Filipino hero, Jose Rizal.

description: The feisty moms of Sky Castle wouldn't back down to anyone without a fight.

description: Sky Castle dads are honorable and dignified. But when it comes to their principle, they will always stand their ground.

title: Baby Angelo
description: When an aborted baby is found in the garbage of a low-income apartment complex, an investigation ensues, uncovering the secrets of its tenants.

title: Ayah, Mengapa Aku Berbeda
description: Angel, gadis remaja yang tunarungu, tidak pernah menyerah untuk membuktikan bahwa ia terlahir ke dunia ini dengan tujuan yang diberikan Tuhan. Ia terus berjuang meraih impiannya untuk membahagiakan sang ayah, setelah ibunya meninggal saat melahirkan dirinya.

description: While driving through Los Angeles, a movie star confronts devastating events that threaten his sobriety, his loved ones, and potentially, his life.

description: Two rival toy shop owners reluctantly join forces when an unscrupulous toy magnate opens a box store in their town.
synopsis: Two rival toy shop owners reluctantly join forces when an unscrupulous toy magnate opens a box store in their town.

title: Ate AKA Big Sister
description: The story of a teenage girl who falls in love with her best friend and is sent to a government home when her mother finds out about their forbidden affair.
synopsis: The story of a teenage girl who falls in love with her best friend and is sent to a government home when her mother finds out about their forbidden affair.

title: Ataul For Rent
description: Ataul for Rent is a narrative social satire movie depicting the lives of the slum dwellers of "Kalyehong Walang Lagusan", a very narrow, congested, miserable alley/compound in a typical squatter's area. The story revolves around the lives of a live-in couple who owns a small-time funeral parlor renting out coffins of four different sizes, small, medium, large and extra small. Guido, the owner, doubles as the embalmer, while his partner, Pining, does the make-up and uses the same implements for both the dead and the living and is the jueteng kubrador of the neighborhood.

title: Asking For Love
description: Dao (Sunit) and Mhor (Anchalee) are close friends. Mhor always has a conflict with her stepmother and Dao is a polite girl and never spoils her parents’ reputation. However, she’s heard that she’s not a biological daughter. She grieves over this so she runs away from her home and wants to find her biological mother. Her parents have to make a missing person announcement and hire Sup (Kittikhun), a private detective, to find her. (Filming in London)
synopsis: Dao (Sunit) and Mhor (Anchalee) are close friends. Mhor always has a conflict with her stepmother and Dao is a polite girl and never spoils her parents’ reputation. title: Asian King
description: An international police squad (Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Korea and Philippines) investigates on a crime ring called "Asian King". This movie is also wrongly called "เปิดฟ้าผ่าโลกัณต์" by Lepso Studio. David is accused of international diamond robbery but released as proofs are not enough. He left for Hong Kong. Thai police follows him there to spy his activities. Finally he is found not guilty and joins the team to fight the Asian King gang, which is stealing diamonds. A whole international team is created to fight them. Win (Sorapong Chatree) is one of the Police team leader. Lady Napossa (Naowarat Yooktanun) joins the team as her jeweller father was killed by Asian King gang. Diamonds are stolen again during a top model show despite the police presence. Rumours are heard that Asian King team needs to gather in Pattaya. Asian King team tries all ways to get rid of the special police force but to no avail. Asian King team cache is hidden under a hotel swimming pool. The army comes to help the policemen to neutralize the Asian King tean. Through a final battle, many characters are injured or killed while assaulting the Asian King fortress. Win's self sacrifice inside the fortress succeeds to destroy it. A Thai TV serie or Lakorn (ละคร) based on this story was done in 2003. This movie is part of Thai heritage (มรดก) cinema serie. Despite a classic scenario, the highest value of this movie is to include the finest bunch of Thai actors from beginning of 1980s decade. A remake for TV was done in 2003.

description: A story that explores family conflict between 2 sisters and their painter father before the World War 2, in Intramuros, Old Manila.

title: A Phyu Yaung That Thant
description: The orphan girl, Moe Man do everything to get money. One day she meets Man Hone who is company boss and Man Hone treats her like his niece. But there is a reason why Man Hone treat her like this. What is the reason?
synopsis: မိဘမဲ့ မိုးမာန္တစ္ေယာက္ သူငယ္ခ်င္းသံလစိနဲ႔ ေပါင္းၿပီး ဘဝကိုျဖစ္သလိုေနေလ့ရွိပါတယ္။ လိမ္တယ္၊ ခိုးတယ္၊ ပိုက္ဆံရဖို႔ ဘာမဆိုအကုန္လုပ္ပါတယ္။ တစ္ေန႔မွာေတာ့ ဦးမာန္ဟုန္ဆိုတဲ့ ကုမၸဏီပိုင္ရွင္နဲ႔ မိုးမာန္ စံုေတြ႕ၿပီး မိုးမာန္ကိုသနားတဲ့အတြက္ တူမတစ္ေယာက္လို အိမ္မွာေခၚထားလိုက္ပါတယ္။ တစ္ကယ္ေတာ့ ဦးမာန္ဟုန္မွာ တစ္ခ်ိန္ကခ်စ္ရတဲ့ အခ်စ္ဦးရွိခဲ့ပါတယ္။ ကံမေကာင္းလို႔ အခ်စ္ဦးနဲ႔ေဝးခဲ့ရေပမယ့္ တစ္ေန႔မွ ေမ့မရခဲ့ပါဘူး။ ဦးမာန္ဟုန္ရဲ႕အခ်စ္ဦးနဲ႔ မိုးမာန္တို႔ဟာ ႐ုပ္ခ်င္းဆင္ေနတဲ့အခါမွာေတာ့…..

title: A Sone Mae A Chit
description: A human girl and a vampire boy. When they fall in love each other, what will happen?
synopsis: A human girl and a vampire boy. When they fall in love each other, what will happen?
actors: Nay Toe,Wai Lu Kyaw,Wutt Hmone Shwe Yi

title: Ao Lua Ha Dong
description: Bộ phim là câu chuyện về chiếc áo dài Việt Nam và số phận một tình yêu, một gia đình trong thời chiến tranh loạn lạc, Áo lụa Hà Đông tôn vinh văn hóa Việt qua tà áo dài và những phẩm chất của người phụ nữ Việt Nam thông qua nhân vật một người con xa xứ. Câu chuyện đời, chuyện tình của Dần với Gù được kể lại một cách chậm rãi. Lẩn khuất, ẩn hiện trong đó là hình ảnh chiếc áo dài Việt Nam. Chiếc áo bảo bọc anh Gù khi anh còn đỏ hỏn, bị cha mẹ bỏ rơi dưới gốc đa.

title: A Perfect Chord
description: A Perfect Chord is an inspiring film about overcoming fears, living up to expectations, and using one’s gifts and talents to inspire others. Cadence (Malia Flack) has an incredible gift for music, but she also has an extreme fear of the stage that has kept her from performing for anyone but her best friend, Lizzy (Avery Noel).  Meanwhile, Mika (Elina Odnoralov) struggles with the weight of expectations that comes from being born into a musical family and wrestles with the style of music her heart yearns to play. Featuring an original motion picture soundtrack, A Perfect Chord is sure to encourage you to pursue your dreams.

title: Aparisyon
description: Sister Lourdes (Jodi Sta. Maria), a newcomer to a convent, avoids Mother Superior to attend political rallies with Sister Remy (Mylene Dizon), a young nun suffering from a crisis of faith after her brother's disappearance.

description: "Ang Huling Araw Ng Linggo" spans a week in a life of seven individuals with interconnected narratives.

title: Ang Sugarol
description: Set in the world of high-stakes cockfighting, gamblers place their money and lives on the line. Elena is a bet leader in a cockfight place, which she inherited from her father. She’s a prisoner of this job. Will she get the freedom that she’s hoping for amidst the many gamble of her own life?

title: Ang Laro Sa Buhay Ni Juan
description: The Game of Juan’s Life explores two hours in the life of 25 year old Masbate native Juan Reyes (Ray An Dulay), a live sex performer in an underground gay bar in Manila. He has decided to leave his past behind, and in doing, so takes us with him as he makes life decisions, big and small -- his emotional goodbyes with his lover, Noel (Nico Antonio); and his last performance marred by a raid by the authorities which changes his resolve.
synopsis: The Game of Juan’s Life explores two hours in the life of 25 year old Masbate native Juan Reyes (Ray An Dulay), a live sex performer in an underground gay bar in Manila. He has decided to leave his past behind, and in doing, so takes us with him as he makes life decisions, big and small -- his emotional goodbyes with his lover, Noel (Nico Antonio); and his last performance marred by a raid by the authorities which changes his resolve.
actors: Angeli Bayani,Nico Antonio,Richard Quan,Perry Escano,Mark Fabillar,Ray-an Dulay

title: Ang Kwento Nating Dalawa
description: As clouds begin to roll, we see the morning life of a busy city. Cars jam the streets, as people makes squares of the side streets they walk on. People queues in line as everyone wants to board the city train. This is SAM’s daily picture of his long travel to school. He is a young filmmaker, who in his everyday commute, meets his girlfriend ISA, an aspiring writer, in a station, stops away from the school they go to. The gloomy weather seems to be painting the day for the young couple. The concurring problems between them loom as they try to survive the day. ISA is about to leave for the States after graduation and SAM gets an apprenticeship offer from one of the top film directors of the country. All these reasons make way for unspoken words of doubt and fear, on top of a bigger dilemma they have to face. SAM and ISA had to make a decision. They cannot stay too long in this relationship.

title: Ang Ibang Mga Pamilya
description: A mother mourns the loss of her only son alone. Along with “Lakad ni Sammy”, a diptych of short films adapted from the Butch Dalisay short story “Some Families, Very Large”.
synopsis: A mother mourns the loss of her only son alone. Along with “Lakad ni Sammy”, a diptych of short films adapted from the Butch Dalisay short story “Some Families, Very Large”.

title: Anatomy Of Deception
description: District Attorney GENNA KNOWLES, 39, is determined to clean up crime in her city and has gained the respect of her community. But Genna’s good life starts to unravel when she finds hidden video cameras in her bedroom and discovers husband ZACH, 42, is cheating on her; he moves out, eventually getting custody of daughter KIERA, 13.

title: Alone (2008)
description: Revolving around the themes of food, mothers, old songs and love, Alone portrays people isolated by modern life.
synopsis: Revolving around the themes of food, mothers, old songs and love, Alone portrays people isolated by modern life.

title: An Encounter With The Messiah
description:
The Woman with the Issue of Blood, or as we call her in our film, Maria. She was arguably the most well-known, nameless figure in the bible. A woman who suffered for 12 years with an incurable disease. 12 years of doctors telling her that they can do nothing for her. 12 years of exile from her family and friends. She literally lost everything that she had. Except her faith. Maria had every reason to become bitter but she kept her faith and it was because of that faith her life was forever changed. Blind Bartimeaus was a homeless, blind beggar. Through no fault of his own he was handed a very rough life. He spent years on the streets until one day he had an encounter that changed his life. He was at the right place at the right time.
Barabbas was one of the most mysterious figures mentioned in The Four Gospels. He was a man who made every bad decision you can think of. He lived the life of a common street thug. He was ultimately sentenced to death for his crimes, and though an execution may be a fitting end to such a person, something else happened. Someone else took his place and was put to death instead.

title: Ajab Gazabb Love
description: The story revolves around Rajveer who falls in love with Madhuri. He realizes that she hates rich people. So Rajveer, along with his family, pretends to be poor to win Madhuri's love.
synopsis: The story revolves around Rajveer who falls in love with Madhuri. He realizes that she hates rich people. So Rajveer, along with his family, pretends to be poor to win Madhuri's love.
actors: Darshan Jariwalla,Jacky Bhagnani,Kirron Kher,Mayur Puri & Others,Nidhi Subbaiah

title: Air Force Lover Story
description: Toon(Toon), an airforce man, come to take an airforce course. He has to stay with Tao (Seetao), his uncle who is a flight sergeant first class, and Flight Sergeant Sompong. But his life is messy when he meets Flight Sergeant Rong (Rong), a quirky boxing coach. They make a bet with boxing to finish their arguement. Meanwhile, Toon falls in love with a village girl called Nao (Naowarat) but she is a marshal's daughter. He has to find the matchmaker but unluckily the matchmaker is Rong's sister. The situation starts to be ridiculous.

title: Ai Khun Cherm
description: Three beggars are friends and helping each other. One is polishing shoes, one is singing, one is simulating being a blind man in order to be able to sell lottery tickets. One of them has opportunity to work for a businessman and starts a romance with the businessman's daughter. Another one is courting another businessman's daughter. A local mafia gang is kidnapping the two businessmen. Police promises to help but the local police head is part of the mafia gang. The three beggards will manage to release the two businessmen.

title: Again
description: Two men and two women. The two men love the same woman so problems arise between the two women.
synopsis: Two men and two women. The two men love the same woman so problems arise between the two women.

title: A Family Lost
description: Valérie and her diabetic daughter Claire survive a plane crash in the remote Alaskan wilderness during the heart of winter. Along with Marcus, the only other survivor, they desperately try to find their way back to civilization for food, water and insulin. Back home, Valerie’s fiancé, Steve, races against time to find them as Marcus attempts to lead them to safety. However, Claire soon gets an uneasy sense that there is something terribly wrong here and nobody can be trusted. To survive, they must battle the elements, escape a Grizzly bear, and flee from murderous criminals trying to recover a valuable microchip that Claire is unknowingly transporting. Now, mother and daughter can only rely on each other…

title: Ae Thal
description: Min Khant comes from an incredibly poor family. Because he wants to support his family the best he can, he starts working as a special nurse for the chairman of a successful company. Unexpectedly, he befriends the chairman’s daughter.
synopsis: Min Khant comes from an incredibly poor family. Because he wants to support his family the best he can, he starts working as a special nurse for the chairman of a successful company. Unexpectedly, he befriends the chairman’s daughter.

title: A Date To Die For
description: Laura Armstrong, mother of two beautiful daughters, Samantha (15) and Kali (8), is going through a divorce from her husband, Derek. Though somewhat reluctant to move on with her life her friends coax Laura to go out on a first date with a man she’s just met... she awakens the following morning not remembering the previous night only to find her date dead in her bed, with a knife plunged into his chest. When the clues point to Laura’s involvement, she becomes the prime suspect in the death of her date, and ultimately she’s charged with murder and locked up in jail. Once she is released on bail, Laura must now prove her innocence. As Laura struggles to piece together her memory of the murder she is coming closer and closer to discovering the real killer and must fight to defend the lives of her family while solving the gruesome crime and clearing her good name.

title: A Christmas Snow
description: For the past 30 years, Kathleen (Catherine Mary Stewart) has carried around the haunting memory of her father abandoning her and her mother on Christmas Eve. She has to choose between letting go and grabbing hold of a life-changing forgiveness, or continuing to carry her pain and bitterness.

actors: Catherine Mary Stewart,Muse Watson,Anthony Tyler Quinn,Anne Winters,Cameron Ten Napel

title: A Chit Sit
description: Nay Lin Htun Tauk is born to a rich family and loses his mother at a young age. After a car accident, he is now in a coma. His life now depends on three drops of tears of true love. Although he’s surrounded by friends and girlfriends because of his wealth, it seems none of them can provide him what he needs. His true love May is in the spirit world. Will he be able to gather the three drops of tears in time?

title: A Chit Ko Win Yan Kya
description: Thaw trys to get a lot of money for his unhealthy mother. He do everything to get money. One day, a diamond necklace he stole is suddenly drop to the bag of the Actor Yoon. But Yoon didn’t know about that. So Thaw try to approach Yoon and get back that necklace.

title: A Chit Ka Pay Tae Suu
description: Htut Khaung used to live without a care, unbothered by what everyone else thinks. That is, until he met Thwel Nu Htway. He changed his lifestyle just so he could be with her but in a surprising twist of fate, she marries his father instead.

title: A Beautiful Life
description: A beautiful real-estate agent (Peiru) gets drunk at a karaoke bar and throws up on a principled, lonely cop (Zhendong). Zhendong quickly falls for the flirtatious Peiru despite the fact that she's having a tortuous affair with a married man. As Peiru gradually abandons her materialistic values and falls in love with the good hearted Zhendong, it becomes apparent that he is suffering from a disease that is robbing him of his mental faculties.

description: The rise and fall of the Paris Commune: Ken McMullen's "1871" is a visual tour de force, bringing to life an unforgettable world of love, death, war and revolution.
synopsis: The rise and fall of the Paris Commune: Ken McMullen's "1871" is a visual tour de force, bringing to life an unforgettable world of love, death, war and revolution.
actors: Ian MacNeice,Dominique Pinon,Maria de Medeiros,Timothy Spall

title: Pepot Artista
description: Pepot Artista is a comedy-musical that focuses on a ten-year-old boy whose dream is to become a movie star. Pepot, the dreamer, is surrounded by people who are equally dazzled by the movie world - from his own mother to the principal in his school to the impersonators in the neighborhood carnival. Coming from a poor family, Pepot overcomes adversity to have a chance at fulfilling his dream. He tackles school bullies, a strict teacher, and an unwelcoming world that fail to comprehend his intense desire to become a star. The story happens in the '70s when superstars brightened the film world in Pepot's country. The film explores the penchant of Filipinos for entertainment in the midst of serious social problems.

title: Vox Populi
description: It is Saturday before the 2nd Monday of May, the last day of the official campaign period before elections. Connie is the daughter of a former Mayor of the town of San Cristobal and is now running for the same position. She is now running a three-cornered campaign against the former Vice-Mayor and a former student leader, helped by her brother Ricky, campaign manager TONY and an increasing number of supporters . On this day, she goes out on a factory and market visit, a house-to-house campaign, attends the signing of a covenant for clean elections and her “miting de avance”. She also meets with influential individuals, all in pursuit of an irreversible bandwagon that will prove she is the popular choice of the people.

title: Little Azkals
description: The Philippine Football team Azkals miraculous winnings in Asia started a wave for the country that we too can eye for the most coveted World Cup. For the first time in history, The Philippine Football Federation (PFF) has launched a search for the next Philippine Azkals who will undergo training for the 2019 World Cup qualifier. More than 1000 boys from Luzon, Visayas, and Mindanao tried their lucks. Only 22 are selected. This documentary film is a story of dreams.

title: Baseco Bakal Boys
description: A realistic docudrama, Children Metal Divers tells the heart-tugging story of children who scavenge for metal scraps in the murky waters of Manila Bay, often risking their lives in the process.
synopsis: A realistic docudrama, Children Metal Divers tells the heart-tugging story of children who scavenge for metal scraps in the murky waters of Manila Bay, often risking their lives in the process.

title: Ritwal
description: A story about a faith healer, Madam Celia, who amazed a small rustic town with her miraculous healing. She was very much respected and revered by the townsfolk. So when she offered them a job in the USA, as apple pickers–everybody grabbed the opportunity. But little did they know that their American Dream will turn into a Nightmare.

title: Magnifico
description: Set in a rural area, Magnifico and his family lives an impoverish life and started to lose hope after facing different trials. - her sister suffers from cerebral palsy, his older brother who studies in Manila loses his scholarship, he (Magnifico) is not so good in school and his grandmother suffers from stomach cancer. Pikoy (Magnifico) often hears his parents arguing about money which led him to think of ways to help his family. With his young, kind and sympathetic heart, Pikoy eventually helped his family and even became an influence to his townspeople.

title: Ang Paglipad Ng Anghel
description: Explore the story of Gabby, a young accountant in a television network, who leads an uneventful, if not boring, life. He wakes up to a regular day, does his daily routine, until on his way to work he sees an old beggar asking for help. He helps the old, sickly lady and brings her to a hospice where the nuns take care of the old and dying. After this act of charity, he starts noticing feathers growing on his back. As the feathers grow into full wings and complicate his life, he starts to face the consequences of being an “angel”.

title: Colorum
description: The film tells a story that revolves around two people. Simon a promising young cop working part-time as a driver of one of the many “undocumented” and ‘illegal’ FX taxis in the metro. And Pedro, a 70 year old ex-convict. An unfortunate incident forces the two together to embark on a road trip across the Historic Philippine East Coast. But, what was expected as an escape route doomed to be a domino of crime begetting crime, becomes a wagon of life choices to them and to the people they meet. The film takes a look at the paradox of the human condition, and the “grayscale” morality that is today’s Philippines.

title: Thelma
description: One struggle. One chance. One dream. The film tells the story of a tomboyish Ilocano lass from Ilocos Norte, Thelma whose family is beset with challenges when she discovers her uncanny gift.
synopsis: One struggle. One chance. One dream. The film tells the story of a tomboyish Ilocano lass from Ilocos Norte, Thelma whose family is beset with challenges when she discovers her uncanny gift.

title: Endo
description: Leo (Abalos) belongs to a poor family. Because he did not finish his studies, his only option is to work as a contractual worker in various establishments. In one job, he met a high-spirited girl named Tanya (Feleo) with whom he got romantically involved. In their relationship, he wishes to feel fulfillment and sense of security with her but he is not prepared for this additional commitment. The title "Endo" comes from a slang expression that is used when a contractual worker goes to work for the last time, "Endo" being a shortened form of the term "end of contract".

title: Sa Aking Pagkakagising Mula Sa Kamulatan
description: Sa Aking Pagkakagising Mula Sa Kamulatan is a full length digital picture that takes a realistic glimpse of the Filipino youth in the gulf of Manila's urban gullies. It tackles socially-related issues surrounding the intersecting lives of marginalized ordinary Manileños. Presented in a staggered vista of correlated events, the movie explores the day-to-day survival of the characters and their broken dreams, pent-up anger and abnormal sexuality. It conveys its message powerfully in a daring and unapologetic way-- using street lingo to it's fullest. The story unfolds one night when Rey, the docile and cowardly teenage student is mauled as he passes by a drinking spree of street toughies: Pogie, Jopet, Kahoy and Taba.

title: Morning Glory
description: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.
synopsis: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

title: Muro Ami
description: Maestro Fredo, a tyrant captain fixates to claim the treasures of the sea -- no matter what in whatever diabolical technique for as long as he profits. He employs dozens of men, mostly children, in his dangerous expeditions. Conditions aboard the ships are oppressive. Children are often overworked and his crew is furious with the way they are living. He blames the sea for claiming the lives of his family and he exacts revenge by plundering its depths.

actors: Cesar Montano,Pen Medina,Amy Austria,Jhong Hilario,Rebecca Lusterio

title: Magic Hour
description: Raina is in dilemma when she met Dimas, an interesting yet ignorant man who captured her attention. As they become closer, Toby (Raina's childhood friend) suddenly proclaimed his love to Raina. On the other side, Dimas is already set up with Gwenny, who in fact is Raina's best friend. Now Raina is faced with a difficult options, her friendship of her love?

title: London Love Story
description:
Dave is terribly heartbroken because the woman he loves left him without any explanation. 
However, he meets Adelle, who happens to be on the brink of committing suicide. 
Meanwhile there is also Caramel who starts to have feelings for Bima. 
Faith then unites these 4 different people and brings a little bit of surprise into their lives.

title: Jose Rizal
description: Jose Rizal's life and works are recounted through a series of non-linear flashbacks which reflect on various aspects of his life - as writer, propagandist, lover, friend, brother, doctor and the man that inspired a revolution.

title: The Notebook
description: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.

title: Trace
description: When some friends experiment with EVP at a party, they find themselves terrorized by a force from another realm.
synopsis: When some friends experiment with EVP at a party, they find themselves terrorized by a force from another realm.

title: They Remain
description: Two scientists are sent on a mission to investigate strange occurrences on land once occupied by a thrill kill cult.  As weeks of isolation pass, they realize they are unable to trust the wilderness around them, the corporation that sent them there or even themselves. From the writer of “Europa Report”; based on Laird Barron’s haunting novella.

title: The Watch
description: An experiment in isolation turns to fear as strange events plague a college student (Elizabeth Whitmere) in a forest.

title: The Follower
description: Young Youtuber David Baker is invited by Carol, a lonely woman, to investigate supernatural occurrences in her home. But it takes a turn as he slowly uncovers that things aren't what they seem.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.
synopsis: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most terrifying case of their lives.

title: The Bride VI
description: The unusual practice of photographing dead relatives during mid-1800s rural Russia will link a Philology student with her husband's abysmal family history.
synopsis: The unusual practice of photographing dead relatives during mid-1800s rural Russia will link a Philology student with her husband's abysmal family history.

title: The Babadook
description: A single mother, plagued by the violent death of her husband, battles with her son's fear of a monster lurking in the house, but soon discovers a sinister presence all around her.
synopsis: A single mother, plagued by the violent death of her husband, battles with her son's fear of a monster lurking in the house, but soon discovers a sinister presence all around her.

title: Sundo
description: Romano finds out that he has a strange ability to see ghosts surrounding people about to die. Worried for her brother, Romano's blind sister Isabel persuades him to go with her to Manila to see a doctor with the help of Louella and four other friends. On their way back to the city, the group manages to avoid a fatal accident on the road and their respective "sundo" by a twist of fate. Now, the group faces the biggest fight of their lives, how to defeat the wrath of the spirit of tragedy and cheat their own death.

title: Savageland
description: When a small town near the Arizona-Mexico border is wiped out overnight, suspicion falls on the lone survivor. But a roll of photos the survivor took that night tells a different story.

title: Rutabaga
description:
Adrien has to write an article about the opening of a new guesthouse, managed by the owner Mr Pierre and the austere Miss Agathe. 
Despite the surrounding quietness, the doubt instills itself as a strange broth... With the help of Hélène, newly employed by the house, Adrien will discover at his expense the secret this place hides.

title: Red Eye
description: Gage Barker gathers together a group of his friends to make a documentary film about the legend of Red Eye. But, to what extent will they go to make this project a reality...?

title: Preay Puos
description: When a group of students go on a visit of the Ratanakiri province they find plenty of forests, wild humans, magic, and evil spirits. While swimming one day, they see a huge snake and all of them are terrified, except one of them who falls in love with the snake.

title: Preay Hi Show
description: In a small village, lives Houy who is beautiful, gentle, and pure. So much so that a lot of men are attracted to her and want to harm her. Luckily for Houy, Ream is there to protect her.

description: When a psychiatrist at a mental hospital interviews his patients, he suspects their horrific stories are all connected to someone known as Patient Seven.

title: Phteas Thmub
description: 2 daughters to a bewitched father, one is beautiful but evil, the other has a pure heart. Ruled by black magic and bad omen, will the villagers be able to find a way out?
synopsis: 2 daughters to a bewitched father, one is beautiful but evil, the other has a pure heart. Ruled by black magic and bad omen, will the villagers be able to find a way out?

title: Pengabdi Setan (1982)
description: Sebuah keluarga kaya yang jauh dari agama mendapat musibah ketika sang Ibu, Mawarti, wafat. Munarto, sang ayah, hanya peduli kehidupan bisnis, sedangkanTomi merupakan putra yang pendiam dan Rita putri yang kecanduan pesta, bersama mereka ada satu pembantu, Pak Karto, yang taat agama tetapi sakit-sakitan. Keesokan hari setelah sang Ibu wafat, dari saran temannya Tomi menyambangi seorang peramal yang berkata bahwa seluruh keluarganya terancam bahaya yang sangat besar dan akan menewaskan mereka semua. Lalu sang peramal menyarankannya untuk memperkuat diri dengan ilmu hitam.

title: Makorsha
description: After successfully robbing a bank, four robbers end up in an abandoned bungalow and very soon realize that the house is in fact a museum of seven deadly mortal sins. Thus their presence in the house is not a coincidence, but a conspiracy of fate. This is one of the 'Shohorer Shorts' supervised by Adnan Al Rajeev.
synopsis: After successfully robbing a bank, four robbers end up metting in a banglow and they soon realized they are part of a pre-planned trap. This is one of the 'Shohorer Shorts' by Adnan Al Rajeev.

title: Ouija (2007)
description: Aileen and Romina, along with first cousins Sandra and Ruth, reunite to bury their grandmother. Accompanied by Sandra’s friend, Lucy, the five girls dare to call on the spirits of the dead when they find their old Ouija board from when they were kids. The board is burned by accident before they are able to finish the ritual, trapping a murderous entity around them. They have to identify the spirit and find out where it is buried. It is only by leading the spirit to its burial ground that they will be able to release the spirit from the Ouija board and survive its fatal hauntings.

title: Oo Nina Bobo
description: Satu keluarga ditemukan meninggal secara misterius di dalam rumah mereka. Satu-satunya yang selamat hanyalah Ryan, anak laki-laki di keluarga itu. Menderita Post Traumatic Disorder, Ryan dirawat di panti asuhan. Suatu hari datang Karina, mahasiswa psikologi yang sedang mengerjakan tesisnya. Dia tertantang untuk membantu Ryan dengan cara membawanya kembali ke rumahnya dan menghadapi langsung penyebab traumanya. Suatu malam Ryan yang tidak bisa tidur meminta Karina menyanyikan lagu 'Nina Bobo', seperti yang dulu sering dilakukan oleh ibunya. Tanpa mereka ketahui,lagu tersebut membangkitkan sosok misterius yang menjadi penyebab terbunuhnya keluarga Ryan.

title: Nocturna
description: A rookie detective in New Orleans finds himself drawn into the vampire underworld, as he tries desperately to rescue a young girl from their clutches. He is soon forced to make the ultimate choice in an explosive battle between the forces of good and evil.
synopsis: A rookie detective in New Orleans finds himself drawn into the vampire underworld, as he tries desperately to rescue a young girl from their clutches. He is soon forced to make the ultimate choice in an explosive battle between the forces of good and evil.

title: Mchas Tunle Mekong
description: When Ek and Ern go fishing, they encounter a dragon and Ern kills it. The villagers however, punish Ek by binding his limbs and dropping him into the river. Luckily, Ek survives thanks to the help of Vatey, the beautiful dragon Queen. The both of them fall in love but another jealous dragon stands in their way of being together.

description: In a warehouse in the middle of nowhere, two rival prostitutes held against their will join forces to help a 9 year-old girl escape her future as a child sex slave.

title: Keepsake
description: Janine becomes stranded on a remote highway and fights for survival against a psychotic tow truck driver who enjoys torture and depravity.
synopsis: Janine becomes stranded on a remote highway and fights for survival against a psychotic tow truck driver who enjoys torture and depravity.

title: Living Dark The Story Of Ted The Caver
description: Two estranged brothers become obsessed with gaining access to an unexplored cave, despite the horrors they encounter during their excavation.
synopsis: Two estranged brothers become obsessed with gaining access to an unexplored cave, despite the horrors they encounter during their excavation.

title: Ju On 3 The Beginning Of The End VI
description: In this seventh installment of the Ju-on franchise, a school teacher visits the home of a boy who's been absent from school for a long period of time, unaware of the horrific tragedy which occurred in the boy's household many years ago.
synopsis: In this seventh installment of the Ju-on franchise, a school teacher visits the home of a boy who's been absent from school for a long period of time, unaware of the horrific tragedy which occurred in the boy's household many years ago.

title: Jailangkung 2
description: Tasya watches an old video showing her father communicating with her late mother through Jailangkung. She then creates her own Jailangkung in hope to meet her mother who passed away after the laboring process. Unfortunately, her action resulted in the appearance of evil spirit who terrorizes her family. Bella & Rama, with the help of a new friend, Bram, once again have to save their family from evil spirit.

title: Interior
description: When a letter is found hidden inside a family's home, Sam is hired to capture evidence of supernatural events. Isolated and alone with a dark force, Sam and his cameras are taken on a digital journey through the unknown.
synopsis: When a letter is found hidden inside a family's home, Sam is hired to capture evidence of supernatural events. Isolated and alone with a dark force, Sam and his cameras are taken on a digital journey through the unknown.

title: Inner Demon
description: A young girl (Sarah Jeavons), abducted by a murderous couple, escapes her captors and flees to an isolated house. The terror isn't over, however, as she soon discovers the house is inhabited by a supernatural malevolence.
synopsis: A young girl (Sarah Jeavons), abducted by a murderous couple, escapes her captors and flees to an isolated house. The terror isn't over, however, as she soon discovers the house is inhabited by a supernatural malevolence.

title: I Know You're In There
description: When his mother commits suicide, Tom Redding discovers he has a long lost sister that cannot move or talk. Together they travel to their dead mother's isolated home, where Tom hopes to document her illness, only to be driven to the brink of madness by a supernatural evil.
synopsis: When his mother commits suicide, Tom Redding discovers he has a long lost sister that cannot move or talk. Together they travel to their dead mother's isolated home, where Tom hopes to document her illness, only to be driven to the brink of madness by a supernatural evil.

title: House Of Purgatory
description: Four teenagers seek out a legendary haunted house on Halloween. Once inside, they realize it's not an ordinary attraction, and the house may actually be able to re-create their deepest fears.
synopsis: Four teenagers seek out a legendary haunted house on Halloween. Once inside, they realize it's not an ordinary attraction, and the house may actually be able to re-create their deepest fears.

title: Hell Town
description: From award-winning directors Steve Balderson and Elizabeth Spear comes this special presentation of three episodes from their never before released prime-time horror-comedy series HELL TOWN. These episodes are the painstakingly remastered episodes seven, eight and nine of Season Two. Seasons One and Three were completely destroyed in a studio fire. The executives suspected arson.
